sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Robust network security with perimeter protection and zero trust (NET326)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过边界保护和零信任实现强大的网络安全 (NET326)
sessions.abstract: Learn about comprehensive network security on AWS, focusing on integrating Amazon CloudFront, AWS WAF, Network Firewall, and Verified Access (AVA) for zero-trust architecture. Discover how AVA implements access controls for both HTTPS and non-HTTPS applications, providing secure workforce access. Through real-world examples and design patterns, learn AWS-recommended practices for application security and service integration. Gain practical insights for implementing zero-trust frameworks and enhancing organizational network security on AWS.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解AWS上的综合网络安全，重点关注Amazon CloudFront、AWS WAF、Network Firewall和Verified Access (AVA)的集成，以实现零信任架构。探索AVA如何为HTTPS和非HTTPS应用程序实施访问控制，提供安全的员工访问。通过实际案例和设计模式，学习AWS推荐的应用程序安全和服务集成实践。获得实施零信任框架和增强AWS组织网络安全的实用见解。

presenter.name: Megha Kande
presenter.title: Senior Manager Product Management Tech - ES

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-Digital transformation excellence using agentic AI: From vision to victory-MAM204
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-使用智能体AI实现数字化转型卓越：从愿景到胜利-MAM204
sessions.abstract: Discover how customers are leveraging AWS AI-driven solutions to accelerate their cloud transformation journey, moving beyond traditional migration and modernization to achieve digital transformation excellence. This session showcases real-world experiences where organizations have integrated AI-powered accelerators with AWS cloud services to achieve 3x faster migration timelines and drive unprecedented business value. Learn actionable strategies and see demonstrations of how a large transformation project can become a digital enterprise enabler for your organization,
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解客户如何利用AWS AI驱动的解决方案加速其云转型之旅，超越传统的迁移和现代化，实现卓越的数字化转型。本次会议展示了真实案例，组织如何将AI驱动的加速器与AWS云服务集成，实现3倍更快的迁移时间线并推动前所未有的业务价值。学习可操作的策略，并观看大型转型项目如何成为组织数字化企业推动者的演示。

presenter.name: Brad Sevenko
presenter.title: Head of Agentic AI Transformation, ES

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A leader's guide to agentic AI (SNR201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 领导者的智能体AI指南 (SNR201)
sessions.abstract: In a landscape of rapid AI evolution and daily headlines, senior leaders need clarity on what Agentic AI means for their business. This session cuts through the noise to provide a practical understanding of autonomous AI agents and their strategic implications for your organization. We will demystify Agentic AI and focus on what matters most to leaders. We will share how both management and architecture models will need to evolve to get value out of the autonomous AI systems.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在人工智能快速演进和每日头条新闻不断的环境中，高级领导者需要明确了解代理式AI对其业务的意义。本次会议将拨开迷雾，提供对自主AI代理及其对组织战略影响的实用理解。我们将揭开代理式AI的神秘面纱，聚焦于对领导者最重要的内容。我们将分享管理和架构模型如何需要演进，以从自主AI系统中获取价值。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Breaking the legacy barrier: How AI is revolutionizing modernization (MAM402)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 打破传统壁垒：AI如何革新现代化改造 (MAM402)
sessions.abstract: Enterprises are trapped by legacy monoliths that drain billions in maintenance while stifling innovation. Traditional event storming relies on fragmented human memory and disappearing institutional knowledge. Learn how AWS GenAI & Agentic AI services  can now reverse-engineer entire codebases, automatically generating comprehensive event storming a& DDD based analysis  that captures bounded context and  hidden business rules and forgotten workflows in legacy applications. This AI-driven approach transforms months of code archaeology into days of systematic analysis. Organizations can modernize confidently, with early adopters reporting faster modernization with less timeline and fewer post-migration defects. Experience how AI precision is revolutionizing enterprise modernization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业被传统单体应用困住，每年在维护上消耗数十亿资金，同时扼杀创新。传统的事件风暴依赖于碎片化的人类记忆和逐渐消失的机构知识。了解AWS GenAI和Agentic AI服务如何逆向工程整个代码库，自动生成全面的事件风暴和基于DDD的分析，捕获遗留应用程序中的限界上下文、隐藏的业务规则和被遗忘的工作流。这种AI驱动的方法将数月的代码考古工作转变为数天的系统化分析。组织可以自信地进行现代化改造，早期采用者报告称现代化速度更快、时间线更短、迁移后缺陷更少。体验AI精准度如何革新企业现代化。

presenter.name: Anand Bilgaiyan
presenter.title: Senior Specialist Partner solution Architect Enterprise Transformation

presenter.name: Sreekumar Nair
presenter.title: Sr Spec SA Migration+Modernize
presenter.company: Amazon Web Services Singapore Private Limited

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Implement Agentic AI at the edge for industrial automation (HMC317)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在边缘实施代理式AI用于工业自动化 (HMC317)
sessions.abstract: Manufacturing and industrial operations demand real-time, intelligent decision-making in low-connectivity environments. This code talk demonstrates how to deploy SmolVLMs (small vision language models) and AI agents to automate site operations using AWS Outposts and Strands Agents. The solution enables on-premises, multilingual interaction with safety protocols, documentation, and equipment data to enhance the productivity and safety of frontline workers. You’ll learn how to combine edge infrastructure, publicly available models, and agent frameworks to deliver context-aware, resilient AI for industrial automation.
sessions.abstract_cn: 制造和工业运营需要在低连接环境中进行实时、智能的决策。本代码演讲演示了如何使用 AWS Outposts 和 Strands Agents 部署 SmolVLMs(小型视觉语言模型)和 AI 代理来自动化现场运营。该解决方案支持本地部署,通过多语言交互访问安全协议、文档和设备数据,以提高一线工作人员的生产力和安全性。您将学习如何结合边缘基础设施、公开可用的模型和代理框架,为工业自动化提供具有上下文感知能力的弹性 AI。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Secure AI Agents Delivering Efficiency in Regulated Industries (WPS317)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在受监管行业中提供高效率的安全AI代理 (WPS317)
sessions.abstract: Regulated industries demand more than AI deployment—they require secure, efficient, and measurable outcomes. Holland Casino modernized cloud operations with a multi-agent system using AWS Strands Agents SDK, orchestrating agents for security, cost optimization, and operations support with fine-grained permissions. Sicoob, Brazil’s largest credit union, transformed operations with AI agents and digital employees: achieving 80%+ case resolution, cutting document processing time by 25%, deploying 80 digital employees to save 440,000 hours and R$23M, and automating 85% of credit operations. In this session, you’ll learn how organizations securely scale AI to cut costs, streamline compliance, and modernize operations.
sessions.abstract_cn: 受监管行业不仅需要部署AI，更需要安全、高效且可衡量的成果。Holland Casino通过使用AWS Strands Agents SDK的多代理系统实现了云运营现代化，协调安全、成本优化和运营支持代理，并配置细粒度权限。巴西最大的信用合作社Sicoob通过AI代理和数字员工实现了运营转型：案例解决率达80%以上，文档处理时间缩短25%，部署80名数字员工节省44万小时和2300万雷亚尔，信贷运营自动化率达85%。在本次会议中，您将了解组织如何安全地扩展AI以降低成本、简化合规并实现运营现代化。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Improve self-managed database performance and agility with Amazon FSx (STG337)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon FSx 提升自管理数据库的性能和敏捷性 (STG337)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Amazon FSx can modernize Microsoft SQL Server, PostgreSQL, Oracle DB, SAP HANA and others by supercharging performance and improving data protection and resilience. Learn how to choose the right FSx service (FSx for NetApp ONTAP, FSx for OpenZFS, and FSx for Windows File Server) to optimize the TCO of your database environments. We will review practical migration strategies and best practices for resilience including how to protect with replication with the ability to recover in minutes. This session is ideal for anyone who is migrating from on premises and wants to learn the latest in database performance tuning and high availability.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Amazon FSx 如何通过提升性能、改善数据保护和弹性来实现 Microsoft SQL Server、PostgreSQL、Oracle DB、SAP HANA 等数据库的现代化。学习如何选择合适的 FSx 服务（FSx for NetApp ONTAP、FSx for OpenZFS 和 FSx for Windows File Server）以优化数据库环境的总体拥有成本。我们将回顾实用的迁移策略和弹性最佳实践，包括如何通过复制进行保护并在几分钟内实现恢复。本课程非常适合正在从本地环境迁移并希望了解最新数据库性能调优和高可用性技术的人员。

presenter.name: Aaron Dailey
presenter.title: World Wide Specialist Solutions Architect, File

services: Amazon FSx for Windows File Server

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-Finding the Noisy Neighbor: Patterns for Per‑Customer Performance at Scale-MAM354
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-发现吵闹的邻居：大规模按客户性能模式-MAM354
sessions.abstract: Zendesk chose Datadog for observability (APM, Log Management) to boost performance, resolve issues faster, and optimize infrastructure. Datadog's tools provided essential per-tenant visibility for their high-cardinality, multi-tenant platform, guiding code and infrastructure decisions. Datadog also helps Zendesk optimize AWS usage in real-time. This led to faster detection and resolution, fewer cross-tenant incidents, right-sized compute/storage, and better customer experience. Attendees will learn how to de-risk migrations and accelerate modernization with Datadog and AWS. This presentation is brought to you by Datadog, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: Zendesk选择Datadog作为可观测性解决方案(APM、日志管理),以提升性能、更快解决问题并优化基础设施。Datadog的工具为其高基数、多租户平台提供了关键的按租户可见性,指导代码和基础设施决策。Datadog还帮助Zendesk实时优化AWS使用。这带来了更快的检测和解决、更少的跨租户事件、合理调整的计算/存储资源以及更好的客户体验。与会者将学习如何通过Datadog和AWS降低迁移风险并加速现代化。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Datadog提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Learn How Sky Powers the Future of Streaming with Redis Cloud (API209)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 了解 Sky 如何利用 Redis Cloud 驱动流媒体的未来 (API209)
sessions.abstract: When Sky streamed to 23 million viewers during the Peacock-exclusive NFL Wild Card game, bookmarking ensured a seamless experience, handling up to 140,000+ writes per second during live events and 116,000 during record-breaking moments. To meet these demands, Redis Cloud delivered: cross-region active-active replication for global sync, sub-millisecond latency for spikes, and intelligent auto-scaling. Its write-behind capabilities cut costs and enabled a long-awaited AWS Keyspaces migration. Now, Sky’s GenAI platform, Genapi, leverages Redis Cloud's vector search and semantic caching to transform content discovery. Redis Cloud isn’t just solving scale, it’s powering Sky’s AI-driven future. This presentation is brought to you by Redis, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 当Sky在Peacock独家NFL外卡赛期间向2300万观众进行流媒体直播时,书签功能确保了无缝体验,在直播活动期间处理高达每秒140,000次以上的写入操作,在破纪录时刻处理116,000次写入。为满足这些需求,Redis Cloud提供了:跨区域主-主复制实现全球同步、亚毫秒级延迟应对峰值流量,以及智能自动扩展。其write-behind功能降低了成本,并实现了期待已久的AWS Keyspaces迁移。现在,Sky的GenAI平台Genapi利用Redis Cloud的向量搜索和语义缓存来转变内容发现方式。Redis Cloud不仅解决了规模问题,更在推动Sky的AI驱动未来。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Redis提供支持。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Capital One: Building resilient systems by engineering for five nines (IND3308)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Capital One：通过工程化实现五个九来构建弹性系统 (IND3308)
sessions.abstract: 99.999% availability—less than five minutes of downtime per year—is the gold standard for mission-critical applications. This session dives deep into architectural strategies to achieve such availability using AWS. We'll explore fault-tolerant patterns such as multi-Region deployments, active-active failover, circuit breakers, bulkheads, chaos testing, and event-driven designs. Learn how services like Amazon S3, Amazon DynamoDB Global Tables, and AWS Lambda can eliminate single points of failure. We’ll cover SLAs, SLOs, and engineering observability and automation to detect and respond to failures within milliseconds. Case studies and practical design guidance make this session ideal for architects and engineers building for extreme reliability.
sessions.abstract_cn: 99.999% 的可用性——每年停机时间少于五分钟——是关键任务应用程序的黄金标准。本次会议深入探讨使用 AWS 实现这种可用性的架构策略。我们将探索容错模式，如多区域部署、主动-主动故障转移、断路器、隔离舱、混沌测试和事件驱动设计。了解 Amazon S3、Amazon DynamoDB Global Tables 和 AWS Lambda 等服务如何消除单点故障。我们将介绍 SLA、SLO，以及工程可观测性和自动化，以便在毫秒内检测和响应故障。案例研究和实用设计指导使本次会议成为构建极致可靠性的架构师和工程师的理想选择。

presenter.name: Enrique Bastante
presenter.title: Sr. Customer Solutions Manager, AWS Strategic Accounts

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Data protection strategies for AI data foundation (AIM339)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI数据基础的数据保护策略 (AIM339)
sessions.abstract: Build robust security frameworks for AI implementations through hands-on coding. We'll implement data protection patterns, secure prompt handling, and PII detection. Code along as we create privacy-preserving pipelines in SageMaker, configure IAM policies for model access control, and automate compliance checks with AWS Config. Develop defenses against prompt injection attacks, implement differential privacy techniques, and build CloudTrail audit trails. Leave with production-ready code templates for governance guardrails and technical safeguards that protect sensitive data throughout the AI lifecycle while enabling innovation and maintaining trust in your AI applications.
sessions.abstract_cn: 通过实践编码为AI实施构建强大的安全框架。我们将实现数据保护模式、安全提示处理和PII检测。跟随编码，在SageMaker中创建隐私保护管道，配置模型访问控制的IAM策略，并使用AWS Config自动化合规性检查。开发针对提示注入攻击的防御措施，实现差分隐私技术，并构建CloudTrail审计跟踪。您将获得用于治理护栏和技术保障措施的生产就绪代码模板，这些模板在整个AI生命周期中保护敏感数据，同时促进创新并维护对AI应用程序的信任。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Staying Ahead: Smart Strategies for Effective Vulnerability Management (SEC316)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 保持领先：有效漏洞管理的智能策略 (SEC316)
sessions.abstract: This session explores modern  vulnerability management strategies for cloud and development environments.  We'll demonstrate how to integrate automated scanning and continuous  monitoring for both AWS compute resources and Git code repositories. Learn  how to identify misconfigurations, unpatched software, and insecure code  dependencies before they become threats. Attendees will gain practical  insights into prioritizing and remediating vulnerabilities across  infrastructure and code, unifying security efforts from development to  deployment. Join us to discover actionable techniques for reducing risk and  strengthening your organization's security posture in today's dynamic,  cloud-native landscape.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨云和开发环境的现代漏洞管理策略。我们将演示如何为 AWS 计算资源和 Git 代码仓库集成自动化扫描和持续监控。了解如何在配置错误、未修补软件和不安全的代码依赖项成为威胁之前识别它们。与会者将获得关于跨基础设施和代码优先处理和修复漏洞的实用见解，统一从开发到部署的安全工作。加入我们，探索在当今动态的云原生环境中降低风险和加强组织安全态势的可行技术。

presenter.name: Anthony Verleysen
presenter.title: Sr. Product Manager Technical - External Services

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernize SQL Server & .NET Together with AWS Transform's New AI Agent (MAM340)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用AWS Transform的新AI代理共同现代化SQL Server和.NET (MAM340)
sessions.abstract: Want to cut your Microsoft licensing costs by up to 70% while modernizing SQL Server workloads? Join us to explore AWS Transform's groundbreaking new capability that automates end-to-end migration from SQL Server to Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL. Learn how this powerful solution converts your entire SQL Server stack - from schemas and stored procedures to embedded logic - while accelerating modernization timelines by up to 5x. In this session, we'll demonstrate how AWS Transform helps you achieve enhanced security, performance, and scalability through purpose-built AWS services, revolutionizing your database modernization journey.
sessions.abstract_cn: 想要将 Microsoft 许可成本降低高达 70% 并同时实现 SQL Server 工作负载的现代化吗?加入我们,探索 AWS Transform 的突破性新功能,该功能可自动化完成从 SQL Server 到 Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL 的端到端迁移。了解这一强大解决方案如何转换您的整个 SQL Server 堆栈——从架构和存储过程到嵌入式逻辑——同时将现代化时间表加速高达 5 倍。在本次会议中,我们将演示 AWS Transform 如何通过专门构建的 AWS 服务帮助您实现增强的安全性、性能和可扩展性,彻底改变您的数据库现代化之旅。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Go-to-market in today's political climate: a policy and AWS Marketplace overview
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 当前政治环境下的市场进入策略：政策与 AWS Marketplace 概述
sessions.abstract: Discover how open source projects can transform into profitable businesses through managed services and AI agents, leveraging AWS Global Startup Program support for technical and go-to-market success.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解开源项目如何通过托管服务和AI代理转变为盈利业务,利用AWS全球初创企业计划支持实现技术和市场推广成功。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Metrics to Management: Practical Observability on EKS (DEV202)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从指标到管理：EKS 上的实用可观测性 (DEV202)
sessions.abstract: This talk shows how to bake observability into Amazon EKS so you can see exactly how each deployment impacts your SLOs. I’ll cover setting up Prometheus and Grafana, cutting noise with smarter instrumentation, and turning metrics into release decisions. You’ll leave with configs and patterns you can drop straight into your own clusters using best practice.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本讲座展示了如何将可观测性融入 Amazon EKS，以便您能够准确了解每次部署对 SLO 的影响。我将介绍如何设置 Prometheus 和 Grafana，通过更智能的监控手段减少噪音，以及将指标转化为发布决策。您将获得可以直接应用到自己集群中的配置和模式，这些都遵循最佳实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Integration patterns for distributed systems (API315)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 分布式系统的集成模式 (API315)
sessions.abstract: Today's applications are interconnected: they expose APIs, publish events, call third-party services, and externalize states. They must therefore address the fundamental challenges of distributed systems, such as out-of-order delivery, retries, idempotence, and partial failures. To address these challenges, architects must carefully evaluate integration options while considering how to manage complex system interactions. In this session, learn about common design trade-offs for distributed systems and how to navigate them with design patterns, illustrated by examples.
sessions.abstract_cn: 当今的应用程序是相互连接的：它们公开API、发布事件、调用第三方服务并外部化状态。因此，它们必须解决分布式系统的基本挑战，例如乱序交付、重试、幂等性和部分故障。为了应对这些挑战，架构师必须仔细评估集成选项，同时考虑如何管理复杂的系统交互。在本次会议中，了解分布式系统的常见设计权衡以及如何通过设计模式来应对这些权衡，并通过示例进行说明。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Aurora DSQL: A developer's perspective  (DAT401)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Aurora DSQL：开发者视角 (DAT401)
sessions.abstract: In this live coding session, we'll show you how to work with Amazon Aurora DSQL from a developer's perspective. We'll develop a sample application to highlight some of the ways developing for Aurora DSQL is different than PostgreSQL. We'll cover authentication and connection management, optimistic concurrency transaction patterns, primary key selection, analyzing query performance, and best practices.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次实时编码会议中，我们将从开发者的角度向您展示如何使用 Amazon Aurora DSQL。我们将开发一个示例应用程序，以突出显示为 Aurora DSQL 开发与 PostgreSQL 的一些不同之处。我们将涵盖身份验证和连接管理、乐观并发事务模式、主键选择、查询性能分析以及最佳实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From AI Promise to KPI Impact: Connected Agents & Orchestration (API204)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从AI承诺到KPI影响：互联代理与编排 (API204)
sessions.abstract:
Enterprise success hinges on KPIs buried in complex, cross-functional processes. Yet most AI agents today lack the enterprise context to deliver meaningful impact, leaving teams stuck playing defense.

With AI agents delivered through AWS Bedrock, Workato brings the orchestration and enterprise context required to turn promise into KPI impact. Capabilities like IDP, decision models, data pipeline workflows, enterprise MCP, and agentic collaboration unite on Workato’s platform—empowering context-powered agents that shift teams from defense to offense and drive measurable business outcomes. This presentation is brought to you by Workato, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn:
企业成功取决于隐藏在复杂跨职能流程中的KPI。然而，当今大多数AI代理缺乏企业上下文来产生有意义的影响，导致团队陷入被动防守。

通过AWS Bedrock交付的AI代理，Workato带来了将承诺转化为KPI影响所需的编排和企业上下文。IDP、决策模型、数据管道工作流、企业MCP和代理协作等功能在Workato平台上统一——赋能具有上下文能力的代理，使团队从防守转向进攻，并推动可衡量的业务成果。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Workato提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Digital sovereignty and data residency w/ AWS Hybrid and Edge services (HMC310)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过AWS混合云和边缘服务实现数字主权和数据驻留 (HMC310)
sessions.abstract: Countries around the world are increasingly introducing or updating data residency and digital sovereignty laws that require at least one copy, or sometimes all data, to be stored or processed in a specific geographic or sovereign location. This introduces new challenges for customers. This session explores how AWS services, including AWS Dedicated Local Zones, AWS Local Zones, and AWS Outposts can help with your digital sovereignty use cases. We’ll examine best practices for data residency, security controls, and operational consistency across deployments at the edge.
sessions.abstract_cn: 世界各国正在越来越多地引入或更新数据驻留和数字主权法律,这些法律要求至少一份副本,有时是所有数据,必须存储或处理在特定的地理位置或主权区域内。这给客户带来了新的挑战。本次会议探讨 AWS 服务,包括 AWS Dedicated Local Zones、AWS Local Zones 和 AWS Outposts,如何帮助您应对数字主权使用场景。我们将研究边缘部署中数据驻留、安全控制和运营一致性的最佳实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Personalize customer experiences at scale w/ AI-powered Amazon Connect (BIZ219)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用AI驱动的Amazon Connect大规模个性化客户体验 (BIZ219)
sessions.abstract: Customers today expect personalized and relevant service at every touchpoint in their journey. Join this session to hear from AWS and your peers how you can gain a 360-degree customer view with Amazon Connect - utilizing advanced analytics and AI-driven capabilities to centralize digital outbound campaigns, empower agents with unified experiences, and proactively engage customers. Walk away with insights on how to turn casual customers into passionate advocates through personalized interactions and streamlined operations.
sessions.abstract_cn: 当今客户期望在其旅程的每个触点都能获得个性化和相关的服务。加入本次会议，聆听AWS和您的同行分享如何通过Amazon Connect获得360度客户视图——利用高级分析和AI驱动的能力来集中管理数字化外呼活动，为座席提供统一的体验，并主动与客户互动。您将了解如何通过个性化互动和简化运营，将普通客户转变为热情的拥护者。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Architecting scalable and secure agentic AI with Bedrock AgentCore (AIM431)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Bedrock AgentCore 构建可扩展且安全的智能体 AI (AIM431)
sessions.abstract: Go deep into how AgentCore works under the hood. This technical deep-dive session breaks down the ReAct loop—how agents iteratively reason, plan, and perform tool calls to accomplish complex goals. Learn how context management, memory, and data grounding shape each reasoning step and response. Explore how AgentCore operationalizes this loop with modular services: Runtime for scalable execution, Gateway for dynamic tool and data access, Policy for deterministic controls, Observability for monitoring agent behavior, and Evaluations for continuous quality improvements. Understand how AgentCore’s architecture enables reliable, secure, and production-ready deployment of autonomous, data-driven AI agents.
sessions.abstract_cn: 深入探讨 AgentCore 的底层工作原理。本技术深度剖析会议将分解 ReAct 循环——代理如何迭代推理、规划并执行工具调用以完成复杂目标。了解上下文管理、内存和数据基础如何塑造每个推理步骤和响应。探索 AgentCore 如何通过模块化服务来操作此循环：Runtime 用于可扩展执行，Gateway 用于动态工具和数据访问，Policy 用于确定性控制，Observability 用于监控代理行为，以及 Evaluations 用于持续质量改进。理解 AgentCore 的架构如何实现可靠、安全且可用于生产环境的自主数据驱动型 AI 代理部署。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagining large-scale migration planning with agentic AI (MAM226)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用智能体AI重新构想大规模迁移规划 (MAM226)
sessions.abstract: Dive deep into strategies for planning your large-scale AWS migration. In this session, we'll explore how to use AWS Transform and AI agents to accelerate your discovery, assessment, and planning for large-scale migrations. We will show you how planning migrations in spreadsheets is a thing of the past and how AI agents remove the heavy manual work of curating discovery data, building a business case, and planning a migration.
sessions.abstract_cn: 深入探讨规划大规模 AWS 迁移的策略。在本次会议中，我们将探索如何使用 AWS Transform 和 AI 代理来加速大规模迁移的发现、评估和规划。我们将向您展示在电子表格中规划迁移已成为过去，以及 AI 代理如何消除整理发现数据、构建业务案例和规划迁移的繁重手动工作。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Binge-worthy: Netflix's journey to Amazon Aurora at scale (DAT322)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 值得狂看：Netflix大规模迁移至Amazon Aurora之旅 (DAT322)
sessions.abstract: In this session, learn how Netflix successfully orchestrated the migration of terabytes of mission-critical data across 100+ clusters to Amazon Aurora while ensuring continuous service for millions of global subscribers. Through a detailed examination of their innovative approach combining AWS Database Migration Service and Netflix's proprietary Data Streaming Platform, explore how they achieved near-zero downtime and maintained data integrity throughout this complex transition. Technical leaders will gain actionable insights into architecting similar migrations, managing risks, and leveraging AWS tools effectively. Join us to learn how Netflix's experience can inform your own database modernization strategy.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，了解 Netflix 如何成功编排跨 100 多个集群的 TB 级关键任务数据迁移至 Amazon Aurora，同时确保为全球数百万订阅者提供持续服务。通过详细剖析他们结合 AWS Database Migration Service 和 Netflix 专有数据流平台的创新方法，探索他们如何在这一复杂转型过程中实现近零停机时间并保持数据完整性。技术领导者将获得关于架构类似迁移、管理风险以及有效利用 AWS 工具的可行性洞察。加入我们，了解 Netflix 的经验如何为您自己的数据库现代化战略提供参考。

presenter.name: Vlad Vlasceanu
presenter.title: Sr. Principal SA, Database Tech Leader

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Tapping into the Power of Agentic AI: Driving Mission Success with NVIDIA & AWS
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 释放智能体AI的力量：携手NVIDIA与AWS推动任务成功
sessions.abstract: Step into the future of autonomous systems with NVIDIA Agentic AI, where intelligent agents aren't just reactive, they're proactive, collaborators. In this session, discover how NVIDIA is harnessing the power of accelerated computing to build, train, and deploy agentic AI systems that reason, plan, and adapt in complex environments. Whether optimizing logistics, enhancing decision support, or enabling real-time simulations in digital twins, these AI agents are transforming how government and industry operate at the edge and in the cloud. Join us for a deep dive into use cases, cutting-edge architectures, and the tools that make scalable, secure agentic AI a reality today. This presentation is brought to you by NVIDIA, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 踏入NVIDIA Agentic AI自主系统的未来，在这里智能代理不仅仅是被动响应，更是主动的协作者。在本次会议中，探索NVIDIA如何利用加速计算的力量来构建、训练和部署能够在复杂环境中进行推理、规划和适应的代理AI系统。无论是优化物流、增强决策支持，还是在数字孪生中实现实时模拟，这些AI代理正在改变政府和行业在边缘和云端的运营方式。加入我们，深入了解用例、前沿架构以及使可扩展、安全的代理AI成为现实的工具。本演示由AWS合作伙伴NVIDIA为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Nissan Accelerated Software-Defined Vehicle Development with AWS (IND382)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 日产如何利用AWS加速软件定义汽车开发 (IND382)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Nissan built a comprehensive SDV ecosystem and reduced software testing time by 75%, combining advanced software development environments, robust data platforms, and scalable EE architecture all powered by AWS. We'll explore how the implementation of AWS Generative AI capabilities, test automation, and custom engineering workbenches has enabled Nissan to decouple service development from vehicle development cycles, allowing for more frequent and agile service releases.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解日产如何构建全面的软件定义汽车(SDV)生态系统，并将软件测试时间缩短75%，结合先进的软件开发环境、强大的数据平台和可扩展的电子电气架构，全部由AWS提供支持。我们将探讨AWS生成式AI能力、测试自动化和定制工程工作台的实施如何使日产能够将服务开发与车辆开发周期解耦，从而实现更频繁和敏捷的服务发布。

presenter.name: Kazuo Kajimoto
presenter.title: Principal SA & Sr. Manager of BD

presenter.name: Kazuma Sugimoto
presenter.title: General Manager, Software Engineering Department, Software Defined Vehicle Engineering Division

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate building Serverless apps with Amazon Q and MCP servers (CNS373)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Q 和 MCP 服务器加速构建无服务器应用程序 (CNS373)
sessions.abstract: Experience the future of application development as we demonstrate how to transform a simple prompt into a fully functional serverless application. Watch live coding that showcases how to combine Amazon Q with AWS serverless services using MCP servers to create dynamic, scalable solutions. This session will demonstrate practical implementation techniques, architectural best practices, and how to accelerate development while maintaining production-ready quality.
sessions.abstract_cn: 体验应用程序开发的未来，我们将演示如何将简单的提示转换为功能完整的无服务器应用程序。观看实时编码，展示如何将 Amazon Q 与 AWS 无服务器服务结合使用 MCP 服务器来创建动态、可扩展的解决方案。本次会议将演示实用的实现技术、架构最佳实践，以及如何在保持生产就绪质量的同时加速开发。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Traeger accelerates contact center agent productivity with agentic AI (BIZ214)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Traeger利用智能体AI加速联络中心座席生产力 (BIZ214)
sessions.abstract: Looking to learn how to transform customer insights into exceptional customer service experiences? Join this session to hear how Traeger Grills uses AI-powered Amazon Connect to drive automation, enabling agents and supervisors to focus on the human aspects of customer service. Learn how the agentic AI capabilities of Amazon Connect can help you streamline contact center workflows and automate routine actions, all while keeping the service experience top of mind.
sessions.abstract_cn: 想了解如何将客户洞察转化为卓越的客户服务体验？请参加本次会议，了解 Traeger Grills 如何使用 AI 驱动的 Amazon Connect 实现自动化，使座席和主管能够专注于客户服务的人性化方面。了解 Amazon Connect 的智能体 AI 功能如何帮助您简化联络中心工作流程并自动执行日常操作，同时始终将服务体验放在首位。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernize managed file transfer workflows with event-driven SFTP (STG339)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过事件驱动的SFTP实现托管文件传输工作流现代化 (STG339)
sessions.abstract: Managing file transfers can come at a high cost as you maintain infrastructure, licensing, resources, and adherence to regulatory and business requirements. In this session, learn how AWS Transfer Family provides fully managed, highly available file transfers over protocols including SFTP, and how to implement this at scale using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with Terraform. Learn how enterprises have transformed their MFT infrastructure into an event-driven architecture to reduce operational overhead. Additionally, we'll dive into how you can leverage agentic AI to automate intelligent data pipelines to process and deliver incoming data while maintaining security and compliance.
sessions.abstract_cn: 管理文件传输可能会产生高昂的成本，因为您需要维护基础设施、许可证、资源以及遵守监管和业务要求。在本次会议中，了解 AWS Transfer Family 如何提供完全托管的、高可用的文件传输服务，支持包括 SFTP 在内的多种协议，以及如何使用 Terraform 基础设施即代码 (IaC) 大规模实施此服务。了解企业如何将其托管文件传输 (MFT) 基础设施转变为事件驱动架构，以减少运营开销。此外，我们还将深入探讨如何利用代理式 AI 自动化智能数据管道，以便在保持安全性和合规性的同时处理和交付传入数据。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Debug Lambda functions deployed in cloud like never before (CNS367)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 以前所未有的方式调试部署在云端的 Lambda 函数 (CNS367)
sessions.abstract: Discover AWS Lambda's groundbreaking remote debugging capability, allowing developers to debug functions deployed in AWS cloud from local IDE for the first time. Learn how to set breakpoints, step through code line-by-line, inspect variables, and analyze call stacks in live Lambda functions. Experience practical debugging techniques for complex serverless scenarios with minimal setup and performance impact. Whether you're new to Lambda or an experienced developer, this session will transform your debugging workflow, dramatically reducing troubleshooting time and improving development efficiency.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索 AWS Lambda 突破性的远程调试功能,让开发者首次能够从本地 IDE 调试部署在 AWS 云中的函数。学习如何在实时 Lambda 函数中设置断点、逐行单步执行代码、检查变量和分析调用堆栈。体验针对复杂无服务器场景的实用调试技术,只需最少的设置且对性能影响极小。无论您是 Lambda 新手还是经验丰富的开发者,本次会议都将改变您的调试工作流程,大幅缩短故障排除时间并提高开发效率。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Ripple: Building an intelligent, multi-agent system for 24/7 operations-IND3301
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Ripple：构建智能多代理系统实现全天候运营-IND3301
sessions.abstract: Financial institutions face challenges analyzing massive log volumes, requiring hours or days of manual review for critical incidents. Learn how Ripple is building an automated, multi-agent system using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and the Strands Agents framework to process 30-50GB of daily logs in minutes. Explore architectural patterns for integrating Amazon CloudWatch, AWS Lambda, Amazon S3, and Amazon OpenSearch to correlate log entries with codebase sections. Discover approaches for designing specialized agents that create conversational user interfaces for guided investigations. See how this system transforms blockchain operations and walk away with strategies for implementing a scalable foundation for building multi-agent applications.
sessions.abstract_cn: 金融机构在分析海量日志时面临挑战，对关键事件进行人工审查需要数小时甚至数天时间。了解 Ripple 如何使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 和 Strands Agents 框架构建自动化多代理系统，在几分钟内处理每天 30-50GB 的日志。探索集成 Amazon CloudWatch、AWS Lambda、Amazon S3 和 Amazon OpenSearch 的架构模式，将日志条目与代码库部分关联起来。了解设计专业化代理的方法，这些代理可创建对话式用户界面以进行引导式调查。了解该系统如何改变区块链运营，并掌握实施可扩展多代理应用程序基础架构的策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Performance engineering on Neuron: How to optimize your LLM with NKI (AIM414)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Neuron性能工程：如何使用NKI优化您的大语言模型 (AIM414)
sessions.abstract: Trying to eek out every ounce of performance of your LLM? Trying to speed up inference or understand what is going on inside a language model? In this session, you will learn how to profile a model on AWS purpose built accelerators and build a custom kernel to achieve better performance.
sessions.abstract_cn: 想要榨取LLM的每一分性能？想要加速推理或了解语言模型内部的运行机制？在本次会议中，您将学习如何在AWS专用加速器上对模型进行性能分析，并构建自定义内核以实现更好的性能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building at global scale: Engineering AWS expansion (ARC312)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 全球规模构建：AWS扩展工程 (ARC312)
sessions.abstract: Explore how AWS continually expands its global infrastructure through sophisticated software engineering. This session reveals the evolution of AWS's approach to building new infrastructure, from manual processes to today's automated systems. Examine how changing global landscapes and business needs have shaped our strategies. Learn about the design patterns, testing frameworks, and operational practices that enable AWS to accelerate regional expansion while maintaining high security and reliability across our global infrastructure. Gain insights into architecting for massive scale and global distribution.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索AWS如何通过先进的软件工程持续扩展其全球基础设施。本次会议揭示了AWS构建新基础设施方法的演变，从手动流程到当今的自动化系统。研究不断变化的全球格局和业务需求如何塑造我们的战略。了解使AWS能够加速区域扩展同时在全球基础设施中保持高安全性和可靠性的设计模式、测试框架和运营实践。深入了解大规模和全球分布式架构设计。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Maximizing customer outcomes: AWS Partner Led Customer Success (PEX106)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 最大化客户成果：AWS 合作伙伴主导的客户成功 (PEX106)
sessions.abstract: As customer needs become more sophisticated, especially with the increased adoption of AI, and the range of AWS services continues to expand, partners play an increasingly critical role in ensuring successful outcomes and value realization for our customers. Through our new Partner Led Customer Success initiatives, we're equipping you with the mechanisms needed to systematically drive value realization. Whether you're supporting customers in their early AI experiments or guiding large-scale deployments, this session will preview the actionable frameworks and best practices we will share to enhance your customer success capabilities and deliver lasting value in partnership with AWS.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着客户需求变得更加复杂，特别是随着AI采用率的提高，以及AWS服务范围的持续扩展，合作伙伴在确保客户成功实现预期成果和价值方面发挥着越来越关键的作用。通过我们新推出的合作伙伴主导客户成功计划，我们为您提供系统化推动价值实现所需的机制。无论您是在支持客户进行早期AI实验，还是指导大规模部署，本次会议都将预览我们将分享的可操作框架和最佳实践，以增强您的客户成功能力，并与AWS携手为客户提供持久价值。

presenter.name: Cynthia Starr
presenter.title: Sr Manager, Partner Led Customer Success

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - ServiceNow + AWS: The Enterprise Standard for AI-Driven Workflows (AIM283)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - ServiceNow + AWS:企业级AI驱动工作流的标准 (AIM283)
sessions.abstract: ServiceNow and AWS are redefining what’s possible when intelligence meets scale. Together, we deliver AI-driven workflows with built-in trust, compliance, and performance—on the cloud designed for the enterprise. See how ServiceNow’s AI Agent Fabric, Control Tower, and Vault integrate with AWS Bedrock, SageMaker, and Security Hub to create a foundation for governed, intelligent automation at scale. Real stories from DXC reveal how organizations accelerate innovation, cut costs, and build the future of work with ServiceNow and AWS. This presentation is brought to you by ServiceNow, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: ServiceNow 和 AWS 正在重新定义智能与规模结合的可能性。我们共同提供具有内置信任、合规性和性能的 AI 驱动工作流——基于为企业设计的云平台。了解 ServiceNow 的 AI Agent Fabric、Control Tower 和 Vault 如何与 AWS Bedrock、SageMaker 和 Security Hub 集成，为大规模的受治理智能自动化创建基础。来自 DXC 的真实案例揭示了组织如何通过 ServiceNow 和 AWS 加速创新、降低成本并构建未来的工作方式。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 ServiceNow 提供。

presenter.name: Courtney McShane
presenter.title: AVP, Global Head of AWS Business, ServiceNow

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Skill Builder: Product Launches and New Features (TNC107)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Skill Builder：产品发布和新功能 (TNC107)
sessions.abstract: Discover how AWS Skill Builder is transforming AWS Cloud learning! Learn about the new features we are launching as part of Skill Builder Next.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 AWS Skill Builder 如何改变 AWS 云学习！了解我们作为 Skill Builder Next 一部分推出的新功能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Human-Centric AI: Avoiding the High Cost of Getting It Wrong in IT (AIM205)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 以人为本的人工智能：避免在IT领域犯错的高昂代价 (AIM205)
sessions.abstract: AI isn’t a silver bullet — it’s a strategic investment for IT. To truly unlock its potential in reducing costs, easing burnout, and improving security, IT organizations should adopt AI thoughtfully, with people at the center of their approach. Done right, AI enhances teams and operations — it doesn’t replace them. Too often, hasty adoption leads to wasted time, broken trust, and poor outcomes. In this session, NinjaOne Field CTO Jeff Hunter explores the real costs of bad AI and outlines a smarter, human-centric path forward — one that integrates AI into everyday IT workflows to elevate teams and deliver stronger business outcomes. This presentation is brought to you by NinjaOne, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI并非万能解决方案——它是IT的战略投资。要真正释放其在降低成本、缓解倦怠和改善安全性方面的潜力,IT组织应该深思熟虑地采用AI,并将人员置于其方法的核心。如果做得正确,AI会增强团队和运营——而不是取代它们。仓促采用往往会导致时间浪费、信任破裂和糟糕的结果。在本次会议中,NinjaOne现场首席技术官Jeff Hunter探讨了糟糕AI的真实成本,并概述了一条更明智、以人为本的前进道路——将AI集成到日常IT工作流程中,以提升团队并实现更强的业务成果。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴NinjaOne提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From idea to impact: Harness AI agents and tools in AWS Marketplace (AIM3318)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从创意到影响：在 AWS Marketplace 中利用 AI 代理和工具 (AIM3318)
sessions.abstract: In this lightning talk we show practical approaches for integrating AI agents and tools into your existing workflows, helping you boost productivity and innovation. We review real-world examples from engineering, marketing, and other key business functions. You'll gain insights into how you can find and leverage ready-to-use third-party tools and agents to accelerate and streamline your AI initiatives.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在这次闪电演讲中，我们展示了将AI代理和工具集成到现有工作流程中的实用方法，帮助您提高生产力和创新能力。我们回顾了来自工程、营销和其他关键业务职能的实际案例。您将深入了解如何找到并利用现成的第三方工具和代理，以加速和简化您的AI计划。

presenter.name: Michael Levy
presenter.title: Principal Business Development Manager, AWS Marketplace

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cox Automotive's Blueprint for Agentic AI on Amazon Bedrock AgentCore (IND3329)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cox Automotive 在 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 上的代理式 AI 蓝图 (IND3329)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Cox Automotive scaled Agentic AI from experimentation to production in just one month using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and Strands. We'll share Cox's methodology for scaling Agentic AI, including reference architectures and governance frameworks that enable startup speed with enterprise controls. Discover how AgentCore primitives—runtime, identity, gateway, and memory—accelerated their journey. Hear directly from the implementation teams and leave with actionable frameworks, architectural patterns, and governance models to accelerate your organization's Agentic AI initiatives.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解Cox Automotive如何使用Amazon Bedrock AgentCore和Strands在短短一个月内将代理式AI从实验阶段扩展到生产环境。我们将分享Cox的代理式AI扩展方法论，包括参考架构和治理框架，这些框架能够在企业级控制下实现初创公司般的速度。探索AgentCore原语——运行时、身份、网关和内存——如何加速他们的旅程。直接听取实施团队的分享，并带走可操作的框架、架构模式和治理模型，以加速您组织的代理式AI计划。

presenter.name: Brian Lloyd-Newberry
presenter.title: AVP Architecture - Cox Automotive Technology Innovation Lab

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Long-Horizon Coding Agents: Complex Software Projects with Claude (AIM3316)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 长期编码代理：使用 Claude 完成复杂软件项目 (AIM3316)
sessions.abstract:
Vibe coding with AI to write functions & fix bugs? Table stakes. Building an agent that architects, implements, tests, and deploys a full application to AWS? That's fundamentally different.
This session explores design patterns that enable Claude on AWS Bedrock to achieve "escape velocity"—the ability to make sustained, autonomous progress toward production deployment. You'll learn Anthropic's core principles for building agents that can handle full-stack development tasks independently.
We'll cover two critical pattern areas. First, state and environment management: how agents orient themselves through scaffolding techniques, structured state management, and version control integration. Second, progress and quality control: incremental development patterns and self-verification loops that ensure reliable outputs.
See practical examples, understand failure modes, and learn strategies for building production agentic systems. This presentation is brought to you by Anthropic, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn:
用AI进行氛围编码来编写函数和修复错误？这只是基本功能。构建一个能够架构、实现、测试并将完整应用程序部署到AWS的智能体？这是根本性的不同。

本次会议探讨了使Claude在AWS Bedrock上实现"逃逸速度"的设计模式——即能够朝着生产部署目标持续自主推进的能力。您将学习Anthropic构建能够独立处理全栈开发任务的智能体的核心原则。

我们将涵盖两个关键模式领域。首先是状态和环境管理：智能体如何通过脚手架技术、结构化状态管理和版本控制集成来定位自身。其次是进度和质量控制：增量开发模式和自我验证循环，以确保可靠的输出。

了解实际示例，理解失败模式，并学习构建生产级智能体系统的策略。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Anthropic为您呈现。

presenter.name: Nadine Yasser
presenter.title: Member of Technical Staff - Applied AI

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Federal Fast Lane: Deploying Mission Technology at Commercial Speed(API101)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 联邦快车道：以商业速度部署任务技术(API101)
sessions.abstract: Commercial innovation thrives on agility – cloud-native platforms, rapid iteration, and user-first design. Federal missions, however, demand assurance: security, compliance, and deployment in complex environments. In this Lightning Talk, Jared Summers shares how agencies can leverage AWS and commercial-grade platforms to balance both speed and trust. They’ll outline strategies for scaling securely, navigating compliance hurdles, and accelerating adoption of AI and emerging technologies without compromising mission integrity. With real-world lessons from federal deployment, you’ll learn how to deliver innovation at commercial speed, mission-ready from day one. This presentation is brought to you by LMI, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 商业创新依赖于敏捷性——云原生平台、快速迭代和以用户为先的设计。然而，联邦任务需要保障：安全性、合规性以及在复杂环境中的部署。在本次闪电演讲中，Jared Summers 分享了政府机构如何利用 AWS 和商业级平台来平衡速度与信任。他们将概述安全扩展、应对合规障碍以及加速采用 AI 和新兴技术的策略，同时不损害任务完整性。通过联邦部署的实际经验，您将学习如何以商业速度交付创新，从第一天起就做好任务准备。本演讲由 AWS 合作伙伴 LMI 提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Closing the gap between speed and safety: shipping faster at scale (AIM259)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 缩小速度与安全之间的差距：大规模快速交付 (AIM259)
sessions.abstract: AI has enabled teams to ship software at an unprecedented rate, but safety around release practices hasn’t kept up. In this session, LaunchDarkly CEO Edith Harbaugh will explore how modern teams can use automated guardrails like progressive rollouts, real-time observability, and instant rollbacks to reduce release risks while shipping faster at scale. We’ll also highlight how these controls apply to AI-powered applications, where speed and safety are both critical. Edith will be joined by select LaunchDarkly customers to share how they’ve built cultures of velocity and confidence in software and AI delivery. This presentation is brought to you by LaunchDarkly, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI 使技术团队能够以前所未有的速度交付软件，但发布实践的安全性却未能跟上步伐。在本次会议中，LaunchDarkly 首席执行官 Edith Harbaugh 将探讨现代团队如何使用自动化护栏（如渐进式发布、实时可观测性和即时回滚）来降低发布风险，同时大规模加快交付速度。我们还将重点介绍这些控制措施如何应用于 AI 驱动的应用程序，在这些应用中，速度和安全性都至关重要。Edith 将与部分 LaunchDarkly 客户一起分享他们如何在软件和 AI 交付中建立速度与信心并重的文化。本演讲由 AWS 合作伙伴 LaunchDarkly 提供支持。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Fidelity: AWS Health & Support Data Pipelines to GenAI Actions (SPS318)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Fidelity：AWS Health 与 Support 数据管道到 GenAI 行动 (SPS318)
sessions.abstract: Transform high-volume AWS Health and Support data into strategic advantage. While AWS provides comprehensive data streams, the volume and complexity present challenges for teams managing thousands of applications. This session explores how Fidelity collaborated with AWS through CENTS (Cloud Events Notification Transport System), successfully ingesting AWS Health data using prescriptive guidance. We demonstrate event routing across thousands of accounts, then showcase adding Support data and Amazon Bedrock for intelligent automation. Learn how GenAI enables individualized guidance and aggregate synthesis, advancing from reactive monitoring to predictive AI-augmented operational excellence with proven strategies.
sessions.abstract_cn: 将大量 AWS Health 和 Support 数据转化为战略优势。虽然 AWS 提供了全面的数据流，但数据量和复杂性给管理数千个应用程序的团队带来了挑战。本次会议探讨了 Fidelity 如何通过 CENTS（云事件通知传输系统）与 AWS 合作，使用规范性指导成功摄取 AWS Health 数据。我们演示了跨数千个账户的事件路由，然后展示了如何添加 Support 数据和 Amazon Bedrock 以实现智能自动化。了解 GenAI 如何实现个性化指导和聚合综合，从被动监控推进到预测性 AI 增强的卓越运营，并提供经过验证的策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Live hallucination detection in prod with LaunchDarkly’s AI Configs (AIM258)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 LaunchDarkly 的 AI Configs 在生产环境中进行实时幻觉检测 (AIM258)
sessions.abstract: When bringing generative AI applications to production, accuracy is key. LaunchDarkly's AI Configs give you the flexibility to change your generative AI applications at runtime, so you can measure model performance more effectively in a real-world setting. In this session, we'll walk through a simplified RAG implementation of an insurance chatbot using an Amazon Bedrock knowledge base. You'll see a demo of how this chatbot uses LaunchDarkly AI Evals to detect hallucinations in production. We'll also cover how to collect metrics such as latency and cost, and discuss strategies for building guardrail logic directly into your runtime configuration. This presentation is brought to you by LaunchDarkly, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在将生成式AI应用投入生产时,准确性至关重要。LaunchDarkly的AI Configs为您提供了在运行时更改生成式AI应用的灵活性,使您能够在真实环境中更有效地衡量模型性能。在本次会议中,我们将演示一个使用Amazon Bedrock知识库的保险聊天机器人的简化RAG实现。您将看到该聊天机器人如何使用LaunchDarkly AI Evals在生产环境中检测幻觉的演示。我们还将介绍如何收集延迟和成本等指标,并讨论将护栏逻辑直接构建到运行时配置中的策略。本演示由AWS合作伙伴LaunchDarkly为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FINRA: Accelerate Massive Data Processing with NVIDIA on AWS EMR (AIM279)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FINRA：使用 NVIDIA 在 AWS EMR 上加速海量数据处理 (AIM279)
sessions.abstract: This session explores how NVIDIA GPU acceleration with Apache Spark on AWS EMR and AWS EMR on EKS (Kubernetes) can enhance the scalability, performance, and cost-efficiency of BigData analytics for financial market regulation.  Using industry standard benchmarks and FINRA’s workloads as a case study, we demonstrate improvements for next-generation ETL pipelines. Attendees will learn how FINRA, a leader in market data- driven fraud detection, leverages cutting-edge hardware and software to meet rising data volumes and strict business SLAs without linear cost growth. The talk presents quantitative results from benchmarking Spark GPU clusters against traditional CPU deployments. This presentation is brought to you by NVIDIA, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨了在 AWS EMR 和 AWS EMR on EKS（Kubernetes）上使用 NVIDIA GPU 加速 Apache Spark 如何提升金融市场监管领域大数据分析的可扩展性、性能和成本效益。我们以行业标准基准测试和 FINRA 的工作负载为案例研究，展示了下一代 ETL 管道的改进成果。与会者将了解作为市场数据驱动欺诈检测领域领导者的 FINRA，如何利用尖端硬件和软件来应对不断增长的数据量和严格的业务 SLA 要求，同时避免成本线性增长。本次演讲展示了 Spark GPU 集群与传统 CPU 部署对比的量化基准测试结果。本演讲由 AWS 合作伙伴 NVIDIA 提供支持。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Trigger to Execution: The Journey of Events in AWS Lambda (CNS423)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从触发到执行：AWS Lambda 中的事件之旅 (CNS423)
sessions.abstract: Dive deep into AWS Lambda's event processing ecosystem. We'll explore diverse event sources including queuing (SQS), streaming (Kinesis, DynamoDB Streams), and private sources (EventBridge Pipes, Kafka). Uncover Lambda's sophisticated message buffering and synchronous invocation mechanisms. Learn how Lambda ensures high availability through static stability and rapid AZ failover, and manages backpressure to prevent system overload. We'll examine Lambda destinations for advanced event routing and error handling. By mastering these concepts, you'll optimize your serverless architectures for reliability, performance, and scalability. Join us to unlock the full potential of event-driven computing with AWS Lambda, from trigger to execution and beyond.
sessions.abstract_cn: 深入探讨 AWS Lambda 的事件处理生态系统。我们将探索多样化的事件源，包括队列（SQS）、流式处理（Kinesis、DynamoDB Streams）以及私有源（EventBridge Pipes、Kafka）。揭示 Lambda 复杂的消息缓冲和同步调用机制。了解 Lambda 如何通过静态稳定性和快速可用区故障转移确保高可用性，以及如何管理背压以防止系统过载。我们将研究 Lambda 目标，用于高级事件路由和错误处理。通过掌握这些概念，您将优化无服务器架构的可靠性、性能和可扩展性。加入我们，释放 AWS Lambda 事件驱动计算的全部潜力，从触发到执行及更多。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Customer Insights: Scaling Real-World AI with AMD (CMP208)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 客户洞察：使用 AMD 扩展真实世界的 AI (CMP208)
sessions.abstract: Join a dynamic customer panel to hear how leading organizations are accelerating real-world AI workloads using AMD powered solutions on AWS. From generative AI and large language models to recommendation systems, panelists will share firsthand experiences deploying AMD’s latest technology in production. Learn how they’ve optimized performance, reduced costs, and scaled AI across their businesses. Whether you're exploring CPU-based inference or building next-gen platforms, this session offers practical insights and proven strategies from those already delivering results. This presentation is brought to you by AMD, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入一个充满活力的客户小组，了解领先组织如何使用 AWS 上由 AMD 驱动的解决方案加速实际 AI 工作负载。从生成式 AI 和大语言模型到推荐系统，小组成员将分享在生产环境中部署 AMD 最新技术的第一手经验。了解他们如何优化性能、降低成本并在业务中扩展 AI。无论您是在探索基于 CPU 的推理还是构建下一代平台，本次会议都将提供来自已经取得成果的实践者的实用见解和经过验证的策略。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 AMD 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Stripe: Revolutionizing compliance workflows w/ agentic infrastructure (IND3300)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Stripe: 通过智能体基础设施革新合规工作流程 (IND3300)
sessions.abstract: Financial services companies struggle to scale Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD) processes while maintaining quality as merchant volumes grow. Learn how Stripe revolutionized compliance operations by building Eddie (EDD Detective)—an AI agent built on Amazon Bedrock that automates complex merchant risk assessments, reducing case handling time by 70% and enabling analysts to review 3x more cases. Discover how they built reliability and observability into agent operations, handling thousands of investigations daily while ensuring accuracy of AI-generated insights. Explore architectural patterns for orchestrating multi-step workflows, implementing human-in-the-loop validation, and maintaining audit trails at scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 金融服务公司在商户数量增长的同时，难以在保持质量的前提下扩展强化尽职调查(EDD)流程。了解Stripe如何通过构建Eddie(EDD侦探)——一个基于Amazon Bedrock构建的AI代理——彻底改革合规运营，该代理可自动化复杂的商户风险评估，将案件处理时间缩短70%，使分析师能够审查3倍多的案件。探索他们如何在代理操作中构建可靠性和可观测性，每天处理数千项调查，同时确保AI生成洞察的准确性。探索用于编排多步骤工作流、实施人工参与验证以及大规模维护审计跟踪的架构模式。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Zero-Trust AI Agents with Okta, Auth0 and AWS (AIM249)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Okta、Auth0 和 AWS 构建零信任 AI 代理 (AIM249)
sessions.abstract: This session unveils Auth0 for AI Agents—a powerful solution enabling humans and non-human identities (NHI) to operate securely across AWS applications such as Bedrock and Quick Suite. Discover how Okta and Auth0 combine to empower agents with granular access controls and better user experiences. Through practical demos and real-world scenarios, we'll showcase how Auth0 for AI Agents leverages XAA (Cross App Access) and Model Context Protocol (MCP) to ensure secure collaboration within and across your AWS applications. Learn how to unlock the full potential of your agents with simplified identity management, robust security, organizational policies and user consent. This presentation is brought to you by Okta, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本次会议揭示了 Auth0 for AI Agents——一个强大的解决方案,使人类和非人类身份(NHI)能够在 AWS 应用程序(如 Bedrock 和 Quick Suite)中安全运行。了解 Okta 和 Auth0 如何结合,通过细粒度访问控制和更好的用户体验为代理赋能。通过实际演示和真实场景,我们将展示 Auth0 for AI Agents 如何利用 XAA(跨应用访问)和模型上下文协议(MCP)来确保在 AWS 应用程序内部和跨应用程序的安全协作。了解如何通过简化的身份管理、强大的安全性、组织策略和用户同意来释放代理的全部潜力。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Okta 提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Quantum Computing with Amazon Braket: From Exploration to Enterprise (CMP411)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Braket 进行量子计算：从探索到企业应用 (CMP411)
sessions.abstract: Join us to explore the emerging field of quantum computing through Amazon Braket. This session outlines AWS's quantum strategy and latest service capabilities, demonstrating how organizations can begin experimenting with quantum algorithms alongside classical computing workloads. Senior technical and business leaders will gain a clear understanding of current quantum capabilities, experimental approaches, and how future quantum computers will integrate with HPC systems.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们，通过 Amazon Braket 探索量子计算这一新兴领域。本次会议概述了 AWS 的量子战略和最新服务能力，演示组织如何开始在经典计算工作负载的同时试验量子算法。高级技术和业务领导者将清晰了解当前的量子能力、实验方法，以及未来量子计算机如何与高性能计算系统集成。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Driving Fan Engagement with Data, Analytics, & AI (SPF308)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过数据、分析和人工智能推动粉丝参与 (SPF308)
sessions.abstract: AWS partners with major entertainment, games, and sports organizations to transform how fans, viewers, and players experience their products. In this session, you will learn about how leading organizations such as the NFL, Formula 1, and other major sports leagues are using Amazon Bedrock, Amazon SageMaker, and open lakehouse architectures to create engaging experiences for their viewers. AWS will share architecture patterns and insights on how your organization can utilize AWS services to create new offerings and better engage fans around the world based on their preferences.
sessions.abstract_cn: AWS 与主要娱乐、游戏和体育组织合作，改变粉丝、观众和玩家体验其产品的方式。在本次会议中，您将了解 NFL、一级方程式赛车和其他主要体育联盟等领先组织如何使用 Amazon Bedrock、Amazon SageMaker 和开放湖仓架构为观众创造引人入胜的体验。AWS 将分享架构模式和见解，说明您的组织如何利用 AWS 服务根据全球粉丝的偏好创建新产品并更好地吸引他们。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-powered SaaS Observability using OpenSearch  (ISV313)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 OpenSearch 实现 AI 驱动的 SaaS 可观测性 (ISV313)
sessions.abstract: SaaS providers struggle with observability at scale, balancing costs, combining cross-tenant and single-tenant data, and surfacing actionable insights. In this code talk, learn how to build next-generation observability for your SaaS platform using semantic search, agent-led search, and other AI-powered techniques. We’ll dive deep on index mappings, ingestion flows, and query patterns, live coding a solution using Amazon OpenSearch Service.
sessions.abstract_cn: SaaS 提供商在大规模可观测性方面面临挑战,需要平衡成本、整合跨租户和单租户数据,并提供可操作的洞察。在本次代码讲座中,了解如何使用语义搜索、智能体引导搜索和其他 AI 驱动技术为您的 SaaS 平台构建下一代可观测性。我们将深入探讨索引映射、数据摄取流程和查询模式,并使用 Amazon OpenSearch Service 现场编写解决方案。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Move fast & don't break things: Maintaining software excellence as you adopt AI
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 快速行动且不破坏现状：在采用AI时保持软件卓越性
sessions.abstract: As engineering teams lean on AI assistants to write more code and automate more of the SDLC, new risks arise. Vulnerabilities, secret leaks, and quality regressions can creep in faster than humans can catch them. This talk explores how to prepare your organization for AI adoption by strengthening the engineering excellence foundations that matter in an AI-first world, like software ownership, testing, service catalogs, and vulnerability management. With the right culture and controls, teams can capture the speed of AI while preserving the security, reliability, and quality customers expect. This presentation is brought to you by Cortex, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着工程团队越来越依赖AI助手来编写更多代码和自动化更多软件开发生命周期流程,新的风险也随之出现。漏洞、密钥泄露和质量退化可能会以超过人类捕获速度的方式悄然出现。本次演讲探讨如何通过加强在AI优先世界中至关重要的工程卓越基础来为组织的AI采用做好准备,例如软件所有权、测试、服务目录和漏洞管理。通过正确的文化和控制措施,团队可以在保持客户期望的安全性、可靠性和质量的同时,获得AI带来的速度优势。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Cortex为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond Backup: Advancing Cloud Resiliency with Shared Responsibility (SEC205)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越备份：通过共同责任推进云韧性 (SEC205)
sessions.abstract: Under the shared responsibility model, you are responsible for security and protection of your cloud data – and that requires developing and maintaining a mature cyber resilience capability for your workloads. In this session, Pearl River Community College will share their experiences. We'll also cover how Cohesity’s AI-powered platform extends AWS-native protections to protect critical workloads, automate policy enforcement, and reduce recovery times. You’ll learn how to isolate backups from production accounts, detect attacks, and orchestrate near‑instant recovery across regions and clouds. Walk away with a blueprint for achieving resilience at a lower TCO than “backup‑only” approaches. This presentation is brought to you by Cohesity, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在共同责任模型下，您负责云数据的安全和保护——这需要为您的工作负载开发和维护成熟的网络韧性能力。在本次会议中，Pearl River Community College 将分享他们的经验。我们还将介绍 Cohesity 的 AI 驱动平台如何扩展 AWS 原生保护，以保护关键工作负载、自动执行策略并缩短恢复时间。您将了解如何将备份与生产账户隔离、检测攻击以及跨区域和云编排近乎即时的恢复。您将获得一个以低于"仅备份"方法的总体拥有成本实现韧性的蓝图。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Cohesity 提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Boost performance and reduce costs in Amazon Aurora and Amazon RDS (DAT312)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 提升 Amazon Aurora 和 Amazon RDS 的性能并降低成本 (DAT312)
sessions.abstract: In this session, explore Amazon Aurora and Amazon RDS cost components and learn important best practices that can help you improve the performance of your relational database workloads while reducing spend on cost components such as compute, storage, backup, and I/O. Learn about the latest performance monitoring features, which provide insights on how to efficiently track and optimize database performance at scale and help ensure that you’re maximizing efficiency while keeping costs under control.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，探索 Amazon Aurora 和 Amazon RDS 的成本组成部分，并学习重要的最佳实践，这些实践可以帮助您提高关系数据库工作负载的性能，同时降低计算、存储、备份和 I/O 等成本组成部分的支出。了解最新的性能监控功能，这些功能提供了如何大规模高效跟踪和优化数据库性能的洞察，并帮助确保您在控制成本的同时最大化效率。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Supercharge DevOps with AI-driven observability (DEV304)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用AI驱动的可观测性增强DevOps (DEV304)
sessions.abstract: Modern observability extends beyond logs and metrics to deliver understanding, context, and prediction. This session demonstrates how Generative AI transforms DevOps and SRE practices in CI/CD environments. Learn to build AI-enhanced observability systems using Amazon Bedrock and Amazon Q that automatically explain failures, correlate events, and provide predictive recommendations. Explore techniques for creating AI agents that simulate scenarios and stress-test architectures, enabling proactive insights with clear traceability. Attendees will gain practical knowledge to enhance their automation and incident response capabilities through AI-driven observability.
sessions.abstract_cn: 现代可观测性超越了日志和指标，提供理解、上下文和预测能力。本次会议演示了生成式AI如何在CI/CD环境中转变DevOps和SRE实践。学习使用Amazon Bedrock和Amazon Q构建AI增强的可观测性系统，自动解释故障、关联事件并提供预测性建议。探索创建AI代理的技术，模拟场景并对架构进行压力测试，通过清晰的可追溯性实现主动洞察。参会者将获得实用知识，通过AI驱动的可观测性增强其自动化和事件响应能力。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Teaching your AI tools custom languages and libraries (DVT341)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 教授你的 AI 工具自定义语言和库 (DVT341)
sessions.abstract: Enterprises often develop custom libraries, tools, and domain-specific languages to power their operations. Integrating these proprietary assets within your AI tools can be a challenge. In this talk, I will share how to use Kiro, an agentic AI tool, to understand and work with custom libraries. I'll demonstrate the power of combining steering files and Model Context Protocol to teach Kiro new skills, establish best practices, and keep its knowledge up-to-date. Attendees will learn a repeatable approach to empower their AI tools to seamlessly work with the specialized services that drive their business
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业通常会开发自定义库、工具和领域特定语言来支持其运营。将这些专有资产集成到您的AI工具中可能是一个挑战。在本次演讲中，我将分享如何使用Kiro这一智能体AI工具来理解和使用自定义库。我将演示如何结合引导文件和模型上下文协议来教会Kiro新技能、建立最佳实践并保持其知识的更新。与会者将学习一种可重复的方法，使他们的AI工具能够无缝地使用驱动其业务的专业化服务。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) for AWS (DVT202)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 的持续集成和持续交付 (CI/CD) (DVT202)
sessions.abstract: AWS provides one place where you can plan work, collaborate on code, and build, test, and deploy applications with continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) tools. In this session, learn about creating complete CI/CD pipelines using infrastructure as code on AWS.
sessions.abstract_cn: AWS 提供了一个统一的平台，您可以在其中规划工作、协作编写代码，并使用持续集成和持续交付 (CI/CD) 工具来构建、测试和部署应用程序。在本次会议中，您将了解如何在 AWS 上使用基础设施即代码创建完整的 CI/CD 管道。

presenter.name: Steve Rice
presenter.title: General Manager, AWS AppConfig & Parameter Store

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reinventing software development with AI agents (INV205)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 用AI代理重塑软件开发 (INV205)
sessions.abstract: The rise of AI coding and autonomous agents is transforming how developers work - enhancing productivity, improving flow state, and making development more intuitive. While simple code completion tools have existed for years, today's agentic capabilities act as collaborative partners throughout the entire development lifecycle. Through real-world examples, we'll show how these AI tools and autonomous agents bring structure and engineering maturity to development, turning prototypes into production-ready applications while keeping developers in control. You'll learn how leading teams are using these capabilities to accelerate development cycles, reduce cognitive overhead, and focus on solving meaningful problems - fundamentally changing how we build software.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI 编码和自主代理的兴起正在改变开发人员的工作方式——提高生产力、改善心流状态并使开发更加直观。虽然简单的代码补全工具已经存在多年，但当今的代理能力在整个开发生命周期中充当协作伙伴。通过实际案例，我们将展示这些 AI 工具和自主代理如何为开发带来结构化和工程成熟度，将原型转变为生产就绪的应用程序，同时让开发人员保持控制权。您将了解领先团队如何使用这些能力来加速开发周期、减少认知负担并专注于解决有意义的问题——从根本上改变我们构建软件的方式。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The path to Multimodal Artificial General Intelligence (STP102)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通往多模态通用人工智能之路 (STP102)
sessions.abstract: The evolution toward AGI isn't happening in text alone. It's unfolding across vision, motion, and understanding of our physical world. Drawing on Luma AI's Ray3 video generation model, we'll demonstrate how AI is creating coherent, physically plausible video content that's transforming industries from e-commerce and entertainment to brand marketing, advertising, and gaming. Through concrete use cases, we'll explore live deployments solving real business challenges: scaling creative asset production for retail, reimagining film and television workflows, and transforming agency operations. Whether you're building enterprise AI applications or planning your AI strategy, join us to see where multimodal AI is today and where we're heading tomorrow.
sessions.abstract_cn: 通向AGI的演进不仅仅发生在文本领域，它正在视觉、运动和对物理世界的理解等多个维度展开。借助Luma AI的Ray3视频生成模型，我们将展示AI如何创建连贯且符合物理规律的视频内容，这正在改变从电子商务、娱乐到品牌营销、广告和游戏等各个行业。通过具体的应用案例，我们将探讨正在解决实际业务挑战的实时部署：为零售业扩展创意资产生产、重新构想影视工作流程，以及转型代理机构运营。无论您是在构建企业AI应用还是规划AI战略，欢迎加入我们，了解多模态AI的现状以及未来发展方向。

presenter.name: Jason Levin
presenter.title: Director of Partnerships and Business Development

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Observability for Reliable Agentic AI with Strands SDK & OpenTelemetry (NTA406)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Strands SDK 和 OpenTelemetry 实现可靠的智能体 AI 可观测性 (NTA406)
sessions.abstract: Reliable agentic AI requires robust observability. In this hands-on session, learn how to instrument and monitor AI systems using OpenTelemetry with AWS native tools and open-source solutions. Explore real-world implementations using Strands SDK, diagnostic methodologies for typical use cases, and strategies for continuous improvement. Join us for a gamified experience troubleshooting an agentic application, and leave with practical skills to implement observability at scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 可靠的智能体 AI 需要强大的可观测性。在本动手实践课程中，学习如何使用 OpenTelemetry 结合 AWS 原生工具和开源解决方案来检测和监控 AI 系统。探索使用 Strands SDK 的实际实现、典型用例的诊断方法以及持续改进策略。加入我们的游戏化体验，对智能体应用程序进行故障排除，并掌握大规模实施可观测性的实用技能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale agent tools with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway (AIM3313)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway 扩展代理工具 (AIM3313)
sessions.abstract: Discover how to build powerful AI agents using Amazon Bedrock's suite of tools, with a focus on Amazon Bedrock AgentCore. This session explores AI agent architectures, from implementing Bedrock Flows to configuring knowledge bases and guardrails. Learn to design dynamic inline agents and understand multi-agent collaboration frameworks. We'll demonstrate how AgentCore's modular components enable you to create secure, enterprise-ready AI solutions that scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何使用 Amazon Bedrock 的工具套件构建强大的 AI 代理，重点关注 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore。本课程探讨 AI 代理架构，从实现 Bedrock Flows 到配置知识库和护栏。学习设计动态内联代理并理解多代理协作框架。我们将演示 AgentCore 的模块化组件如何帮助您创建安全、企业级且可扩展的 AI 解决方案。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Sustainable and cost-efficient generative AI with agentic workflows (AIM333)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过智能体工作流实现可持续且经济高效的生成式人工智能 (AIM333)
sessions.abstract: Building sustainable, cost-effective generative AI on AWS requires integrating agentic AI, efficient architecture, and cloud-native optimization. Agentic systems using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore employ contextual memory, asynchronous execution, and on-demand tool invocation to minimize compute waste. MCP enables secure connections between AI agents, AWS services, and custom tools. Efficiency increases through AWS's Trainium and Inferentia2 silicon (50% better performance per watt), Amazon SageMaker for scalable development, and optimization techniques like quantization and speculative decoding. Auto-scaling, batch processing, and spot instances prevent over-provisioning. Combined with CloudWatch and Cost Explorer monitoring, this approach delivers high-performance, low-carbon generative AI solutions.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在AWS上构建可持续、经济高效的生成式AI需要整合智能体AI、高效架构和云原生优化。使用Amazon Bedrock AgentCore的智能体系统采用上下文记忆、异步执行和按需工具调用来最小化计算浪费。MCP实现AI智能体、AWS服务和自定义工具之间的安全连接。通过AWS的Trainium和Inferentia2芯片（每瓦性能提升50%）、用于可扩展开发的Amazon SageMaker，以及量化和推测解码等优化技术来提高效率。自动扩展、批处理和竞价实例可防止过度配置。结合CloudWatch和Cost Explorer监控，这种方法可提供高性能、低碳的生成式AI解决方案。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Deep dive into Amazon Aurora and its innovations (DAT441)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 深入探讨 Amazon Aurora 及其创新技术 (DAT441)
sessions.abstract: With an innovative architecture that decouples compute from storage and advanced features like Amazon Aurora Global Database and low-latency read replicas, Aurora reimagines what it means to be a relational database. Aurora is a built-for-the-cloud, serverless relational database service that delivers unparalleled performance and availability at global scale for MySQL,  PostgreSQL, and DSQL. In this session, dive deep into new features – and Aurora’s most popular offerings including serverless, I/O-Optimized, zero-ETL integrations, MCP integration, and generative AI support for vector search and storage. Also learn about the groundbreaking Aurora DSQL engine.
sessions.abstract_cn: 凭借将计算与存储解耦的创新架构以及 Amazon Aurora Global Database 和低延迟只读副本等高级功能，Aurora 重新定义了关系数据库的意义。Aurora 是一款为云而生的无服务器关系数据库服务，为 MySQL、PostgreSQL 和 DSQL 提供无与伦比的性能和全球规模的可用性。在本次会议中，深入探讨新功能以及 Aurora 最受欢迎的产品，包括无服务器、I/O 优化、零 ETL 集成、MCP 集成以及对向量搜索和存储的生成式 AI 支持。同时了解突破性的 Aurora DSQL 引擎。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Using Strands Agents to build autonomous, self-improving AI agents (AIM426)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Strands Agents 构建自主的、自我改进的 AI 代理 (AIM426)
sessions.abstract: Explore the cutting edge of AI with Strands Agents—autonomous systems that evolve and learn continuously. We'll demonstrate advanced agents that can identify knowledge gaps, self-modify reasoning strategies, and dynamically build tools. These systems learn from interactions, improving decision-making without human intervention while communicating through multiple protocols and real-time, bi-directional streaming. Using Strands' model-driven approach, agents operate independently for extended periods, continuously enhancing effectiveness. Through real-world examples, see how self-improving agents have transformed business processes by adapting to changing requirements automatically. Join us to challenge conventional thinking about agent limitations and reshape your approach to building truly autonomous AI systems.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索AI前沿技术Strands Agents——能够持续进化和学习的自主系统。我们将展示能够识别知识缺口、自我修改推理策略并动态构建工具的高级智能体。这些系统从交互中学习,在无需人工干预的情况下改进决策能力,同时通过多种协议和实时双向流进行通信。采用Strands的模型驱动方法,智能体可以长时间独立运行,持续提升效能。通过实际案例,了解自我改进的智能体如何通过自动适应不断变化的需求来转变业务流程。加入我们,挑战关于智能体局限性的传统思维,重塑您构建真正自主AI系统的方法。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-Tee Off the Future: How Technology Is Transforming Golf & Fan Engagement-SPF101
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-开球未来:技术如何变革高尔夫与粉丝互动-SPF101
sessions.abstract:
Explore how the PGA TOUR is reshaping the sport through advanced performance tracking, immersive broadcast enhancements, and data-driven storytelling that meets evolving fan expectations. Today's golf audiences demand more than passive viewing—they seek personalized experiences, deeper insights, and year-round digital connections. Discover how innovations in cloud computing, analytics, and AI are changing player performance analysis, tournament presentation, and interactive fan engagement. Learn how organizations are leveraging technology to deliver what modern audiences expect: real-time data, customized content, and immersive experiences that bring fans closer to the game.

Let’s examine the shifts in fan behavior and consumption patterns, revealing how the TOUR uses technology to create new touchpoints and deeper connections, embracing golf's digital future.
sessions.abstract_cn:
探索PGA巡回赛如何通过先进的性能追踪、沉浸式转播增强和数据驱动的叙事来重塑这项运动,以满足不断变化的球迷期望。当今的高尔夫观众不再满足于被动观看——他们寻求个性化体验、更深入的洞察和全年的数字化连接。了解云计算、分析和人工智能方面的创新如何改变球员表现分析、锦标赛呈现和互动球迷参与。了解各组织如何利用技术提供现代观众所期望的内容:实时数据、定制化内容以及让球迷更贴近比赛的沉浸式体验。

让我们审视球迷行为和消费模式的转变,揭示巡回赛如何使用技术创造新的触点和更深层次的连接,拥抱高尔夫的数字化未来。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS ProServe's Game-Changing Partnership with Sports Customers (SPF205)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS ProServe 与体育客户的颠覆性合作伙伴关系 (SPF205)
sessions.abstract: Discover how AWS Professional Services helps sports media companies revolutionize fan engagement through innovative audio data analysis solutions. Learn how we tackle the challenges of implementing scalable audio processing architectures while maintaining real-time performance and cost efficiency. This session reveals our strategies for serverless architecture excellence, AI/ML integration, and accelerated innovation cycles. Perfect for technical leaders seeking insights into transforming media workflows through AWS expertise. Key Takeaways: Serverless audio processing strategies for sports media • AI/ML techniques for automated content detection • Real-world fan engagement transformation examples
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解AWS专业服务如何通过创新的音频数据分析解决方案帮助体育媒体公司彻底改变粉丝互动体验。了解我们如何应对实施可扩展音频处理架构的挑战，同时保持实时性能和成本效益。本次会议揭示了我们在无服务器架构卓越性、AI/ML集成和加速创新周期方面的策略。非常适合希望通过AWS专业知识深入了解媒体工作流程转型的技术领导者。主要收获：体育媒体的无服务器音频处理策略 • 用于自动内容检测的AI/ML技术 • 真实的粉丝互动转型案例

presenter.name: Abhisek Rath
presenter.title: Principal ProServe Account Executive (AWSI Media and Entertainment)

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - PostgreSQL performance: Real-world workload tuning (DAT410)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - PostgreSQL性能：真实工作负载调优 (DAT410)
sessions.abstract: PostgreSQL performance isn’t magic—it’s engineering. In this code talk, we dive deep into practical tuning techniques to avoid common pitfalls that silently degrade performance by improving an underperforming PostgreSQL database workload. Learn how excessive indexes hurt write throughput, why HOT updates fail, and how vacuum behavior can stall your system. We’ll demonstrate how to use Query Plan Management (QPM) and pg_hint_plan for plan stability and decode wait events to uncover hidden bottlenecks. With real SQL examples and system insights, this session equips you to tune PostgreSQL for predictable, high-performance workloads.
sessions.abstract_cn: PostgreSQL 性能优化并非魔法，而是工程实践。在本次代码讲座中，我们将深入探讨实用的调优技术，通过改进性能不佳的 PostgreSQL 数据库工作负载来避免悄无声息地降低性能的常见陷阱。了解过多索引如何损害写入吞吐量、HOT 更新为何失败，以及 vacuum 行为如何使系统停滞。我们将演示如何使用查询计划管理（QPM）和 pg_hint_plan 实现计划稳定性，并解码等待事件以发现隐藏的瓶颈。通过真实的 SQL 示例和系统洞察，本次会议将帮助您调优 PostgreSQL，实现可预测的高性能工作负载。

presenter.name: Vlad Vlasceanu
presenter.title: Sr. Principal SA, Database Tech Leader

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Everything you've wanted to know about performance on EC2 instances  (CMP405)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 关于EC2实例性能你想知道的一切 (CMP405)
sessions.abstract: Getting the best compute performance is a bit of an art, and knowing about low level details can help a lot. This code talk covers all the details you've always wanted to know about, such as memory topology, how to get access to hardware counters, how to take into account the side-effects of hyperthreading, and how to properly run performance tests and optimize your latency.
sessions.abstract_cn: 获取最佳计算性能是一门艺术，了解底层细节可以提供很大帮助。本次技术讲座涵盖了您一直想了解的所有细节，例如内存拓扑、如何访问硬件计数器、如何考虑超线程的副作用，以及如何正确运行性能测试和优化延迟。

presenter.name: Seth Fox
presenter.title: Head of Solutions Architecture Amazon EC2

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Moody’s: Architecting a multi-agent system on AWS (IND3303)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 穆迪：在AWS上架构多智能体系统 (IND3303)
sessions.abstract: Agentic AI is revolutionizing businesses by enabling autonomous reasoning and decision making to accomplish complex tasks. To deploy these agentic AI workloads, organizations need a foundation that is scalable, cost-efficient, and portable. In this builders session, discover how to deploy scalable multi-agent AI systems on Amazon EKS. You will learn how to configure multi-agent communication using the A2A (Agent2Agent) protocol. By the end, you’ll have practical experience running multi-agent AI applications on Amazon EKS.
sessions.abstract_cn: 代理式AI正在通过实现自主推理和决策来完成复杂任务，从而彻底改变企业运营方式。为了部署这些代理式AI工作负载，组织需要一个可扩展、成本高效且可移植的基础架构。在本次构建者会议中，您将了解如何在Amazon EKS上部署可扩展的多代理AI系统。您将学习如何使用A2A（Agent2Agent）协议配置多代理通信。课程结束时，您将获得在Amazon EKS上运行多代理AI应用程序的实践经验。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS infrastructure as code: A year in review (DVT203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 基础设施即代码：年度回顾 (DVT203)
sessions.abstract: AWS provides services that enable the creation, deployment and maintenance of application infrastructure in a programmatic, descriptive, and declarative way. These services provide rigor, clarity, and reliability to application development. Join this session to learn about the new features and improvements for AWS infrastructure as code with AWS CloudFormation and AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK) and discover how they can benefit your team.
sessions.abstract_cn: AWS 提供的服务能够以编程化、描述性和声明式的方式创建、部署和维护应用程序基础设施。这些服务为应用程序开发提供了严谨性、清晰性和可靠性。参加本次会议，了解 AWS CloudFormation 和 AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK) 基础设施即代码的新功能和改进，并探索它们如何使您的团队受益。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Simplify connectivity from remote sites - updates and eero integration (NET337)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 简化远程站点连接 - 更新和eero集成 (NET337)
sessions.abstract: Learn how AWS is simplifying enterprise connectivity for remote sites and distributed workforces. In this session, dive deep into latest innovations in AWS Site-to-Site VPN, showcasing how enterprises can establish secure and reliable connections from remote locations to their AWS workloads. Learn about the exciting collaboration between eero and AWS that's transforming remote site management with one-click integrations into services like AWS Site-to-Site VPN, AWS Transit Gateway, and AWS Cloud WAN. Discover how this solution delivers a centralized, intuitive management interface that eliminates the complexity of traditional network infrastructure while maintaining enterprise-grade security and performance.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解AWS如何为远程站点和分布式员工简化企业连接。在本次会议中，深入探讨AWS Site-to-Site VPN的最新创新，展示企业如何从远程位置建立到其AWS工作负载的安全可靠连接。了解eero与AWS之间激动人心的合作，该合作通过一键集成AWS Site-to-Site VPN、AWS Transit Gateway和AWS Cloud WAN等服务，正在改变远程站点管理。探索此解决方案如何提供集中式、直观的管理界面，在保持企业级安全性和性能的同时消除传统网络基础设施的复杂性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - BCC: Hybrid architecture for generative AI to meet regulatory needs (HMC324)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - BCC：满足监管需求的生成式AI混合架构 (HMC324)
sessions.abstract: Bank CenterCredit (BCC), a leading bank in Kazakhstan, developed the first secure, scalable hybrid architecture for generative AI tailored to meet Kazakhstan’s financial data regulations in Central Asia. Leveraging AWS Outposts and AWS KMS, the bank was able to locally store and anonymize sensitive data before sending it to the parent AWS Region for encrypted processing. This architecture created a solid foundation for multiple generative AI projects delivered with Amazon SageMaker and Amazon Bedrock. Use cases include a custom speech recognition model in Russian, Kazakh, and mixed languages and an HR chatbot. Join this session to learn how the hybrid cloud architecture enabled regulatory compliance, cost savings, and operational efficiency—positioning BCC for continued innovation and growth.
sessions.abstract_cn: 哈萨克斯坦领先银行 Bank CenterCredit (BCC) 开发了首个安全、可扩展的生成式 AI 混合架构,专门满足哈萨克斯坦在中亚地区的金融数据法规要求。通过利用 AWS Outposts 和 AWS KMS,该银行能够在本地存储和匿名化敏感数据,然后将其发送到父 AWS 区域进行加密处理。这一架构为使用 Amazon SageMaker 和 Amazon Bedrock 交付的多个生成式 AI 项目奠定了坚实基础。应用案例包括支持俄语、哈萨克语和混合语言的定制语音识别模型,以及 HR 聊天机器人。参加本次会议,了解混合云架构如何实现合规性、成本节约和运营效率,为 BCC 的持续创新和增长奠定基础。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Supercharge ML and Inference on Apple Silicon with EC2 Mac (CMP346)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 EC2 Mac 在 Apple Silicon 上增强机器学习和推理能力 (CMP346)
sessions.abstract: Take your machine learning workflows to the next level with EC2 Mac instances powered by Apple silicon. In this session, learn how to accelerate inference by tapping into the Apple Neural Engine (ANE) and Core ML framework. Discover how to efficiently deploy PyTorch and TensorFlow models, optimize for performance on M-series chips, and reduce development and operational costs. Whether you're building for iOS or scaling cloud-native ML, this session offers practical guidance for unlocking the full ML potential of Apple silicon—right from the cloud.
sessions.abstract_cn: 通过搭载 Apple 芯片的 EC2 Mac 实例将您的机器学习工作流提升到新的水平。在本次会议中，了解如何利用 Apple Neural Engine (ANE) 和 Core ML 框架加速推理。探索如何高效部署 PyTorch 和 TensorFlow 模型，针对 M 系列芯片优化性能，并降低开发和运营成本。无论您是为 iOS 构建应用还是扩展云原生机器学习，本次会议都将提供实用指导，帮助您充分发挥 Apple 芯片的机器学习潜力——直接从云端实现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Version lifecycle management at scale with AWS Health (SPS326)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Health 进行大规模版本生命周期管理 (SPS326)
sessions.abstract: Discover how organizations manage critical lifecycle events including EKS Kubernetes version upgrades and RDS Aurora database updates using AWS Health and ITSM tools. Learn proven strategies for managing these changes at scale, from early detection to change completion. Through customer success stories, see how enterprises have reduced upgrade-related running costs by 60% using the AWS Health toolkit for cluster and database updates. We'll showcase new ITSM integrations with AWS Health, featuring automated change request routing and escalation management for version-critical resources. Join us to define your new organization-wide strategy for version change enablement.
