sessions.abstract_cn: 了解组织如何使用 AWS Health 和 ITSM 工具管理关键生命周期事件，包括 EKS Kubernetes 版本升级和 RDS Aurora 数据库更新。学习大规模管理这些变更的成熟策略，从早期检测到变更完成。通过客户成功案例，了解企业如何使用 AWS Health 工具包进行集群和数据库更新，将升级相关的运行成本降低 60%。我们将展示 AWS Health 与 ITSM 的新集成功能，包括针对版本关键资源的自动化变更请求路由和升级管理。加入我们，为您的组织制定全新的版本变更启用策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Private and secure web browser-based access to your data in S3 (STG220)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过基于Web浏览器的私有安全访问方式访问S3中的数据 (STG220)
sessions.abstract: Learn how AWS Transfer Family web apps provide a no-code, fully managed solution that enables non-technical users to securely access and share data stored in Amazon S3. We'll explore how this browser-based interface simplifies file transfers for your workforce, partners, and customers—no client software required. We'll also highlight our newest feature: VPC endpoint support for private access, further enhancing security controls. Whether you're modernizing legacy file transfer systems, centralizing data sharing across your organization, or building secure collaboration workflows with external partners, you'll learn how Transfer Family web apps can simplify secure file access while maintaining enterprise-grade security.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 AWS Transfer Family Web 应用程序如何提供无代码、完全托管的解决方案，使非技术用户能够安全地访问和共享存储在 Amazon S3 中的数据。我们将探讨这个基于浏览器的界面如何为您的员工、合作伙伴和客户简化文件传输——无需客户端软件。我们还将重点介绍我们的最新功能：VPC 终端节点支持私有访问，进一步增强安全控制。无论您是在现代化传统文件传输系统、集中组织内的数据共享，还是与外部合作伙伴构建安全的协作工作流程，您都将了解 Transfer Family Web 应用程序如何在保持企业级安全性的同时简化安全文件访问。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-PwC & BMO: AI-Powered Finance Transformation -From Reporting to Treasury Insights
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-普华永道与蒙特利尔银行：人工智能驱动的财务转型——从报告到资金管理洞察
sessions.abstract: Join PwC and BMO for a live dive into BMO's Risk and Finance AI journey, where a core team harnesses cutting-edge technology to revolutionize financial operations and reporting. Early builds leveraged AWS Bedrock to automate financial narrative generation and content creation, transforming complex management discussions into clear, decision-ready insights. As the program evolved, new capabilities emerged: intelligent meeting documentation and summarization, and generative AI that analyzes and recommends enhancements to treasury risk modeling. Attendees will discover how continuous model evolution can be monitored, tracked, and governed, enabling accelerated decision-making, enhanced risk transparency, and actionable strategies for financial institutions embracing AI-driven transformation today. This presentation is brought to you by PwC, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入普华永道和BMO，深入了解BMO的风险与财务AI之旅，核心团队利用尖端技术彻底改革财务运营和报告。早期构建利用AWS Bedrock自动化财务叙述生成和内容创建，将复杂的管理讨论转化为清晰、可供决策的洞察。随着项目的发展，新功能不断涌现：智能会议文档和摘要生成，以及分析并推荐增强库务风险建模的生成式AI。与会者将了解如何监控、跟踪和治理持续的模型演进，从而加速决策制定、增强风险透明度，并为当今拥抱AI驱动转型的金融机构提供可行的策略。本演示由AWS合作伙伴普华永道呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Zoox: Building Machine Learning Infrastructure for Autonomous Vehicles (AMZ304)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Zoox：为自动驾驶车辆构建机器学习基础设施 (AMZ304)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Zoox leverages AWS Machine Learning infrastructure to revolutionize autonomous vehicle development. Learn how we process thousands of multi-modal sequences daily using Amazon SageMaker HyperPod, SLURM, FSx, S3, and EKS in a streamlined machine learning environment that supports both rapid experimentation and production-scale training. We'll share how our integrated monitoring solution reduced manual analysis by 85% while scaling to support thousands of vehicle analysis use cases.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Zoox 如何利用 AWS 机器学习基础设施革新自动驾驶车辆开发。了解我们如何使用 Amazon SageMaker HyperPod、SLURM、FSx、S3 和 EKS 在流畅的机器学习环境中每天处理数千个多模态序列，该环境同时支持快速实验和生产规模训练。我们将分享我们的集成监控解决方案如何将人工分析减少 85%，同时扩展以支持数千个车辆分析用例。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Spreetail's AI Value Journey (NTA319)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Spreetail 的 AI 价值之旅 (NTA319)
sessions.abstract: Explore how Spreetail is transforming business operations through AI adoption, delivering over $50M in annual value across the enterprise. This executive session reveals our pragmatic approach to implementing AI solutions in merchandising, supply chain, and customer experience. Learn how we prioritize use cases, manage implementation risks, and build internal AI capabilities while ensuring ROI. We'll share our framework for measuring AI success, governance, and key insights from both wins and setbacks. Discover how we navigate vendor selection, data readiness, and change management to achieve measurable business outcomes. Perfect for leaders looking to move beyond AI pilots to enterprise-wide value creation.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索Spreetail如何通过采用AI转型业务运营，在整个企业范围内每年创造超过5000万美元的价值。本高管会议揭示了我们在商品销售、供应链和客户体验方面实施AI解决方案的务实方法。了解我们如何确定用例优先级、管理实施风险、构建内部AI能力，同时确保投资回报率。我们将分享衡量AI成功的框架、治理方法，以及从成功和挫折中获得的关键见解。探索我们如何应对供应商选择、数据就绪度和变革管理，以实现可衡量的业务成果。非常适合希望将AI从试点项目推进到企业级价值创造的领导者。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Turn unstructured data in Amazon S3 into AI-ready assets with SageMaker Catalog
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 SageMaker Catalog 将 Amazon S3 中的非结构化数据转换为 AI 就绪资产
sessions.abstract: Unstructured data often holds untapped value, and Amazon SageMaker makes it possible to turn that data into insights and AI-ready assets. In this session, you'll learn how to bring unstructured data from Amazon S3 into SageMaker, create searchable assets, and build knowledge bases for Amazon Bedrock to improve retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) accuracy. Discover how teams can collaborate across roles, data users can self-serve to find and understand the right data, and governance ensures that the right people get the right access. Bayer will share how they use these capabilities to unlock unstructured data and accelerate research and innovation.
sessions.abstract_cn: 非结构化数据通常蕴含着尚未开发的价值，而 Amazon SageMaker 使将这些数据转化为洞察和 AI 就绪资产成为可能。在本次会议中，您将学习如何将非结构化数据从 Amazon S3 导入 SageMaker，创建可搜索的资产，并为 Amazon Bedrock 构建知识库以提高检索增强生成 (RAG) 的准确性。了解团队如何跨角色协作，数据用户如何自助查找和理解正确的数据，以及治理如何确保合适的人员获得合适的访问权限。拜耳将分享他们如何使用这些功能来释放非结构化数据的价值并加速研究和创新。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From principles to practice: Scaling AI responsibly with Indeed (AIM3323)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从原则到实践：与Indeed一起负责任地扩展AI (AIM3323)
sessions.abstract: Building trusted AI applications requires balancing innovation speed with risk management across an increasingly complex set of responsible AI dimensions, including privacy, security, robustness, fairness, safety, transparency, and explainability. Join this session to learn about the AWS Responsible AI Best Practices Framework and discover how Indeed built an intelligent risk management platform that embeds responsible AI across the AI lifecycle, enabling rapid product development while protecting millions of job seekers. Walk away with actionable strategies for implementing responsible AI practices in your own applications.
sessions.abstract_cn: 构建可信的AI应用需要在日益复杂的负责任AI维度中平衡创新速度与风险管理，这些维度包括隐私、安全、鲁棒性、公平性、安全性、透明度和可解释性。参加本次会议，了解AWS负责任AI最佳实践框架，并探索Indeed如何构建智能风险管理平台，在AI生命周期中嵌入负责任AI，在保护数百万求职者的同时实现快速产品开发。您将获得在自己的应用中实施负责任AI实践的可行策略。

presenter.name: Mike Diamond
presenter.title: Principal Product Manager for Responsible AI

presenter.name: Lewis Baker
presenter.title: Sr Manager, Data Science - Responsible AI

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI agents for cloud ops: Automating infrastructure management (AIM340)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 云运维AI代理：自动化基础设施管理 (AIM340)
sessions.abstract: Security teams face alert overload and compliance complexity. This code talk shows how to build AI-driven automation that transforms security operations. Through live coding demonstrations, we'll develop intelligent agents that process security events, analyze threats, and orchestrate automated responses. You'll learn to implement real-time detection systems, incident management workflows, and smart remediation patterns. Walk away with reusable code and architectural approaches for creating autonomous security systems that reduce noise and accelerate response times.
sessions.abstract_cn: 安全团队面临警报过载和合规复杂性问题。本代码讲座展示如何构建AI驱动的自动化系统来转变安全运营。通过实时编码演示,我们将开发智能代理来处理安全事件、分析威胁并编排自动化响应。您将学习实现实时检测系统、事件管理工作流和智能修复模式。您将获得可重用的代码和架构方法,用于创建能够减少噪音并加快响应时间的自主安全系统。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From collecting tools to an autonomous SOC (SEC206)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从工具集合到自主安全运营中心 (SEC206)
sessions.abstract: The vision of an autonomous SOC feels unattainable amid a federated array of security tools. This session demonstrates a practical path forward, focused on outcomes. The key is not to replace tools, but to unify them with an AI-powered platform that automates detection and response to empower security teams in unprecedented ways. Through a real-world demonstration of the latest Purple AI innovations, see how to transform siloed data into the foundation for an autonomous security posture. Learn how to advance SOC maturity and achieve superior security outcomes across your AWS environment. This presentation is brought to you by SentinelOne, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 自主SOC的愿景在联合的安全工具阵列中似乎难以实现。本次会议展示了一条注重成果的实用路径。关键不在于替换工具,而是通过AI驱动的平台将它们统一起来,自动化检测和响应,以前所未有的方式赋能安全团队。通过对最新Purple AI创新的实际演示,了解如何将孤立的数据转化为自主安全态势的基础。学习如何提升SOC成熟度,并在您的AWS环境中实现卓越的安全成果。本演示由AWS合作伙伴SentinelOne提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale modernization with agentic AI featuring Thomson Reuters (MAM334)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用代理式AI扩展现代化，汤森路透案例分享 (MAM334)
sessions.abstract: Join Thomson Reuters to discover how they leveraged agentic AI service to revolutionize their .NET modernization journey. In this session you will learn how they leveraged AWS Transform for .NET to modernize 5M lines of code monthly, achieving a 4x acceleration in development velocity. Learn how they reduced application transformation time from months to a single sprint while cutting operating costs by 30%. This session demonstrates practical implementation of parallel modernization at scale, featuring both web and IDE experiences, and shares insights on using AI-powered agents to dramatically reduce technical debt while maintaining security and performance.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入 Thomson Reuters，了解他们如何利用代理式 AI 服务彻底改变其 .NET 现代化之旅。在本次会议中，您将了解他们如何利用 AWS Transform for .NET 每月现代化 500 万行代码，实现开发速度提升 4 倍。了解他们如何将应用程序转型时间从数月缩短至单个冲刺周期，同时将运营成本降低 30%。本次会议展示了大规模并行现代化的实际实施，涵盖 Web 和 IDE 体验，并分享了使用 AI 驱动的代理大幅减少技术债务同时保持安全性和性能的见解。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Implementing security best practices for serverless applications (CNS360)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为无服务器应用程序实施安全最佳实践 (CNS360)
sessions.abstract: Discover how to maximize security in serverless architectures while maintaining developer velocity. This session explores enterprise-proven security best practices across the serverless application lifecycle, from development to production. Learn how to leverage AWS's built-in security features, implement effective security controls, and establish proper guardrails without hampering innovation. Drawing from real customer experiences, we'll demonstrate practical approaches to strengthen your security posture while enabling developers to build and deploy with confidence
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何在无服务器架构中最大化安全性，同时保持开发人员的工作效率。本次会议探讨了经过企业验证的安全最佳实践，涵盖从开发到生产的无服务器应用程序生命周期。学习如何利用 AWS 的内置安全功能、实施有效的安全控制，以及建立适当的防护措施而不妨碍创新。我们将借鉴真实客户经验，展示实用方法来增强您的安全态势，同时使开发人员能够自信地构建和部署应用程序。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How High-Performing Teams Connect Observability to Business Growth (COP206)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 高绩效团队如何将可观测性与业务增长相连接 (COP206)
sessions.abstract: High-performing engineering teams don’t stop at collecting logs and metrics. They turn observability into a competitive advantage. In this session, we’ll explore a four-stage maturity model that shows how organizations evolve from capturing telemetry to making business-critical decisions. You’ll learn how leading teams define SLOs, tie reliability to customer experience, and connect technical signals directly to revenue and growth. Whether you’re an engineer optimizing uptime or a leader shaping product strategy, you’ll walk away with a clear framework to align engineering performance with business outcomes. This presentation is brought to you by Coralogix, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 高性能工程团队不会止步于收集日志和指标。他们将可观测性转化为竞争优势。在本次会议中,我们将探讨一个四阶段成熟度模型,展示组织如何从捕获遥测数据演进到做出业务关键决策。您将了解领先团队如何定义SLO、将可靠性与客户体验关联,并将技术信号直接连接到收入和增长。无论您是优化正常运行时间的工程师,还是制定产品战略的领导者,您都将获得一个清晰的框架,以将工程性能与业务成果保持一致。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Coralogix为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS European Sovereign Cloud: Your 20-Minute Essential Guide (GBL101)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS欧洲主权云：20分钟核心指南 (GBL101)
sessions.abstract: Discover AWS's European Sovereign Cloud, designed to meet the evolving data sovereignty requirements and regulatory landscape of the European Union. In this concise 20-minute session, we'll explore the key features, architectural principles, and unique value propositions of this purpose-built cloud solution. Learn how AWS addresses data residency, operational autonomy, and compliance requirements while maintaining the same level of security, reliability, and innovation you expect from AWS. Whether you're a business leader, architect, or compliance professional operating in Europe, this session will equip you with essential knowledge to navigate the future of sovereign cloud computing.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索AWS欧洲主权云，该解决方案旨在满足欧盟不断演变的数据主权要求和监管环境。在这个简洁的20分钟会议中，我们将探讨这一专门构建的云解决方案的关键特性、架构原则和独特价值主张。了解AWS如何在保持您期望的AWS安全性、可靠性和创新水平的同时，满足数据驻留、运营自主权和合规性要求。无论您是在欧洲运营的业务领导者、架构师还是合规专业人员，本次会议都将为您提供必要的知识，以应对主权云计算的未来。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Agentic advantage: How AWS Partners unlock AI's full potential (PEX201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 代理优势：AWS 合作伙伴如何释放 AI 的全部潜力 (PEX201)
sessions.abstract: Agentic AI introduces a new layer of intelligence: systems that don’t just predict, but act. AWS Partners play a critical role in helping customers build, integrate and scale agentic workflows. Join us as we walk through a few of the most prevelant agentic use cases from 2025 and into 2026 looking at how partners are accelerating agentic AI with AWS.
sessions.abstract_cn: 代理式AI引入了新的智能层：这些系统不仅能预测，还能采取行动。AWS合作伙伴在帮助客户构建、集成和扩展代理式工作流程方面发挥着关键作用。请加入我们，一起了解2025年至2026年最普遍的几个代理式用例，看看合作伙伴如何通过AWS加速代理式AI的发展。

presenter.name: PRIYA ARORA
presenter.title: Global Head of Data & AI Partner Programs, Data & AI Partner GTM

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-powered resilience testing and disaster recovery (COP420)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI驱动的弹性测试和灾难恢复 (COP420)
sessions.abstract: Not all disaster recovery strategies can address the complex, dynamic nature of modern cloud infrastructures, leading to gaps in system resilience and compliance adherence. Discover how to enhance resilience and disaster recovery on AWS empowered by AI. This approach bridges infrastructure insights and application-level testing, enabling more effective disaster recovery preparation. You will learn how to leverage Large Language Models (LLMs) with AWS Resilience Hub and AWS Systems Manager to modernize testing, analyze infrastructure, and generate targeted AWS Fault Injection Service experiments and recovery runbooks. Walk away with practical examples of automated test generation with templates and learn to design prompts.
sessions.abstract_cn: 并非所有灾难恢复策略都能应对现代云基础设施复杂、动态的特性，导致系统弹性和合规性方面存在差距。了解如何通过AI增强AWS上的弹性和灾难恢复能力。这种方法连接了基础设施洞察和应用程序级测试，实现更有效的灾难恢复准备。您将学习如何利用大语言模型(LLM)结合AWS Resilience Hub和AWS Systems Manager来现代化测试、分析基础设施，并生成有针对性的AWS Fault Injection Service实验和恢复运行手册。通过实际示例掌握使用模板自动生成测试的方法，并学习设计提示词。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025-AWS Local Zones- Sophos’ new edge in the global race against cyber-attacks-HMC215
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-AWS Local Zones- Sophos在全球网络攻击竞赛中的新优势-HMC215
sessions.abstract: Discover how AWS Hybrid and Edge solutions transform how organizations deliver low-latency applications at the edge. Learn how AWS Local Zones extends AWS Regions and services closer to population centers, fitting use cases from media streaming to real-time gaming and financial trading. Hear from Sophos on how they revolutionized their global threat intelligence service using AWS Local Zones, achieving 69% latency reduction in Germany and handling 1,242% traffic surges during disasters. You'll gain practical insights about deploying multi-tier architecture for global scale. Whether optimizing application performance or exploring edge computing solutions, this session equips you with strategies to enhance end-user experience using AWS Local Zones.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 AWS 混合云和边缘解决方案如何改变组织在边缘提供低延迟应用程序的方式。了解 AWS Local Zones 如何扩展 AWS 区域和服务，使其更接近人口中心，适用于从媒体流到实时游戏和金融交易等各种使用场景。听取 Sophos 如何使用 AWS Local Zones 彻底改变其全球威胁情报服务，在德国实现 69% 的延迟降低，并在灾难期间处理 1,242% 的流量激增。您将获得有关为全球规模部署多层架构的实用见解。无论是优化应用程序性能还是探索边缘计算解决方案，本次会议都将为您提供使用 AWS Local Zones 增强最终用户体验的策略。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic AI advancements in customer experience with Amazon Connect (BIZ221)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用 Amazon Connect 实现客户体验中的智能体 AI 进展 (BIZ221)
sessions.abstract: Amazon Connect transforms routine interactions into memorable moments by seamlessly embedding AI across every customer touchpoint - built from the ground up as a unified solution that's been cloud and AI-native since day one. By driving seamless coordination between human and AI agents, it preserves context across every interaction to drive differentiated customer experiences. Join this session with Pasquale DeMaio, VP of Customer Experience, on how Amazon Connect is revolutionizing contact centers through agentic AI. Hear from your peers as they share their firsthand experience and best practices, illustrating the real-world impact and benefits of AI-powered customer service.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon Connect 通过在每个客户接触点无缝嵌入 AI，将日常互动转变为难忘时刻——从第一天起就作为统一解决方案从头构建，原生支持云和 AI。通过推动人工座席和 AI 座席之间的无缝协调，它在每次互动中保留上下文，从而提供差异化的客户体验。请加入本次会议，聆听客户体验副总裁 Pasquale DeMaio 讲述 Amazon Connect 如何通过智能体 AI 彻底改变联络中心。听取同行分享他们的第一手经验和最佳实践，展示 AI 驱动的客户服务的实际影响和优势。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Automating enterprise-scale code modernization with agentic AI (MAM342)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用智能体AI自动化企业级代码现代化 (MAM342)
sessions.abstract: Discover how AI agents are revolutionizing enterprise-scale code modernization initiatives. This session demonstrates how to accelerate your modernization journey through agentic AI-driven code transformations. You'll learn practical strategies for defining custom code transformations, setting up transformation campaigns, managing multi-repository migrations, and measuring success. Featured customer success journeys from industry leaders will showcase language migrations and framework upgrades, providing actionable insights for your own modernization projects.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索AI代理如何革新企业级代码现代化计划。本次会议演示如何通过代理AI驱动的代码转换加速您的现代化进程。您将学习定义自定义代码转换、设置转换活动、管理多仓库迁移以及衡量成功的实用策略。来自行业领导者的客户成功案例将展示语言迁移和框架升级,为您自己的现代化项目提供可操作的见解。

presenter.name: Morgan Lunt
presenter.title: Senior Product Manager - Technical, External Services

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Manage multicloud Kubernetes at scale feat. Adobe (HMC322)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模管理多云 Kubernetes，Adobe 实践分享 (HMC322)
sessions.abstract: Organizations often adopt a multicloud container strategy to meet latency, regulatory, and customer requirements. Adobe operates 500+ clusters across multicloud and on-premises environments, powering 4,000+ production services. In this session, we dive deep into Adobe's journey with fleet management of their multicloud Kubernetes clusters. Learn how Adobe solved challenges such as standardization of cluster lifecycle management, inter-cluster networking, security policies, and multi-tenancy across cloud providers. Adobe will share their approach, design patterns, and practices based on a declarative, GitOps-based solution with Cluster API and Argo, tenant isolation with Open Policy Agent (OPA), and fleet-wide optimization techniques.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业通常采用多云容器策略来满足延迟、合规性和客户需求。Adobe 在多云和本地环境中运营着 500 多个集群，为 4,000 多个生产服务提供支持。在本次会议中，我们将深入探讨 Adobe 在多云 Kubernetes 集群车队管理方面的实践历程。了解 Adobe 如何解决集群生命周期管理标准化、跨集群网络、安全策略以及跨云提供商多租户等挑战。Adobe 将分享他们基于 Cluster API 和 Argo 的声明式 GitOps 解决方案、使用 Open Policy Agent (OPA) 实现租户隔离以及车队级优化技术的方法、设计模式和实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagining SIEM architecture using AWS S3 Buckets (SEC346)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS S3 存储桶重新构想 SIEM 架构 (SEC346)
sessions.abstract: Traditional SIEM architectures tightly coupled data storage and threat detection, often leading to high costs, slower queries, and limited flexibility. In this session, learn how to reimagine your SIEM design by decoupling detection from storage using Amazon S3. Discover how to keep AWS-native logs in S3 while centralizing additional telemetry, such as endpoint detection and response (EDR) events, in the same buckets. Explore how this approach improves incident response readiness, enables faster queries at lower cost, and supports threat hunting and detection across diverse data sources without moving logs outside AWS. This presentation is brought to you by Vega, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 传统的 SIEM 架构将数据存储和威胁检测紧密耦合，往往导致高成本、查询速度较慢以及灵活性受限。在本次会议中，了解如何通过使用 Amazon S3 将检测与存储解耦来重新构想您的 SIEM 设计。探索如何将 AWS 原生日志保留在 S3 中，同时将其他遥测数据（如端点检测和响应 (EDR) 事件）集中存储在相同的存储桶中。了解这种方法如何提高事件响应就绪性，以更低的成本实现更快的查询，并支持跨不同数据源进行威胁搜寻和检测，而无需将日志移出 AWS。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Vega 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Revolutionizing Audi's Welding Inspection System through AI (IND367)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过人工智能革新奥迪焊接检测系统 (IND367)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Audi implemented an AI-powered quality control system, transforming a traditional welding inspection processes. The system analyzes 1.5 million weld points across 300 vehicles per shift, expanding upon previous manual ultrasound inspections that covered only 5,000 points per vehicle. This AI integration enables production staff to focus on addressing potential anomalies, significantly enhancing quality monitoring efficiency. Following its success, Volkswagen Group is expanding this technology across multiple sites, including Audi Brussels, VW Emden, and Audi Ingolstadt. The implementation process includes site-specific AI model retraining to accommodate varying welding parameters, demonstrating a scalable approach to manufacturing quality control optimization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解奥迪如何实施AI驱动的质量控制系统,改造传统的焊接检测流程。该系统在每班次中分析300辆车的150万个焊点,相比之前每辆车仅覆盖5000个焊点的人工超声波检测有了大幅扩展。这种AI集成使生产人员能够专注于处理潜在异常,显著提升质量监控效率。在取得成功后,大众集团正在多个站点推广该技术,包括奥迪布鲁塞尔、大众埃姆登和奥迪英戈尔施塔特。实施过程包括针对不同焊接参数进行特定站点的AI模型重新训练,展示了制造质量控制优化的可扩展方法。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Better, faster, cheaper: How Valkey is revolutionizing caching (DAT458)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 更好、更快、更便宜：Valkey 如何革新缓存技术 (DAT458)
sessions.abstract: In this session, discover how the powerful combination of open source Valkey and Amazon ElastiCache is transforming the landscape of distributed caching. Explore recent innovations such as probabilistic data structures like bloom filters, a memory efficient dictionary that reduces memory usage by up to 40%, and a multi-threaded architecture that enables instantaneous scaling by up to 230%. We'll reveal the infrastructure that enables ElastiCache to seamlessly patch hundreds of thousands of customers while maintaining high availability, even for extreme workloads like Prime Day's trillion requests per minute.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，探索开源 Valkey 与 Amazon ElastiCache 的强大组合如何改变分布式缓存的格局。了解最新创新，例如布隆过滤器等概率数据结构、可将内存使用量减少高达 40% 的内存高效字典，以及支持高达 230% 即时扩展的多线程架构。我们将揭示使 ElastiCache 能够为数十万客户无缝修补补丁同时保持高可用性的基础设施，即使面对 Prime Day 每分钟万亿次请求等极端工作负载也能应对自如。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Supercharge personalized experiences with Contentful and AWS (AIM296)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Contentful 和 AWS 增强个性化体验 (AIM296)
sessions.abstract: Customers today expect personalized experiences at every touchpoint, and become frustrated by generic, AI‑authored content. But personalization at scale is challenging when you're targeting diverse audiences across multiple channels, all while staying on brand. Contentful and AWS make it simple (and fast). Running natively on AWS and powered by Amazon Bedrock, Contentful’s AI-native platform delivers content at scale, handling the data demands that personalized experiences require. In this lightning talk, you'll learn why customers choose Contentful to power their digital experiences: powerful, context‑aware personalization backed by a scalable approach to content operations. The result? A clear experience that makes each user feel like your brand’s most important customer. This presentation is brought to you by Contentful, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 当今客户期望在每个触点都能获得个性化体验，并对千篇一律的AI生成内容感到失望。但是，当您需要跨多个渠道针对不同受众进行个性化时，同时还要保持品牌一致性，大规模个性化就变得极具挑战性。Contentful和AWS让这一切变得简单（且快速）。Contentful的AI原生平台在AWS上原生运行，由Amazon Bedrock提供支持，可大规模交付内容，处理个性化体验所需的数据需求。在本次闪电演讲中，您将了解客户为何选择Contentful来支持其数字体验：强大的上下文感知个性化，以及可扩展的内容运营方法作为支撑。结果如何？清晰的体验让每位用户都感觉自己是您品牌最重要的客户。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Contentful为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Managing Bots vs Humans with CloudFront and AWS WAF (NET324)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 CloudFront 和 AWS WAF 管理机器人与真人流量 (NET324)
sessions.abstract: Bots are getting smarter - your defenses should too. Learn how to build intelligent bot detection and deliver content securely using AWS WAF and Amazon CloudFront. In this live coding session, we’ll show you how to treat bots and humans differently (in a good way), serving optimized content to each without compromising performance or security. You'll explore WAF’s bot control, real-time request handling with CloudFront Functions, and clever tricks like request/response manipulation. Plus, we’ll show you how to monitor everything with CloudWatch. Walk away with code, patterns, and a smarter way to manage bots - because not all traffic deserves VIP access.
sessions.abstract_cn: 机器人正变得越来越智能——您的防御措施也应如此。了解如何使用 AWS WAF 和 Amazon CloudFront 构建智能机器人检测并安全地交付内容。在本次实时编码会议中，我们将向您展示如何区别对待机器人和人类（以一种好的方式），为每种类型提供优化的内容，同时不影响性能或安全性。您将探索 WAF 的机器人控制、使用 CloudFront Functions 进行实时请求处理，以及请求/响应操作等巧妙技巧。此外，我们还将向您展示如何使用 CloudWatch 监控一切。您将获得代码、模式以及更智能的机器人管理方法——因为并非所有流量都值得 VIP 访问。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Trading innovation: Jefferies' AI assistant on Amazon Bedrock (IND3315)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 交易创新：Jefferies基于Amazon Bedrock的AI助手 (IND3315)
sessions.abstract: Explore Jefferies Equities' enterprise deployment of a generative AI trading assistant using Amazon Bedrock's Strands Agents framework. This lightning talk will showcase Jefferies’ technical architecture leveraging the Claude foundation model, Model Context Protocol (MCP) tools, and Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases for processing real-time trade and transactions data. We’ll demonstrate our serverless event-driven architecture for achieving lower latency response at scale. We'll also examine our implementation of semantic caching, knowledge bases, and prompt engineering techniques that enable autonomous data analysis capabilities. Attendees will walk away with actionable architectural patterns and best practices for enterprise-grade agentic AI deployment.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索Jefferies Equities使用Amazon Bedrock的Strands Agents框架部署生成式AI交易助手的企业级实践。本次闪电演讲将展示Jefferies的技术架构，该架构利用Claude基础模型、模型上下文协议(MCP)工具以及Amazon Bedrock知识库来处理实时交易和事务数据。我们将演示我们的无服务器事件驱动架构如何实现大规模低延迟响应。我们还将探讨语义缓存、知识库和提示工程技术的实现，这些技术使自主数据分析能力成为可能。参会者将获得企业级代理AI部署的可操作架构模式和最佳实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Train high-performing AI models at scale on AWS (AIM365)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在 AWS 上大规模训练高性能 AI 模型 (AIM365)
sessions.abstract: Training large AI models requires significant compute resources and can be time and cost intensive. In this session, learn to optimize and accelerate your model training workloads using AWS's purpose-built infrastructure and tools. We'll dive deep into leveraging services like Amazon SageMaker HyperPod for distributed training at scale and SageMaker fully managed training jobs for cost-effective ML acceleration. You'll learn to scale training across clusters using techniques like data and model parallelism, automated model tuning, and efficient checkpoint management. Through real customer examples, see how to reduce training time by up to 40%, optimize costs, and build high-performance training pipelines.
sessions.abstract_cn: 训练大型AI模型需要大量计算资源，可能耗时且成本高昂。在本次会议中，学习如何使用AWS专用基础设施和工具优化和加速模型训练工作负载。我们将深入探讨如何利用Amazon SageMaker HyperPod进行大规模分布式训练，以及使用SageMaker全托管训练作业实现经济高效的机器学习加速。您将学习使用数据并行和模型并行等技术跨集群扩展训练、自动化模型调优以及高效的检查点管理。通过真实客户案例，了解如何将训练时间缩短高达40%、优化成本并构建高性能训练管道。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Harnessing analytics for humans and AI (INV201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为人类和AI利用分析能力 (INV201)
sessions.abstract: Emerging trends, ranging from Open Table Formats (OTF) to agentic infrastructure, are rapidly changing how humans and applications interact with analytics to drive mission-critical business decisions. Join Mai-Lan Tomsen Bukovec, VP of AWS Technology, to explore emerging trends, the evolution of analytics engines and applications, and how to future-proof your data foundation for the rapidly changing landscape of analytics at scale. Learn how AWS is transforming data and analytics services to lead in optimized data storage, querying, streaming, processing, and governance - for both human users and agentic infrastructure.
sessions.abstract_cn: 从开放表格式（OTF）到智能体基础设施等新兴趋势，正在迅速改变人类和应用程序与分析交互的方式，以推动关键业务决策。加入AWS技术副总裁Mai-Lan Tomsen Bukovec，探索新兴趋势、分析引擎和应用程序的演进，以及如何为快速变化的大规模分析环境构建面向未来的数据基础。了解AWS如何转型数据和分析服务，在优化数据存储、查询、流处理、处理和治理方面保持领先地位——同时服务于人类用户和智能体基础设施。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FinOps 3.0: Cost Intelligence for the AI Era (AIM268)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FinOps 3.0：AI时代的成本智能 (AIM268)
sessions.abstract: FinOps has evolved from visibility to optimization and now to action. As AI workloads introduce new cost complexities, organizations can no longer afford analysis paralysis or endless dashboards. It is time for FinOps 3.0: a shift where cost intelligence is embedded directly into engineering workflows, insights are contextual and role specific, and automation becomes a trusted ally rather than a leap of faith. This session explores how to apply lessons from Kubernetes cost management to today’s AI challenges and provides a practical roadmap to help teams innovate faster, smarter, and more sustainably in the cloud. This presentation is brought to you by DoiT, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: FinOps已从可见性演进到优化,现在进入到行动阶段。随着AI工作负载引入新的成本复杂性,组织再也无法承受分析瘫痪或无休止的仪表板。现在是FinOps 3.0的时候了:一种转变,将成本智能直接嵌入工程工作流程,洞察具有上下文相关性且针对特定角色,自动化成为值得信赖的盟友而非盲目的信任。本次会议探讨如何将Kubernetes成本管理的经验应用于当今的AI挑战,并提供实用路线图,帮助团队在云中更快、更智能、更可持续地创新。本演示由AWS合作伙伴DoiT提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - So Energy streamlines customer service with AI-powered automation (BIZ211)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - So Energy 通过 AI 驱动的自动化简化客户服务 (BIZ211)
sessions.abstract: Legacy contact center solutions weren’t built for today’s customer expectations. Managing fragmented voice, chat, and email systems creates friction for administrators, agents, and customers alike. Join AWS and So Energy — a UK-based renewable energy provider — to learn how you can modernise ageing customer service experiences by consolidating disjointed channels into a single, unified application with Amazon Connect. Leveraging AI-powered automation and deep CRM integration, learn how So Energy agents gained a single view of the customer journey, enabling them to resolve issues faster and reduce manual effort — while customers enjoy a seamless, consistent experience across every channel.
sessions.abstract_cn: 传统的联络中心解决方案无法满足当今客户的期望。管理分散的语音、聊天和电子邮件系统会给管理员、座席和客户带来摩擦。加入 AWS 和 So Energy（一家英国可再生能源供应商）的行列，了解如何通过 Amazon Connect 将分散的渠道整合到单一统一的应用程序中，从而实现老化客户服务体验的现代化。借助 AI 驱动的自动化和深度 CRM 集成，了解 So Energy 座席如何获得客户旅程的单一视图，使他们能够更快地解决问题并减少手动工作——同时客户可以在每个渠道享受无缝、一致的体验。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A leader's guide to advanced team structures in an agentic world (SNR307)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 智能体世界中高级团队结构的领导者指南 (SNR307)
sessions.abstract: As AI agents transform the workplace, organizations must adapt their structures and methodologies to harness new opportunities. The probabilistic nature of AI requires continuous iteration and intelligent oversight, creating new ways of working across business functions. To thrive, organizations must combine clear capability assessment with agile planning while leveraging their unique domain expertise and data assets. This keynote explores how leadership is evolving to meet these needs, covering new organizational models and roles that coordinate human-AI hybrid teams. Leaders will learn strategies for balancing rapid decision-making with strategic oversight, finding the optimal mix of centralized guidance and decentralized innovation.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着AI代理改变工作场所，组织必须调整其结构和方法论以利用新机遇。AI的概率性特征需要持续迭代和智能监督，在各业务职能中创造新的工作方式。为了蓬勃发展，组织必须将清晰的能力评估与敏捷规划相结合，同时利用其独特的领域专业知识和数据资产。本主题演讲探讨领导力如何演进以满足这些需求，涵盖协调人机混合团队的新组织模型和角色。领导者将学习平衡快速决策与战略监督的策略，找到集中指导与分散创新的最佳组合。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build resilient and low-latency hybrid telecom infrastructure at scale (HMC328)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模构建弹性和低延迟的混合电信基础设施 (HMC328)
sessions.abstract: Join us to discover how Liberty Latin America (LLA) built telecom infrastructure in a hybrid cloud architecture across Latin America for millions of subscribers. Learn how LLA architected a comprehensive solution using AWS Outposts, AWS Local Zones, and AWS Direct Connect to create a resilient, low-latency network with 180+ VPCs. We'll share architectural patterns that combine on-premises infrastructure with AWS edge services, BGP routing strategies, and traffic optimization techniques. Explore how to select the right mix of AWS services while maintaining security and compliance, plus gain practical approaches to capacity planning and cost optimization for telecom networks and hybrid cloud.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们，了解 Liberty Latin America (LLA) 如何在拉丁美洲为数百万用户构建混合云架构的电信基础设施。了解 LLA 如何使用 AWS Outposts、AWS Local Zones 和 AWS Direct Connect 架构综合解决方案，创建具有 180 多个 VPC 的弹性低延迟网络。我们将分享结合本地基础设施与 AWS 边缘服务的架构模式、BGP 路由策略和流量优化技术。探索如何在保持安全性和合规性的同时选择正确的 AWS 服务组合，并获得电信网络和混合云容量规划和成本优化的实用方法。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Live logs & prosper: Use AI to make logs a primary observability signal(AIM346)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 实时日志与繁荣：使用AI将日志打造为主要可观测性信号(AIM346)
sessions.abstract: Logs carry the richest context for troubleshooting, yet brittle pipelines, fragile parsers, and cost-driven sampling keep teams stuck in reactive grep mode. This session introduces Elastic's AI-powered Streams, an agentic system that automatically understands and enriches any log format (structured or unstructured), simplifies ingestion, parsing, storage, and analysis, and surfaces significant events and anomalies out of the box. The result: logs become your first and smartest investigative signal, accelerating root-cause analysis and delivering actionable insights in production. Live logs and prosper! This presentation is brought to you by Elastic, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 日志承载着最丰富的故障排查上下文，但脆弱的管道、易损的解析器以及成本驱动的采样使团队陷入被动的 grep 模式。本次会议介绍 Elastic 的 AI 驱动 Streams，这是一个智能体系统，能够自动理解和丰富任何日志格式（结构化或非结构化），简化摄取、解析、存储和分析，并开箱即用地呈现重要事件和异常。结果是：日志成为您首要且最智能的调查信号，加速根因分析并在生产环境中提供可操作的洞察。让日志活起来并繁荣发展！本演示由 Elastic（AWS 合作伙伴）为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - HPC at Scale with AWS Parallel Computing Service (PCS) (CMP340)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 并行计算服务 (PCS) 实现大规模 HPC (CMP340)
sessions.abstract: High performance computing workloads are growing in complexity, scale, and importance. AWS Parallel Computing Service (PCS) brings simplicity and flexibility to this challenge by automating cluster creation, job scheduling, and resource management. In this session, learn how PCS helps organizations move faster, scale securely, and achieve predictable performance for demanding workloads in energy, manufacturing, and research. Customers will share their experience building and running real-world HPC environments with PCS, including lessons learned and best practices. Join us to see how PCS is redefining the way high performance computing runs on AWS.
sessions.abstract_cn: 高性能计算工作负载在复杂性、规模和重要性方面不断增长。AWS Parallel Computing Service (PCS) 通过自动化集群创建、作业调度和资源管理，为这一挑战带来了简单性和灵活性。在本次会议中，了解 PCS 如何帮助组织更快地行动、安全地扩展，并为能源、制造和研究领域的高要求工作负载实现可预测的性能。客户将分享他们使用 PCS 构建和运行真实 HPC 环境的经验，包括经验教训和最佳实践。加入我们，了解 PCS 如何重新定义高性能计算在 AWS 上的运行方式。

presenter.name: Satoshi Ikemure
presenter.title: Administration Leader
presenter.company: Toyota Central R&D Labs (豊田中央研究所)

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Ericsson Innovation: Optimizing Mobile Networks & Unified Development with AWS
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 爱立信创新：利用AWS优化移动网络与统一开发
sessions.abstract: Discover how Ericsson leverages AWS AI solutions to revolutionize mobile networks through two groundbreaking use cases. First, explore Ericsson's journey toward Autonomous Network AI multi-agents and reinforcement learning solutions, automating RAN optimization, cutting operational effort by up to 50% while dynamically improving network coverage, capacity, and quality. Second, witness Ericsson's solution to knowledge de-fragmentation in complex telecom development. Using AWS services, including custom SageMaker models and Amazon Q Developer, Ericsson created an AI-native environment that breaks down information silos and accelerates innovation. Learn how Ericsson harnesses Amazon Bedrock, SageMaker, and Q Developer for future innovation in Agentic AI.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解爱立信如何利用AWS AI解决方案通过两个突破性用例彻底改变移动网络。首先，探索爱立信迈向自主网络AI多智能体和强化学习解决方案的历程，实现RAN优化自动化，将运营工作量减少高达50%，同时动态改善网络覆盖、容量和质量。其次，见证爱立信解决复杂电信开发中知识碎片化的方案。利用AWS服务，包括定制的SageMaker模型和Amazon Q Developer，爱立信创建了一个AI原生环境，打破信息孤岛并加速创新。了解爱立信如何利用Amazon Bedrock、SageMaker和Q Developer推动智能体AI的未来创新。

presenter.name: Ibrahim Eldeftar
presenter.title: Head of Telco AI Product Management

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate mission outcomes w/ recent AWS government regions innovations-WPS204
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用AWS政府区域最新创新加速任务成果-WPS204
sessions.abstract: AWS will share new innovations and an overview of AWS Government Regions (AWS GovCloud (US), AWS Secret and AWS Top-Secret Regions) that propel innovation, accelerate mission outcomes, and enable the U.S. priorities for AI-based global leadership in the regulated U.S. sovereign cloud marketplace. The AWS Government Regions are purpose-built compliant, secure, and scalable cloud infrastructure designed to address mission needs and critical workload requirements for civilian, healthcare, financial services, the U.S. Intelligence Community, the Department of Defense, the supporting industrial base, technology partners, and supporting organizations.
sessions.abstract_cn: AWS 将分享新的创新成果以及 AWS 政府区域（AWS GovCloud (US)、AWS Secret 和 AWS Top-Secret 区域）的概述，这些区域推动创新、加速任务成果，并在受监管的美国主权云市场中实现美国在基于人工智能的全球领导地位的优先事项。AWS 政府区域是专门构建的合规、安全且可扩展的云基础设施，旨在满足民用、医疗保健、金融服务、美国情报界、国防部、支持性工业基础、技术合作伙伴和支持组织的任务需求和关键工作负载要求。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - RAG is Dead: Long Live Intelligent Retrieval-Augmented Generation (AIM214)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - RAG已死:智能检索增强生成万岁 (AIM214)
sessions.abstract: The early days of Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) are over. Naive RAG approaches (simple vector lookups fed to a LLM) are not enough to deliver accurate, scalable, and context-rich AI experiences. In this session you’ll learn how leading teams are pushing beyond basic document search to build agentic RAG pipelines that incorporate multi-step reasoning, dynamic namespace selection, metadata-aware retrieval, evaluation and more. We’ll dive into patterns like hybrid search, context re-ranking, document/query expansion and feedback loops for continuous quality improvement.  This presentation is brought to you by Pinecone, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 检索增强生成（RAG）的早期阶段已经结束。简单的RAG方法（将简单的向量查找输入到LLM）不足以提供准确、可扩展且上下文丰富的AI体验。在本次会议中，您将了解领先团队如何超越基本的文档搜索，构建包含多步推理、动态命名空间选择、元数据感知检索、评估等功能的智能体RAG管道。我们将深入探讨混合搜索、上下文重排序、文档/查询扩展以及用于持续质量改进的反馈循环等模式。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Pinecone为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Optimizing for high performance with Amazon ElastiCache Serverless (DAT437)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon ElastiCache Serverless 优化高性能 (DAT437)
sessions.abstract: Learn how to build highly scalable, high-performance applications with Amazon ElastiCache Serverless. View how ElastiCache Serverless works behind the scenes and dive deeper into the metrics to help you identify and debug application performance issues. This session will help you to build effective applications using ElastiCache Serverless and to leverage the design of the service to your advantage.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何使用 Amazon ElastiCache Serverless 构建高度可扩展、高性能的应用程序。查看 ElastiCache Serverless 的后台工作原理，并深入了解有助于识别和调试应用程序性能问题的指标。本课程将帮助您使用 ElastiCache Serverless 构建高效的应用程序，并充分利用该服务的设计优势。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Migration & Modernization: How AWS Partners help customers transform (PEX109)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 迁移与现代化：AWS 合作伙伴如何帮助客户实现转型 (PEX109)
sessions.abstract: Hear how AWS Partners are making impact supporting customers on their digital transformation journeys. This session highlights customer success stories where partners have used AWS Partner Programs to accelerate change.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解AWS合作伙伴如何在支持客户数字化转型旅程中产生影响。本次会议重点介绍客户成功案例，展示合作伙伴如何利用AWS合作伙伴计划加速变革。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build agentic workflows on AWS with third-party agents and tools (AIM3311)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用第三方代理和工具在AWS上构建代理工作流 (AIM3311)
sessions.abstract: Discover how to architect and enhance AI development workflows on AWS with powerful third-party agents and tools from AWS Marketplace using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway and Runtime. This session walks through real-world use cases for third-party agents and how to efficiently source and deploy AI development tools the moment you need them. Through architecture diagrams and live demonstrations, we'll explore how to import tools via Gateway, establish connections with your IDE and MCP client, and deploy tools in AgentCore Runtime. Learn architectural best practices and see implementation patterns that showcase the power of integrating third-party products into your AWS workflows.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Gateway 和 Runtime，通过 AWS Marketplace 中强大的第三方代理和工具在 AWS 上架构和增强 AI 开发工作流程。本课程将介绍第三方代理的实际使用案例，以及如何在需要时高效地获取和部署 AI 开发工具。通过架构图和现场演示，我们将探讨如何通过 Gateway 导入工具、与 IDE 和 MCP 客户端建立连接，以及在 AgentCore Runtime 中部署工具。学习架构最佳实践，了解将第三方产品集成到 AWS 工作流程中的实现模式。

presenter.name: Meera Rajaram
presenter.title: Sr. Director Engineering AI, ML & Core Services

presenter.name: Andrei Okhotnikov
presenter.title: Head of Product, AWS Marketplace Deployment

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Next Frontier in Financial Systems: Transformer-based Foundation Models
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 金融系统的下一个前沿:基于Transformer的基础模型
sessions.abstract: Transformer-based foundation models are revolutionizing payment systems by providing deep contextual understanding of sequential transaction data. In this session, NVIDIA and AWS experts explain how large-scale tabular foundation models are trained and deployed to detect fraud in real time, personalize customer experiences, and interpret complex transaction patterns. Attendees will learn about the cloud-based AI factories enabling scalable deployment, NVIDIA’s accelerated computing for efficient training and tuning, and AWS’s secure and scalable cloud infrastructure. This presentation is brought to you by NVIDIA, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 基于Transformer的基础模型正在通过对序列交易数据提供深度上下文理解来革新支付系统。在本次会议中，NVIDIA和AWS专家将解释如何训练和部署大规模表格基础模型，以实时检测欺诈、个性化客户体验并解释复杂的交易模式。与会者将了解支持可扩展部署的基于云的AI工厂、NVIDIA用于高效训练和调优的加速计算，以及AWS安全且可扩展的云基础设施。本演示由AWS合作伙伴NVIDIA提供。

presenter.name: Pahal Patangia
presenter.title: Head of Global Industry Business Development, Payments

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Making Level 4 Autonomous Networks a reality with British Telecom (IND205)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 与英国电信共同实现4级自主网络 (IND205)
sessions.abstract: BT is partnering with AWS to create a fully autonomous "Dark NOC" by integrating AI/ML, generative AI, and Agentic AI. Moving from traditional telecom to software-driven operations, BT has implemented GenAI-driven AIOps solutions that reduce costs and improve customer experience. The system uses AWS's agentic AI with autonomous agents and Amazon Sagemaker ML models to enable intelligent monitoring, automated network management, and advanced diagnostics. These AI agents proactively handle network issues and identify customer impacts, advancing BT's goal of zero-touch network operations.
sessions.abstract_cn: BT正在与AWS合作，通过集成AI/ML、生成式AI和智能体AI来创建完全自主的"暗网络运营中心"。从传统电信转向软件驱动运营，BT已实施GenAI驱动的AIOps解决方案，降低成本并改善客户体验。该系统使用AWS的智能体AI与自主代理以及Amazon Sagemaker机器学习模型，实现智能监控、自动化网络管理和高级诊断。这些AI智能体主动处理网络问题并识别客户影响，推进BT实现零接触网络运营的目标。

presenter.name: Ajay Ravindranathan
presenter.title: Principal Solutions Architect, Telecom Data & AI/ML

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond the Hype: Delivering Measurable ROI with Generative AI on AWS (AIM231)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越炒作：在 AWS 上通过生成式 AI 实现可衡量的投资回报率 (AIM231)
sessions.abstract: With 96% of organizations increasing AI investments but only 36% successfully deploying to production, where's the disconnect? Dr. Ryan Ries, Chief AI and Data Scientist at Mission will showcase the GenAI implementations that are delivering real ROI in 2025. Learn which specific use cases are yielding the greatest returns across different industries and how to identify similar high-value opportunities within your own organization. Leave with actionable strategies to move your AWS GenAI initiatives from experimental to measurable value, based on proven approaches that have reduced costs, improved efficiency, and enhanced customer experiences. This presentation is brought to you by CDW, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 96%的组织正在增加AI投资，但只有36%成功部署到生产环境，问题出在哪里？Mission首席AI和数据科学家Ryan Ries博士将展示2025年真正带来投资回报率的GenAI实施案例。了解不同行业中哪些具体用例产生了最大回报，以及如何在您自己的组织中识别类似的高价值机会。基于已被证明能够降低成本、提高效率和增强客户体验的方法，带走可操作的策略，将您的AWS GenAI计划从实验阶段推进到可衡量的价值阶段。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴CDW提供支持。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Solving the Cloud Privilege Problem at Scale: A Fiserv Case Study (COP213)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模解决云权限问题：Fiserv案例研究 (COP213)
sessions.abstract: This session explores how Fiserv, a global leader in financial services technology, transformed its cloud identity security & governance strategy by deploying Sonrai's Cloud Permissions Firewall. Facing challenges across 900+ AWS accounts, including overprivileged identities, uncontrolled access to AI services, limited visibility into 3rd-party access & fragmented tools, Fiserv required a scalable, proactive approach. Attendees will learn how automation, centralized dashboards, & advanced identity controls enabled Fiserv to remediate 1000s of identity risks, get AI access under control, achieve compliance readiness, & reduce operational risk. The case study demonstrates practical strategies for securing enterprise-scale cloud environments. This presentation is brought to you by Sonrai Security, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨了全球金融服务技术领导者 Fiserv 如何通过部署 Sonrai 的云权限防火墙来转变其云身份安全与治理策略。面对 900 多个 AWS 账户带来的挑战,包括过度授权的身份、对 AI 服务的失控访问、第三方访问可见性有限以及工具碎片化,Fiserv 需要一种可扩展的主动方法。与会者将了解自动化、集中式仪表板和高级身份控制如何帮助 Fiserv 修复数千个身份风险、控制 AI 访问、实现合规就绪并降低运营风险。该案例研究展示了保护企业级云环境的实用策略。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Sonrai Security 提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modern Secrets: A Journey from Legacy Systems to AI-Ready Security (SEC213)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 现代密钥管理：从传统系统到AI就绪安全的演进之旅 (SEC213)
sessions.abstract: Learn from Acquia's journey from complex legacy systems to cutting-edge secrets management with AWS Secrets Manager. Discover how Acquia revolutionized its security infrastructure, mastering multi-tenant isolation and achieving zero-downtime migration across hundreds of services. This is a potential blueprint for your modern security architecture. Perfect for forward-thinking architects and security leaders, you'll get exclusive insights into Acquia's transformation and how Acquia leveraged its relationship with AWS to drive its roadmap for Agentic AI integration and improved security via automated secrets rotation. This is valuable glimpse into large-scale and seamless secrets management.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Acquia 如何从复杂的传统系统迁移到使用 AWS Secrets Manager 的尖端密钥管理。探索 Acquia 如何彻底改革其安全基础设施，掌握多租户隔离并在数百个服务中实现零停机迁移。这是您现代安全架构的潜在蓝图。非常适合具有前瞻性思维的架构师和安全领导者，您将获得关于 Acquia 转型的独家见解，以及 Acquia 如何利用其与 AWS 的关系来推动其 Agentic AI 集成路线图并通过自动化密钥轮换提高安全性。这是对大规模无缝密钥管理的宝贵洞察。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cracking the SMB Code: AI Sales That Redefine Travel Growth (AIM292)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 破解中小企业密码：重新定义旅游增长的AI销售 (AIM292)
sessions.abstract: The next big growth story in travel isn’t loyalty points or perks—it’s small and midsize businesses. Agile, underserved, and ready to spend, SMBs are tough to reach with traditional sales. In this session, United Airlines, AWS, and ZS reveal how an AI-led, digital-first Small Business Demand Center (SBDC) on AWS is transforming engagement. Explore day-in-the-life flows, the reference architecture powering them, and the operating model driving adoption. With real-world examples from United’s leadership, you’ll leave with a blueprint to personalize at scale, unlock an underpenetrated segment, and capture durable revenue growth. Join us to crack the SMB code. This presentation is brought to you by ZS, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 旅游行业的下一个重大增长故事不是积分或优惠——而是中小型企业。灵活、服务不足且准备消费的中小企业很难通过传统销售方式触达。在本次会议中，美联航、AWS 和 ZS 将揭示基于 AWS 构建的 AI 驱动、数字优先的小型企业需求中心 (SBDC) 如何转变客户互动方式。探索日常工作流程、支持这些流程的参考架构以及推动采用的运营模型。通过美联航领导层的真实案例，您将获得一个蓝图，以实现规模化个性化服务、开拓渗透不足的细分市场并获取持久的收入增长。加入我们，破解中小企业密码。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 ZS 提供。

presenter.name: Jane Lee
presenter.title: Head of Global B2B Marketing & International Marketing

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cochlear enhances contact center observability with Amazon Connect (BIZ215)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cochlear 通过 Amazon Connect 增强联络中心可观测性 (BIZ215)
sessions.abstract: Real-time visibility of contact center operations and customer interactions is critical to delivering excellent customer service. In this session, hear from Cochlear — the global leader in implantable hearing solutions — on how you can leverage Amazon Connect to observe and manage end-to-end customer experience operations, from forecasting contacts, to planning workforce schedules, to delivering human agent coaching, and beyond. Learn how Amazon Connect puts the power of AI in your hands to deliver end-to-end observability in your contact center.
sessions.abstract_cn: 联系中心运营和客户互动的实时可见性对于提供卓越的客户服务至关重要。在本次会议中，聆听全球植入式听力解决方案领导者Cochlear的分享，了解如何利用Amazon Connect观察和管理端到端的客户体验运营，从联系人预测、劳动力排班规划、人工座席辅导等各个方面。了解Amazon Connect如何将AI的力量交到您手中，在联系中心实现端到端的可观测性。

presenter.name: Hannah Bloking
presenter.title: Sr. Manager, Solutions Architecture - Applied AI Acceleration

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Infrastructure protection at scale with AWS Security, ft. Block, Inc. (SEC224)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Security 进行大规模基础设施保护，Block, Inc. 案例分享 (SEC224)
sessions.abstract: Learn best practices from AWS and Block's Network Security team on how to architect a robust network security strategy using AWS Network Firewall, AWS WAF and other security services to protect large-scale infrastructure. This session explores real implementation patterns to protect egress and ingress, covers architectural decisions, and lessons learned while building advanced security controls.
sessions.abstract_cn: 从AWS和Block的网络安全团队学习最佳实践，了解如何使用AWS Network Firewall、AWS WAF和其他安全服务构建强大的网络安全策略，以保护大规模基础设施。本次会议探讨了保护出站和入站流量的实际实施模式，涵盖架构决策以及在构建高级安全控制时获得的经验教训。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Art of Embracing Failures in Serverless Architectures (DEV312)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 无服务器架构中拥抱失败的艺术 (DEV312)
sessions.abstract: Serverless architectures offer the immense power of distributed systems wrapped in irresistible simplicity. But that simplicity is an illusion. Explore hidden pitfalls in distributed systems and practical strategies to build resilience, illustrated with real-world examples using AWS Lambda and Amazon Kinesis. Above all, embrace failures. In the words of Dr. Werner Vogels: everything fails, all the time.
sessions.abstract_cn: 无服务器架构提供了分布式系统的巨大能力,并以不可抗拒的简单性呈现。但这种简单性是一种假象。探索分布式系统中的隐藏陷阱以及构建弹性的实用策略,并通过使用 AWS Lambda 和 Amazon Kinesis 的真实案例进行说明。最重要的是,拥抱失败。用 Werner Vogels 博士的话来说:一切都会失败,无时无刻。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Disaster Recovery (DR) with AWS Elastic Disaster Recovery Service (COP356)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Elastic Disaster Recovery 服务进行灾难恢复 (COP356)
sessions.abstract: Scaling your disaster recovery (DR) strategy when you're working with environments that contain databases, directory services, and ERP solutions isn't easy.  In this session, we'll go over best practices for scaling your testing and application recovery capabilities, and show you how to get more out of your DR environments with AWS Elastic Disaster Recovery.
sessions.abstract_cn: 当您处理包含数据库、目录服务和ERP解决方案的环境时,扩展灾难恢复(DR)策略并非易事。在本次会议中,我们将介绍扩展测试和应用程序恢复能力的最佳实践,并向您展示如何通过AWS Elastic Disaster Recovery充分利用您的灾难恢复环境。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Coding cost-efficient multi-tenant knowledge bases w/ time-to-live (TTL)-SAS412
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用生存时间(TTL)编写具有成本效益的多租户知识库-SAS412
sessions.abstract: This code-focused session demonstrates how to build cost-efficient, multi-tenant knowledge bases using time-to-live (TTL) operations to dramatically reduce infrastructure costs in SaaS environments. We'll live-code a serverless architecture that ingests documents only when needed and automatically expires unused documents, addressing the critical challenge of managing multiple tenants with varying usage patterns. The session will showcase practical implementation of Amazon Bedrock's custom data source with DynamoDB TTL triggers and intelligent document lifecycle management. Define a tiered based approach by implementing the knowledge base with a choice of vector databases, such as OpenSearch and S3 Vectors. We'll also explore broader applications of TTL-driven session management, cache optimization, and tenant resource provisioning.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本代码实战课程演示如何使用生存时间（TTL）操作构建成本高效的多租户知识库，以大幅降低 SaaS 环境中的基础设施成本。我们将现场编写一个无服务器架构，仅在需要时摄取文档并自动使文档过期，解决管理具有不同使用模式的多个租户这一关键挑战。本课程将展示 Amazon Bedrock 自定义数据源与 DynamoDB TTL 触发器和智能文档生命周期管理的实际实现。通过选择向量数据库（如 OpenSearch 和 S3 Vectors）实现知识库，定义基于分层的方法。我们还将探讨 TTL 驱动的会话管理、缓存优化和租户资源配置的更广泛应用。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scaling support, compliance, & productivity with conversational AI at Coinbase
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在Coinbase利用对话式AI扩展支持、合规性和生产力
sessions.abstract: Discover how Coinbase transformed customer support, compliance automation, and employee productivity using a unified AI platform powered by Amazon Bedrock. This multi-layered system integrates knowledge bases, real-time tool execution, and domain-specific AI agents to handle tens of thousands of interactions monthly. The platform enables fully agentic customer support, compliance and other productivity workflows, optimizes manual reviews, and improves productivity with intelligent task routing and seamless integration with Coinbase's tools. We'll examine its automated testing, performance metrics, and robust security measures, ensuring scalable and reliable operations.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Coinbase 如何使用由 Amazon Bedrock 驱动的统一 AI 平台来转变客户支持、合规自动化和员工生产力。这个多层系统集成了知识库、实时工具执行和特定领域的 AI 代理，每月处理数万次交互。该平台实现了完全自主的客户支持、合规和其他生产力工作流程，优化了人工审核，并通过智能任务路由和与 Coinbase 工具的无缝集成提高了生产力。我们将研究其自动化测试、性能指标和强大的安全措施，确保可扩展和可靠的运营。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building .NET AI Applications with Semantic Kernel and Amazon Bedrock (DEV302)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Semantic Kernel 和 Amazon Bedrock 构建 .NET AI 应用程序 (DEV302)
sessions.abstract: This code-first session demonstrates how to transform .NET applications into powerful AI solutions using Semantic Kernel and Amazon Bedrock. The presentation explores the Semantic Kernel framework and its integration with Amazon Bedrock's AI capabilities, including flexible foundation model selection and multi-turn conversational abilities. Learn how to leverage Amazon Bedrock for extensible tool usage in AI applications. Through practical examples, the session covers techniques for enhancing existing applications and building new AI-powered solutions in .NET, providing developers with actionable skills for AI integration.
sessions.abstract_cn: 本次代码实践会议演示了如何使用 Semantic Kernel 和 Amazon Bedrock 将 .NET 应用程序转变为强大的 AI 解决方案。演示探讨了 Semantic Kernel 框架及其与 Amazon Bedrock AI 能力的集成,包括灵活的基础模型选择和多轮对话能力。了解如何利用 Amazon Bedrock 在 AI 应用程序中实现可扩展的工具使用。通过实际示例,本次会议涵盖了增强现有应用程序和构建新的 AI 驱动解决方案的技术,为开发人员提供 AI 集成的可操作技能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI driven application modernization at scale (MAM103)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模AI驱动的应用现代化 (MAM103)
sessions.abstract: Learn how to transform complex legacy workloads—like Java, ERP, and mainframe systems—into agile, cloud-ready applications using Pega Blueprint and GenAI. This session explores how to overcome modernization challenges such as technical debt, integration risks, and workflow transformation. Discover how AI-powered design agents and model-driven architectures accelerate transformation while preserving business continuity and data integrity. Whether you are tackling contact center, field services, or core banking modernization, this session equips you with practical strategies to reimagine legacy systems and unlock enterprise agility. This presentation is brought to you by Pega, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 学习如何使用 Pega Blueprint 和 GenAI 将复杂的遗留工作负载（如 Java、ERP 和大型机系统）转变为敏捷的云就绪应用程序。本次会议探讨如何克服现代化挑战，例如技术债务、集成风险和工作流转型。了解 AI 驱动的设计代理和模型驱动架构如何加速转型，同时保持业务连续性和数据完整性。无论您是在处理联络中心、现场服务还是核心银行现代化，本次会议都将为您提供实用策略，以重新构想遗留系统并释放企业敏捷性。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Pega 提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Real-time insights for smart manufacturing with AWS Serverless (CNS375)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 无服务器实现智能制造的实时洞察 (CNS375)
sessions.abstract: Learn how to create applications that use real-time updates to improve user engagement. In this workshop, you will build a multiplayer game with real-time updates and a live leaderboard. Use AWS Amplify to connect an application frontend to a serverless backend. You must bring your laptop to participate.
sessions.abstract_cn: 学习如何创建使用实时更新来提高用户参与度的应用程序。在本研讨会中，您将构建一个具有实时更新和实时排行榜的多人游戏。使用 AWS Amplify 将应用程序前端连接到无服务器后端。您必须携带笔记本电脑才能参加。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Customer Story: AI Adoption with Salesforce & Amazon Bedrock (AIM267)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 客户案例：Salesforce 与 Amazon Bedrock 的 AI 应用实践 (AIM267)
sessions.abstract: Learn how regulated industries use Anthropic on Amazon Bedrock in Agentforce to deploy secure, compliant AI agents, spotlighting our joint customer’s scale success. This presentation is brought to you by Salesforce, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解受监管行业如何在 Agentforce 中使用 Amazon Bedrock 上的 Anthropic 来部署安全、合规的 AI 代理，重点展示我们共同客户的规模化成功案例。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Salesforce 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Troubleshooting database performance issues at scale (COP331)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模数据库性能问题故障排查 (COP331)
sessions.abstract: Managing database fleets at scale means finding that one problematic instance among hundreds before it impacts customers. This lightning talk demonstrates how to rapidly identify and resolve performance bottlenecks across diverse Aurora and RDS database engines. Learn to leverage CloudWatch Database Insights for fleet-wide monitoring, SQL-level diagnostics with execution plans and lock analysis, and performance trend analysis. The session reveals practical techniques for correlating application signals with database metrics, analyzing slow queries, performance troubleshooting workflows.
sessions.abstract_cn: 大规模管理数据库集群意味着在数百个实例中找到那个有问题的实例，以免影响客户。本次闪电演讲演示了如何快速识别和解决跨不同 Aurora 和 RDS 数据库引擎的性能瓶颈。学习利用 CloudWatch Database Insights 进行集群范围监控、使用执行计划和锁分析进行 SQL 级别诊断以及性能趋势分析。本次会议揭示了将应用程序信号与数据库指标关联、分析慢查询、性能故障排除工作流程的实用技术。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Keynote with CEO Matt Garman
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 首席执行官Matt Garman主题演讲
sessions.abstract: Join AWS CEO Matt Garman to hear how AWS is innovating across every aspect of the world’s leading cloud. He explores how we are reinventing foundational building blocks as well as developing brand new experiences, all to empower customers and partners with what they need to build a better future.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入AWS首席执行官Matt Garman，了解AWS如何在全球领先云计算的各个方面进行创新。他探讨了我们如何重塑基础构建模块以及开发全新体验，所有这些都是为了赋能客户和合作伙伴构建更美好的未来所需的能力。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate product development lifecycle with a product digital twin (IND371)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过产品数字孪生加速产品开发生命周期 (IND371)
sessions.abstract: In this session, discover how cloud computing can shorten the development lifecycle for new products. We will demonstrate this by building a product lifecycle digital thread and using real-world connected product data to iterate on design. Through reference architectures and a live demonstration, we will show how to accelerate embedded software development and hardware design using real-world usage data, digital twins, and simulation, leading to reduced time-to-market, improved product quality, and enhanced cross-functional collaboration.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，探索云计算如何缩短新产品的开发周期。我们将通过构建产品生命周期数字线程并使用真实世界的联网产品数据来迭代设计，以此进行演示。通过参考架构和现场演示，我们将展示如何使用真实世界的使用数据、数字孪生和仿真来加速嵌入式软件开发和硬件设计，从而缩短上市时间、提高产品质量并增强跨职能协作。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Nova 2: Enterprise intelligence optimized for the real world (AIM3342)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Nova 2：为真实世界优化的企业智能 (AIM3342)
sessions.abstract: Introducing Amazon Nova 2 Lite and Nova 2 Pro with powerful any-to-text capabilities. This session explores how Nova 2 processes multiple input modalities—text, image, video, audio, and speech—to generate intelligent text responses optimized for real-world applications. We will dive into practical implementations of Nova 2 tool-calling features, browser automation, and seamless integration with development platforms. Whether you're building enterprise applications, handling complex document processing, or developing customer service solutions, this session will show you how to harness Nova 2's any-to-text capabilities for your specific use cases.
sessions.abstract_cn: 介绍 Amazon Nova 2 Lite 和 Nova 2 Pro 及其强大的任意输入到文本的能力。本次会议探讨 Nova 2 如何处理多种输入模态——文本、图像、视频、音频和语音——以生成针对实际应用优化的智能文本响应。我们将深入探讨 Nova 2 工具调用功能、浏览器自动化以及与开发平台无缝集成的实际实现。无论您是构建企业应用程序、处理复杂文档处理，还是开发客户服务解决方案，本次会议都将向您展示如何针对您的特定用例利用 Nova 2 的任意输入到文本能力。

presenter.name: Firat Elbey
presenter.title: Principal Product Manager - Tech, AGI FMs

presenter.name: Ryan Hoium
presenter.title: Head of Applied AI Solutions, Amazon Nova

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Customize Your Mainframe Modernization with Composable agentic AI (MAM347)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用可组合代理式AI定制您的大型机现代化 (MAM347)
sessions.abstract: Master custom mainframe modernization with composable architecture. See how enterprise leaders are accelerating their modernization journeys by integrating specialized partner tools directly into AWS workflows with the power of agentic AI. Transformation leaders from Western Union and Unum will demonstrate how they built tailored solutions to address their unique modernization challenges, dramatically accelerating timelines while reducing risk. Learn how this composable approach enables customized solutions for even the most complex mainframe environments, and discover how to craft your optimized modernization workflow using AWS services integrated with trusted partner solutions.
sessions.abstract_cn: 通过可组合架构掌握定制化大型机现代化。了解企业领导者如何借助代理式AI的力量，将专业合作伙伴工具直接集成到AWS工作流程中，从而加速其现代化进程。来自西联汇款和Unum的转型领导者将展示他们如何构建定制化解决方案来应对独特的现代化挑战，大幅加快时间表同时降低风险。了解这种可组合方法如何为最复杂的大型机环境提供定制化解决方案，并探索如何使用AWS服务与可信赖的合作伙伴解决方案相集成，打造您的优化现代化工作流程。

presenter.name: Saurabh Shrivastava
presenter.title: Sr. Manager, WW Specialist Solutions Architecture

presenter.name: Will Holloway
presenter.title: Vice President, Consumer Service Products & Operations

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Another Axiom: Migrating the backend for hit game Gorilla Tag to AWS (IND396)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 另一个公理：将热门游戏 Gorilla Tag 的后端迁移到 AWS (IND396)
sessions.abstract: Learn how leading VR gaming studio Another Axiom modernized their backend infrastructure by building a custom backend platform with AWS. Follow their journey from a patchwork of legacy vendor systems to a scalable, future-proof solution that powers all their games. Explore how they optimized performance, costs, and observability, with Amazon Fargate and AWS Graviton Processors, Amazon Aurora, and CloudWatch APM. This talk explores architectural decisions, performance bottlenecks, and cost optimization techniques that enabled seamless scaling while maintaining an immersive experience for 100k+ peak concurrent players.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解领先的VR游戏工作室Another Axiom如何通过使用AWS构建自定义后端平台来实现其后端基础设施的现代化。跟随他们从拼凑的传统供应商系统到可扩展、面向未来的解决方案的旅程，该解决方案为他们所有的游戏提供支持。探索他们如何通过Amazon Fargate和AWS Graviton处理器、Amazon Aurora以及CloudWatch APM优化性能、成本和可观测性。本次演讲探讨了架构决策、性能瓶颈和成本优化技术，这些技术实现了无缝扩展，同时为10万+峰值并发玩家保持沉浸式体验。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Fine-tuning models for accuracy and latency at Robinhood Markets (IND392)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在 Robinhood Markets 微调模型以提高准确性和降低延迟 (IND392)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Robinhood enhanced their AI performance using Amazon SageMaker and Amazon Bedrock to optimize large language models (LLMs). This solution achieved 80% lower latency on key agentic tasks while scaling to millions of tokens per minute. Learn practical techniques for fine-tuning foundation models with Amazon SageMaker and implementing high-performing inference on Amazon Bedrock. This session covers model selection, optimization strategies, and deployment best practices for teams looking to improve their AI applications on AWS.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Robinhood 如何使用 Amazon SageMaker 和 Amazon Bedrock 增强其 AI 性能以优化大语言模型 (LLM)。该解决方案在关键代理任务上实现了 80% 的延迟降低，同时扩展到每分钟数百万个令牌。学习使用 Amazon SageMaker 微调基础模型以及在 Amazon Bedrock 上实现高性能推理的实用技术。本课程涵盖模型选择、优化策略和部署最佳实践，适用于希望在 AWS 上改进其 AI 应用程序的团队。

presenter.name: Davide Giovanardi
presenter.title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer Gen AI

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A leader's guide to advanced mental models and mechanisms (SNR303)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 领导者高级思维模型与机制指南 (SNR303)
sessions.abstract: To build a lasting, performant corporate culture, you need not only strong mental models to guide your employees and help them make decisions but also the right mechanisms to operationalize company values and mental models—and to help them persist. This session examines why organizational culture erodes over time, dives into the organizational artifacts that reinforce existing cultural patterns, and shares some of the best practices that help create strong mechanisms, using examples from Amazon’s own journey.
sessions.abstract_cn: 要建立持久且高效的企业文化，不仅需要强大的思维模型来指导员工并帮助他们做出决策，还需要正确的机制来将公司价值观和思维模型付诸实践，并帮助它们持续存在。本次会议探讨了组织文化随时间推移而衰退的原因，深入研究了强化现有文化模式的组织工件，并分享了一些有助于创建强大机制的最佳实践，其中使用了亚马逊自身历程中的案例。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Powering your success through AWS Infrastructure innovations (NET402)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 AWS 基础设施创新助力您的成功 (NET402)
sessions.abstract: Discover how AWS Networking delivers on five critical outcomes: availability, performance, scalability, agility, and cost. Come and learn about continual infrastructure advancements in datacenter technologies, and how we integrate lessons from our GenAI scaling journey. As one of the world's top network device makers, we've applied these innovations to make all workloads - including AI/ML - faster and more reliable. In this session, you will learn how the AWS backbone is more reliable from transformative cloud infrastructure innovations, giving your workloads competitive advantages in today's evolving technological landscape.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 AWS 网络如何实现五个关键成果：可用性、性能、可扩展性、敏捷性和成本。来了解数据中心技术的持续基础设施进步，以及我们如何整合从生成式 AI 扩展之旅中获得的经验教训。作为全球顶级网络设备制造商之一，我们已将这些创新应用于使所有工作负载（包括 AI/ML）更快、更可靠。在本次会议中，您将了解 AWS 骨干网如何通过变革性云基础设施创新变得更加可靠，为您的工作负载在当今不断发展的技术环境中提供竞争优势。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Rewriting the Code: Forging the future with AI, Empathy and Change (WOC101)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 重写代码：用AI、同理心和变革锻造未来 (WOC101)
sessions.abstract: Tech can change the world; empathy ensures it changes for the better. This session examines the critical intersection of generative AI, emotional intelligence, and women's unique role in shaping technology's future. Leaders and change makers are not just participants in the digital revolution—they are architects of more inclusive workplaces, industries, and communities. AWS is at the forefront of this transformation, implementing robust governance frameworks for responsible AI development. Women technologists at AWS are leading initiatives to ensure AI systems are trained on a variety of datasets and incorporate inclusive design principles from the ground up. Participants will gain perspectives on how AI-driven solutions can reduce bias, amplify voices, and create pathways for equitable progress. Let’s rewrite the code! This session is sponsored by Deloitte.
sessions.abstract_cn: 技术可以改变世界；同理心确保它向更好的方向改变。本次会议探讨生成式人工智能、情商以及女性在塑造技术未来中的独特角色这一关键交叉点。领导者和变革者不仅仅是数字革命的参与者——她们是更具包容性的工作场所、行业和社区的架构师。AWS处于这一转型的最前沿，实施强大的治理框架以实现负责任的人工智能开发。AWS的女性技术专家正在领导各项举措，以确保人工智能系统在各种数据集上进行训练，并从一开始就纳入包容性设计原则。参与者将获得关于人工智能驱动的解决方案如何减少偏见、放大声音并为公平进步创造途径的见解。让我们重写代码！本次会议由德勤赞助。

presenter.name: Mackenzie Herzog
presenter.title: VP, Player Performance and Strategic Innovation

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Seamless Network-based Fraud Protection for FinTech & Digital Business (SEC216)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 面向金融科技和数字业务的无缝网络欺诈防护 (SEC216)
sessions.abstract: Online fraud is no longer isolated — it’s industrialized, scalable, and relentless. From synthetic identities and account takeovers to payment scams and traffic pumping, today’s attacks are powered by crime-as-a-service tools that evolve faster than traditional defenses. FinTechs and Digital Businesses are under pressure to meet strict compliance requirements while delivering seamless, user-friendly experiences — yet every additional security check risks customer churn. The cost of failure is staggering: direct losses, missed revenue, and significant erosion of brand trust. This talk explores how mobile network intelligence adds an invisible, real-time layer of fraud protection, building brand trust while improving customer experiences This presentation is brought to you by Vonage, Part of Ericsson, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在线欺诈不再是孤立的——它已经工业化、规模化且无情。从合成身份和账户接管到支付诈骗和流量欺诈，当今的攻击由犯罪即服务工具驱动，其演变速度超过了传统防御手段。金融科技公司和数字化企业面临着满足严格合规要求的压力，同时还要提供无缝、用户友好的体验——然而每增加一项安全检查都可能导致客户流失。失败的代价是惊人的：直接损失、收入损失以及品牌信任的严重侵蚀。本次演讲探讨移动网络智能如何添加一个不可见的实时欺诈保护层，在改善客户体验的同时建立品牌信任。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Vonage（爱立信旗下）为您呈现。

presenter.name: Oscar Rodriguez
presenter.title: Sr. Dir. Global Partner Solutions - API BU

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building AI That Customers Actually Trust (AIM2203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建客户真正信任的人工智能 (AIM2203)
sessions.abstract: AI faces a trust crisis: executives see poor returns while customers find no value in AI-powered customer service and increasingly distrust companies with their data. For product teams navigating boardroom pressure and customer backlash, this creates an urgent challenge. Trust is the currency of AI innovation. This session reveals Qualtrics' playbook for converting AI skeptics into advocates, covering the customer insights that predict AI success and when feedback becomes competitive advantage. Discover where leading companies achieve measurable AI value in customer experience, learn security-first frameworks that build customer confidence, and gain insights from companies successfully building value with AI agents. This presentation is brought to you by Qualtrics, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI面临信任危机：高管认为回报率低，而客户发现AI驱动的客户服务毫无价值，并且越来越不信任公司处理其数据的方式。对于面临董事会压力和客户反弹的产品团队来说，这构成了紧迫的挑战。信任是AI创新的货币。本次会议揭示了Qualtrics将AI怀疑者转变为支持者的策略，涵盖预测AI成功的客户洞察以及反馈何时成为竞争优势。了解领先公司在客户体验中实现可衡量AI价值的领域，学习建立客户信心的安全优先框架，并获得成功利用AI代理创造价值的公司的见解。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Qualtrics提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG: Modernizing critical financial systems with multicloud and hybrid cloud
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG：通过多云和混合云实现关键金融系统现代化
sessions.abstract: Join this session to learn how London Stock Exchange Group (LSEG) is modernizing critical financial infrastructure through multicloud and hybrid cloud adoption. LSEG manages regulated environments across major cloud providers with unified governance, addressing regulatory requirements while maintaining operational efficiency. Using AWS hybrid cloud technology, LSEG is transforming its global PriceStream FX trading platform, implementing a sophisticated architecture for ultra-low latency with managed services. Additionally, LSEG is modernizing clearing systems as critical national infrastructure, balancing regulatory compliance, operational excellence, and business continuity with strict RPO/RTO requirements. Discover how LSEG's journey enables exceptional performance while meeting stringent resiliency and regulatory standards.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入本次会议，了解伦敦证券交易所集团（LSEG）如何通过多云和混合云采用来实现关键金融基础设施的现代化。LSEG通过统一治理管理跨主要云提供商的受监管环境，在保持运营效率的同时满足监管要求。利用AWS混合云技术，LSEG正在转型其全球PriceStream外汇交易平台，通过托管服务实施超低延迟的复杂架构。此外，LSEG正在对作为关键国家基础设施的清算系统进行现代化改造，在严格的RPO/RTO要求下平衡监管合规性、运营卓越性和业务连续性。了解LSEG的转型之旅如何在满足严格的弹性和监管标准的同时实现卓越性能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Load balancing evolved: ALB Target Optimizer (NET336)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 负载均衡的演进：ALB 目标优化器 (NET336)
sessions.abstract: Discover an innovative approach to load balancing where targets actively control load distribution. Traditional load balancers use a push model with predefined algorithms, but this new paradigm implements a pull model that empowers targets to manage their own load. Join us to explore how this new mechanism delivers superior application performance and high target efficiency.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索一种创新的负载均衡方法，其中目标主动控制负载分配。传统负载均衡器使用具有预定义算法的推送模型，但这种新范式实现了拉取模型，使目标能够管理自己的负载。加入我们，探索这种新机制如何提供卓越的应用程序性能和高目标效率。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Vibe modernize your .NET applications using AWS Transform and Kiro (MAM343)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Transform 和 Kiro 对您的 .NET 应用程序进行现代化改造 (MAM343)
sessions.abstract: Looking to make your .NET development faster and easier? Join this live coding session to see how AWS Transform for .NET and Kiro can make your daily coding much smoother! We'll take you through the whole process - starting with a legacy .NET Framework application and porting it into modern .NET using AWS Transform. Then, we'll use Kiro to refactor your codebase leveraging vibe coding and spec driven development. You'll see the entire end-to-end process of modernizing .NET applications, learning practical techniques to enhance your development productivity and efficiently upgrade your existing codebase.
sessions.abstract_cn: 想让您的 .NET 开发更快更轻松吗？加入这场实时编码会议，了解 AWS Transform for .NET 和 Kiro 如何让您的日常编码更加流畅！我们将带您完成整个过程 - 从传统的 .NET Framework 应用程序开始，使用 AWS Transform 将其迁移到现代 .NET。然后，我们将使用 Kiro 通过 vibe coding 和规范驱动开发来重构您的代码库。您将看到 .NET 应用程序现代化的完整端到端流程，学习实用技术来提升开发效率并高效升级现有代码库。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale Customer Engagement with WhatsApp Business on AWS (SEC101)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在 AWS 上使用 WhatsApp Business 扩展客户互动 (SEC101)
sessions.abstract: Customers already rely on WhatsApp every day—now your business can meet them there. In this session, Meta and AWS leaders share how enterprises can quickly and securely set up WhatsApp Business through AWS End User Messaging. Learn how Delhivery, a leading logistics provider in India, uses WhatsApp to deliver time-sensitive updates that improve customer experience and trust. Attendees will leave with practical insights into how messaging can streamline operations, enhance engagement, and unlock new business value. This presentation is brought to you by Meta, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 客户已经每天都在使用WhatsApp——现在您的企业可以在那里与他们会面。在本次会议中，Meta和AWS领导者将分享企业如何通过AWS End User Messaging快速、安全地设置WhatsApp Business。了解印度领先的物流提供商Delhivery如何使用WhatsApp提供时效性更新，从而改善客户体验和信任度。与会者将获得关于消息传递如何简化运营、增强参与度并释放新业务价值的实用见解。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Meta提供。

presenter.name: Venky Krishnan
presenter.title: WW GTM Specialist - Communication Developer Services

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Spec-driven development: Shaping the next generation of AI software (DVT212)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 规范驱动开发：塑造下一代AI软件 (DVT212)
sessions.abstract: When you’re working through a complex feature you need to make tradeoffs between requirements, system design, and implementations details before you deal with the nitty-gritty of writing the code. In this session, learn how spec-driven development can help you go from idea to production without sacrificing any of the crucial development details.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在处理复杂功能时，您需要在需求、系统设计和实现细节之间进行权衡，然后再处理编写代码的具体细节。在本次会议中，了解规范驱动开发如何帮助您从想法到生产，而不会牺牲任何关键的开发细节。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build, fine-tune & deploy AI models with SageMaker HyperPod CLI & SDK (AIM371)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 SageMaker HyperPod CLI 和 SDK 构建、微调和部署 AI 模型 (AIM371)
sessions.abstract: Amazon SageMaker HyperPod helps build, train and deploy AI models at scale. You can spin-up preferred IDE on HyperPod to develop their models and run experiments, then scale to thousands of accelerators to run distributed training and finally deploy models for real-time or batch inference. With HyperPod task governance capabilities, you can optimize the utilization of the cluster resources. In this talk, we will show how interaction with HyperPod clusters is simplified via the SageMaker HyperPod CLI and SDK, which streamlined end-to-end model development, from training, fine-tuning to deployment. We'll show HyperPod CLI/SDK capabilities with live coding and troubleshooting.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon SageMaker HyperPod 帮助大规模构建、训练和部署 AI 模型。您可以在 HyperPod 上启动首选 IDE 来开发模型并运行实验，然后扩展到数千个加速器来运行分布式训练，最后部署模型进行实时或批量推理。通过 HyperPod 任务治理功能，您可以优化集群资源的利用率。在本次演讲中，我们将展示如何通过 SageMaker HyperPod CLI 和 SDK 简化与 HyperPod 集群的交互，从而简化端到端的模型开发流程，包括训练、微调到部署。我们将通过实时编码和故障排除来展示 HyperPod CLI/SDK 的功能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] What's new in Apache Iceberg v3 and beyond (OPN201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] Apache Iceberg v3 及未来版本的新功能 (OPN201)
sessions.abstract: Join us to learn about Apache Iceberg Version 3 (V3) and how it addresses critical challenges in modern data lakes. In this session, we'll explore how V3's variant data type, deletion vectors and row lineage capabilities help organizations reduce storage costs, accelerate data operations, and maintain comprehensive audit trails at petabyte scale. We'll also look ahead to what's coming in Apache Iceberg V4. Whether you're managing large-scale data modifications, maintaining regulatory compliance, or optimizing data pipelines, discover how Iceberg V3 transforms data lake performance while reducing operational complexity and costs.
