The migration involved massive, highly transactional databases, with one critical database reaching 170TB in size. The 15-month project involved massive, highly transactional databases (more than 15 Oracle databases), including a critical 170TB database supporting 80% of their workloads. This presentation is brought to you by Cognizant, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: CCC Intelligent Solutions (CCC) 是保险和汽车行业领先的数字解决方案提供商,成功将其关键数据库从 Oracle 迁移到 PostgreSQL,利用 AWS RDS 和 Aurora PostgreSQL。此战略举措消除了永久无限许可协议 (PULA) 成本,并每月产生额外节省。该迁移涉及大规模、高事务性数据库,其中一个关键数据库达到 170TB。这个为期 15 个月的项目涉及大规模、高事务性数据库(超过 15 个 Oracle 数据库),包括一个支持 80% 工作负载的关键 170TB 数据库。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Cognizant 为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Actionable controls for improving governance and compliance (COP347)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 改善治理和合规性的可操作控制措施 (COP347)
sessions.abstract: Organizations often struggle to translate complex regulatory requirements into practical controls while maintaining continuous compliance and security assurance. Learn how to transform compliance frameworks into actionable AWS controls through effective gap analysis and control mapping. This session shows how to leverage AWS Control Tower, AWS Security Hub, AWS Config, and AWS Audit Manager to build and maintain a scalable governance strategy. We'll explore real-world examples of mapping common controls across multiple frameworks, implementing automated compliance checks, and creating custom control deployments. Discover how to streamline compliance reporting while maintaining continuous security assurance across your AWS organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 组织在将复杂的监管要求转化为实际控制措施的同时保持持续合规性和安全保障方面常常面临挑战。了解如何通过有效的差距分析和控制映射将合规框架转化为可操作的 AWS 控制措施。本课程展示如何利用 AWS Control Tower、AWS Security Hub、AWS Config 和 AWS Audit Manager 构建和维护可扩展的治理策略。我们将探讨跨多个框架映射通用控制措施、实施自动化合规检查以及创建自定义控制部署的实际案例。了解如何在整个 AWS 组织中简化合规报告的同时保持持续的安全保障。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 security and access control best practices (STG316)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 安全性和访问控制最佳实践 (STG316)
sessions.abstract: Building a robust data security strategy begins with choosing the right storage foundation. Amazon S3 provides security settings and granular access controls to suit any workload. In this session, learn about the fundamentals of S3 security and dive deep into the latest enhancements in usability and functionality. Explore options for access control, encryption, monitoring, auditing, and remediation. Discover best practices for data security and access control in S3.
sessions.abstract_cn: 构建强大的数据安全策略始于选择正确的存储基础。Amazon S3 提供安全设置和细粒度访问控制以适应任何工作负载。在本次会议中，了解 S3 安全的基础知识，并深入探讨可用性和功能方面的最新增强功能。探索访问控制、加密、监控、审计和修复的选项。了解 S3 中数据安全和访问控制的最佳实践。

services: Amazon Simple Storage Service Glacier (Amazon S3 Glacier)

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Improve quality and speed across the SDLC with Atlassian Rovo Dev (AIM211)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Atlassian Rovo Dev 提升 SDLC 全流程的质量和速度 (AIM211)
sessions.abstract: Atlassian Rovo Dev, an AI-powered solution, transforms the software development lifecycle (SDLC) by automating repetitive tasks and boosting productivity. This talk explores how Rovo Dev agents streamline every SDLC phase—from planning to deployment—so developers can focus on innovation. Discover how Rovo Dev’s integration and intelligent automation help teams deliver high-quality software faster, reduce bottlenecks, and uphold engineering standards with ease. This presentation is brought to you by Atlassian, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: Atlassian Rovo Dev是一款AI驱动的解决方案，通过自动化重复性任务和提升生产力来变革软件开发生命周期（SDLC）。本次演讲探讨Rovo Dev代理如何简化SDLC的每个阶段——从规划到部署——使开发人员能够专注于创新。了解Rovo Dev的集成和智能自动化如何帮助团队更快地交付高质量软件、减少瓶颈并轻松维护工程标准。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Atlassian提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Colgate, Commonwealth Bank and Mondelez: Why chose AWS for SAP transformation
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 高露洁、澳大利亚联邦银行和亿滋国际：为何选择AWS进行SAP转型
sessions.abstract: For decades, SAP has been the business process backbone for leading companies across nearly every industry; and thousands of customers trust AWS to run SAP.Many customers who are still running their SAP applications on-premises, and their impending SAP migration is part of a broader transformation they are undertaking – where SAP is a critical application, but just one of the components of something bigger. In this session, customers like Colagate, Commonwealth Bank of Australia, and Mondelez will share their transformation journeys including moving SAP applications on AWS, and  how they are partnering with Amazon to chart the future for their organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 数十年来，SAP一直是几乎所有行业领先企业的业务流程支柱；成千上万的客户信任AWS来运行SAP。许多仍在本地运行SAP应用程序的客户，其即将进行的SAP迁移是他们正在进行的更广泛转型的一部分——SAP是关键应用程序，但只是更大规模转型的组成部分之一。在本次会议中，高露洁、澳大利亚联邦银行和亿滋等客户将分享他们的转型历程，包括将SAP应用程序迁移到AWS，以及他们如何与亚马逊合作为其组织规划未来。

presenter.name: Soulat Khan
presenter.title: WW Head of SAP Solution Architects

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Infrastructure for the impossible: Turning public sector barriers into...
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 不可能的基础设施：将公共部门障碍转化为...
sessions.abstract: Discover how AWS innovates on behalf of public sector customers with purpose-built infrastructure and AI. Learn about the journey from AWS GovCloud to the new Secret-West Region, a landmark AI and supercomputing investment for the U.S. government, and the upcoming European Sovereign Cloud. See how the U.S. Navy deployed generative AI at Impact Level 5, and how healthcare organizations are transforming patient care with AI. Hear from two featured speakers on cutting-edge AI for scientific research in national security and transforming government services with agentic AI. Experience how constraints become catalysts—and how AWS infrastructure leads to breakthrough innovation.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 AWS 如何通过专用基础设施和人工智能为公共部门客户进行创新。了解从 AWS GovCloud 到新的 Secret-West 区域的历程，这是美国政府在人工智能和超级计算方面的里程碑式投资，以及即将推出的欧洲主权云。了解美国海军如何在影响级别 5 部署生成式人工智能，以及医疗保健组织如何利用人工智能改变患者护理。聆听两位特邀演讲者介绍国家安全领域科学研究的前沿人工智能，以及如何利用智能体人工智能转变政府服务。体验约束如何成为催化剂，以及 AWS 基础设施如何引领突破性创新。

presenter.name: Dave Levy
presenter.title: Vice President of Worldwide Public Sector and Healthcare & Life Sciences North America

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS & GenAI Power CDG's Telecom Software Modernization Journey (SMB202)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS与生成式AI助力CDG电信软件现代化之旅 (SMB202)
sessions.abstract: Learn how AWS transformed a telecommunications software business in an era where reliable broadband connectivity is essential to daily life. Through AWS Enterprise Support and the Partner Program, Communications Data Group (CDG) achieved 100% year-over-year growth while modernizing solutions for telecom operators. AWS's 24/7 technical support and expertise in cloud architecture, generative AI, and business intelligence enabled CDG's next-generation platform. The session shows how CDG improved efficiency, demonstrating how AWS helps providers scale, manage costs, and enhance customer experiences.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解AWS如何在可靠的宽带连接对日常生活至关重要的时代转型一家电信软件企业。通过AWS企业支持和合作伙伴计划，Communications Data Group (CDG) 实现了100%的同比增长，同时为电信运营商提供现代化解决方案。AWS的全天候技术支持以及在云架构、生成式AI和商业智能方面的专业知识，助力CDG打造下一代平台。该案例展示了CDG如何提高效率，演示了AWS如何帮助服务提供商实现规模化、管理成本并提升客户体验。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Advanced data modeling with Amazon DynamoDB (DAT414)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon DynamoDB 进行高级数据建模 (DAT414)
sessions.abstract: Amazon DynamoDB is a popular choice for modern applications because it’s a serverless database that provides single-digit millisecond performance at any scale. Optimizing your usage of DynamoDB requires a different approach to data modeling than traditional relational databases. In this session, AWS Data Hero Alex DeBrie shows you advanced techniques to help you get the most out of DynamoDB. Learn how to “think in DynamoDB” by learning the DynamoDB foundations and principles for data modeling. Further, learn practical strategies and DynamoDB features to handle difficult use cases in your application.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon DynamoDB 是现代应用程序的热门选择,因为它是一个无服务器数据库,可在任何规模下提供个位数毫秒级性能。优化 DynamoDB 的使用需要采用与传统关系型数据库不同的数据建模方法。在本次会议中,AWS 数据英雄 Alex DeBrie 将向您展示高级技术,帮助您充分利用 DynamoDB。通过学习 DynamoDB 基础知识和数据建模原则,了解如何"以 DynamoDB 的方式思考"。此外,还将学习实用策略和 DynamoDB 功能,以处理应用程序中的复杂用例。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Data to Action: Agentic-Powered Humanitarian Response (AIM222)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从数据到行动：智能体驱动的人道主义响应 (AIM222)
sessions.abstract:
Discover how Cloudera's "Data Anywhere for AI Everywhere" vision powers MercyCORE—an agentic AI platform developed with Mercy Corps, a global humanitarian aid organization, to revolutionize crisis response.
MercyCORE enables real-time access to diverse data sources, from news and social media to custom streams. Crisis responders can dynamically configure new information sources on-the-fly, while natural language interaction democratizes data science and accelerates decision-making.
This breakthrough delivers mission-critical insights where needed most, enabling faster, more effective humanitarian aid in rapidly evolving emergencies. Learn how to leverage AI agents for meaningful impact This presentation is brought to you by Cloudera, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn:
了解Cloudera的"数据无处不在，AI无所不能"愿景如何为MercyCORE提供支持——这是一个与全球人道主义援助组织Mercy Corps共同开发的代理式AI平台，旨在彻底改变危机响应方式。

MercyCORE能够实时访问多样化的数据源，从新闻和社交媒体到自定义数据流。危机响应人员可以动态配置新的信息源，而自然语言交互使数据科学大众化并加速决策制定。

这一突破性进展在最需要的地方提供关键任务洞察，使人道主义援助在快速演变的紧急情况下更快速、更有效。了解如何利用AI代理产生有意义的影响。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Cloudera为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Prudential’s microagent platform with MCP and A2A on AWS (IND3302)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在AWS上使用MCP和A2A构建Prudential的微代理平台 (IND3302)
sessions.abstract: Enterprises are exploring ways to scale their AI agent implementations beyond initial use cases. Learn how Prudential Financial is moving beyond single-purpose deployments with a scalable, microagent architecture powered by Amazon Bedrock and MCP agent-to-agent (A2A) communication. Prudential will share how their financial advisor assistant became the foundation for an enterprise multi-agent system, supporting diverse scenarios through modular design, independent scaling, and seamless deployment on AWS. Whether you’re exploring AI agents for specific business needs or building a foundation for enterprise-wide adoption, walk away with patterns and best practices for scaling AI agents.
sessions.abstract_cn: 企业正在探索如何将其AI代理实施扩展到初始用例之外。了解保德信金融如何通过由Amazon Bedrock和MCP代理到代理(A2A)通信驱动的可扩展微代理架构，超越单一用途部署。保德信将分享其财务顾问助手如何成为企业多代理系统的基础，通过模块化设计、独立扩展和在AWS上的无缝部署来支持多样化场景。无论您是在探索针对特定业务需求的AI代理，还是在构建企业级采用的基础，都可以获得扩展AI代理的模式和最佳实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Your AI Agent Is Expensive and Wrong (Let's Fix Both) (AIM264)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 你的AI代理既昂贵又不准确(让我们一起解决这两个问题) (AIM264)
sessions.abstract: More than 80% of AI projects fail. The reason? Customers are not ready to put AI in production in areas where the Agent can cause reputational or financial harm. Agent Bricks solves this by automatically generating domain‑specific synthetic data and task‑aware benchmarks, then using those benchmarks to optimize the Agents for accuracy, latency and expense—eliminating the tedious trial‑and‑error cycle. In this session you’ll see how to design and scale multi‑agent systems that combine retrieval, reasoning, and generation to answer complex, enterprise‑grounded queries, while tracking experiments, fine‑tuning models, and building governed, repeatable workflows that can be deployed at scale on AWS. This presentation is brought to you by Databricks, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 超过80%的AI项目以失败告终。原因何在?客户尚未准备好在可能造成声誉或财务损害的领域将AI投入生产。AgentBricks通过自动生成特定领域的合成数据和任务感知基准来解决这一问题,然后使用这些基准优化Agent的准确性、延迟和成本——消除繁琐的试错循环。在本次会议中,您将了解如何设计和扩展多Agent系统,该系统结合检索、推理和生成来回答复杂的企业级查询,同时跟踪实验、微调模型并构建可在AWS上大规模部署的受治理、可重复的工作流。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Databricks提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Simplifying orchestrations with JSONata and AWS Step Functions (API323)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 JSONata 和 AWS Step Functions 简化编排 (API323)
sessions.abstract: Learn how to transform your workflows with AWS Step Functions and JSONata. This session demonstrates how to simplify your orchestrations and perform sophisticated data transformations directly within your state machines without additional AWS Lambda functions or compute resources. Through live examples, discover how this approach reduces costs and optimizes resource utilization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何使用 AWS Step Functions 和 JSONata 转换您的工作流程。本次会议演示如何简化编排并直接在状态机中执行复杂的数据转换，无需额外的 AWS Lambda 函数或计算资源。通过实时示例，探索这种方法如何降低成本并优化资源利用率。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Cloud WAN MCP Server: Transform network operations with GenAI (NET331)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Cloud WAN MCP 服务器：利用生成式 AI 转变网络运营 (NET331)
sessions.abstract: Ready to experience the power of debugging network issues through natural language queries? Discover how AWS Cloud WAN's Model Context Protocol (MCP) server leverages Generative AI to redefine network operations. In this session, learn how to use common, complex scenarios including trace network paths using natural language queries, analyzing AWS Cloud WAN Core Network policies through simple prompts, and troubleshoot global routing with AI-assisted intelligent analysis. Perfect for network professionals who want to explore streamlining their AWS infrastructure management while embracing the future of AI-powered networking tools.
sessions.abstract_cn: 准备好体验通过自然语言查询调试网络问题的强大功能了吗？了解 AWS Cloud WAN 的模型上下文协议 (MCP) 服务器如何利用生成式 AI 重新定义网络运维。在本次会议中，学习如何使用常见的复杂场景，包括使用自然语言查询跟踪网络路径、通过简单提示分析 AWS Cloud WAN 核心网络策略，以及借助 AI 辅助智能分析排查全球路由故障。非常适合希望简化 AWS 基础设施管理同时拥抱 AI 驱动网络工具未来的网络专业人士。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building custom agents for intelligent AWS patch automation  (COP407)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为智能 AWS 补丁自动化构建自定义代理 (COP407)
sessions.abstract: Organizations face mounting challenges from manual patching, fragmented compliance, and limited visibility. In this code talk, we'll build an agentic solution with Strands Agents SDK and AWS services to transform patch management. We’ll walk through turning operational requirements into interactive, production-ready agent workflows—driving automated remediation and rapid vulnerability checks. Attendees will leave equipped with implementation patterns, code samples, and best practices to streamline operations, and strengthen security.
sessions.abstract_cn: 组织面临着手动修补、分散的合规性和有限可见性带来的日益严峻的挑战。在本次代码讲座中，我们将使用 Strands Agents SDK 和 AWS 服务构建一个智能体解决方案，以转变补丁管理方式。我们将演示如何将运营需求转化为交互式、生产就绪的智能体工作流程——推动自动化修复和快速漏洞检查。参会者将掌握实施模式、代码示例和最佳实践，以简化运营并增强安全性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming FinServ AI DLC with Kiro Agentic IDE (DEV203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Kiro 智能体 IDE 转型金融服务 AI DLC (DEV203)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Kiro Agentic IDE revolutionizes financial services application development through intelligent code generation, automated compliance checks, and context-aware suggestions. This session shares real-world implementation experiences, productivity gains achieved, and lessons learned while building secure, regulated financial applications. Learn practical strategies for integrating AI-powered development tools into traditional FinServ workflows, overcoming regulatory challenges, and measuring developer productivity improvements in highly regulated environments.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 Kiro Agentic IDE 如何通过智能代码生成、自动化合规检查和上下文感知建议彻底改变金融服务应用程序开发。本次会议分享真实的实施经验、取得的生产力提升，以及在构建安全、受监管的金融应用程序时获得的经验教训。学习将 AI 驱动的开发工具集成到传统金融服务工作流程中的实用策略，克服监管挑战，并在高度监管的环境中衡量开发人员生产力的提升。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Slack Platform: Build with AI-Powered Development (AIM111)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Slack 平台：使用 AI 驱动的开发进行构建 (AIM111)
sessions.abstract: Learn how to create, use, and launch AI-powered Slack apps, including existing AWS systems, into Slack with minimal effort. See how GitHub, Cursor, Codex, AWS and other tools run natively in Slack channels, enabling multi-player AI interactions. By bringing your custom and third-party solutions together in one context-rich conversational interface, your AI tools turn into collaborative teammates to streamline your business operations. This presentation is brought to you by Slack from Salesforce, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何创建、使用和启动 AI 驱动的 Slack 应用程序，包括将现有 AWS 系统轻松集成到 Slack 中。了解 GitHub、Cursor、Codex、AWS 和其他工具如何在 Slack 频道中原生运行，实现多人 AI 交互。通过将您的自定义和第三方解决方案整合到一个富含上下文的对话界面中，您的 AI 工具将转变为协作队友，简化您的业务运营。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Salesforce 旗下的 Slack 提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating the Connected Future: EDA for the unpredictable (IND308)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 加速互联未来：应对不可预测性的事件驱动架构 (IND308)
sessions.abstract: Join us to learn how BMW RemoteServices transformed their backend to a fully Serverless Event-Driven Architecture (EDA) to meet increased scaling demands and improve innovation velocity whilst maximizing cost efficiency. We share insights into the architecture supporting BMW's next generation of vehicles, Neue Klasse, and explore strategies for breaking down monolithic applications into flexible, event-driven microservices. This architecture, featuring various AWS Serverless services, demonstrates how to orchestrate loosely coupled services into discrete blocks of business logic.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们，了解BMW RemoteServices如何将其后端转型为完全无服务器的事件驱动架构(EDA)，以满足不断增长的扩展需求，提高创新速度，同时最大化成本效率。我们将分享支持BMW下一代车型Neue Klasse的架构见解，并探讨将单体应用程序分解为灵活的事件驱动微服务的策略。该架构采用了多种AWS无服务器服务，展示了如何将松耦合服务编排为离散的业务逻辑模块。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Greenfield unlocked: Best practices for expanding new customer engagement-PEX206
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 -绿地解锁：扩展新客户参与的最佳实践-PEX206
sessions.abstract: Experience the evolution of greenfield partner programs today. Discover what works and what doesn't through real partner feedback. Grow your new customer engagement practice by combining strategic funding with AI-powered tools and intelligent automation, like our Partner-First Scale model and more. Learn about the right sales motion for every customer need, allowing you to provide more personalized solutions as you streamline your customer's journey from initial engagement to successful implementation. Whether you're a consulting or technology partner, this session will teach you how to leverage AWS's funding, tools, and support to help you start growing your greenfield practice.
sessions.abstract_cn: 立即体验全新合作伙伴项目的演进。通过真实合作伙伴反馈了解哪些有效、哪些无效。通过将战略资金与AI驱动的工具和智能自动化相结合，例如我们的合作伙伴优先规模化模型等，发展您的新客户参与实践。了解适合每种客户需求的正确销售策略，使您能够提供更个性化的解决方案，同时简化客户从初始接触到成功实施的全过程。无论您是咨询合作伙伴还是技术合作伙伴，本课程将教您如何利用AWS的资金、工具和支持来帮助您开始发展全新业务实践。

presenter.name: Rehan Shah
presenter.title: Head of Channel and Partner Sales - US GF and T2k

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Deploy Quick Suite at scale with confidence and control (BIZ225)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模部署 Quick Suite，充满信心与掌控力 (BIZ225)
sessions.abstract: Learn how enterprise deployment strategies enable Quick Suite scale while maintaining security and operational excellence. Through a compelling customer story, discover how leading organizations have successfully deployed  AI agents, automation, and business intelligence capabilities of Quick Suite across global operations while meeting strict regulatory requirements. Explore identity management integration, access control patterns, and governance frameworks. Discover monitoring and audit strategies that ensure proper oversight while enable business agility across multi-account and cross-region deployments.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解企业部署策略如何在保持安全性和卓越运营的同时实现 Quick Suite 的规模化。通过引人入胜的客户案例，探索领先组织如何在满足严格监管要求的同时，成功地在全球运营中部署 Quick Suite 的 AI 代理、自动化和商业智能能力。探索身份管理集成、访问控制模式和治理框架。了解监控和审计策略，这些策略可确保在多账户和跨区域部署中实现适当监督的同时支持业务敏捷性。

presenter.name: Emily Zhu
presenter.title: Sr. Product Manager, Amazon Quick Suite, AWS

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI in the Cloud: Surveillance, Sabotage, and Security (AIM242)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 云中的人工智能：监控、破坏与安全 (AIM242)
sessions.abstract: Your AI-powered cloud is humming with activity, running advanced AI applications, but so are your adversaries. Last year we introduced the security for AI blueprint; now it is time to step into the role of operative. Hidden in the layers of data and code are covert risks, adversarial models, poisoned pipelines, and stealthy attacks. In this session, we will decode the enemy’s playbook and arm you with actionable intelligence to stay ahead. Learn how to expose blind spots, neutralize threats, and carry out your mission of keeping your AI-driven cloud secure, no matter how advanced the opposition becomes. This presentation is brought to you by Trend Micro, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 您的AI驱动云正在高效运行，执行着先进的AI应用程序，但您的对手也是如此。去年我们推出了AI安全蓝图；现在是时候扮演行动者的角色了。隐藏在数据和代码层中的是隐蔽风险、对抗性模型、被污染的管道以及隐秘攻击。在本次会议中，我们将解码敌人的策略手册，并为您提供可操作的情报以保持领先。了解如何暴露盲点、消除威胁，并执行您的任务——无论对手变得多么先进，都要确保AI驱动云的安全。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Trend Micro提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From concept to production: Build with spec-driven development & Kiro  (DVT320)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从概念到生产：使用规范驱动开发和 Kiro 进行构建 (DVT320)
sessions.abstract: Join us for an exciting live coding session where we'll demonstrate the power of spec-driven development using Kiro, the AI IDE that's transforming how we build applications. Watch as we take a simple prompt and transform it into a fully functional application through Kiro's structured approach. You'll see firsthand how Kiro converts requirements into clear specifications, system designs, and discrete tasks while maintaining robust engineering practices.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们激动人心的实时编码会议，我们将演示使用 Kiro 进行规范驱动开发的强大功能。Kiro 是一款正在改变我们构建应用程序方式的 AI IDE。观看我们如何通过 Kiro 的结构化方法，将一个简单的提示转换为功能完整的应用程序。您将亲眼看到 Kiro 如何将需求转换为清晰的规范、系统设计和离散任务，同时保持稳健的工程实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Global GenAI trends and learnings at re:Invent (GBL206)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - re:Invent全球生成式AI趋势与经验分享 (GBL206)
sessions.abstract: [This session is conducted in Japanese] Generative AI technology is advancing at an astonishingly fast pace globally and many customers are exploring innovation with it. In that time, re:Invent is one of the best way to find out insights and chances to your next innovation. This session provides you preliminary knowledge to make your understanding more deeper to up-coming service launches, exciting customer stories and your chances to the future. We will share you global customer stories, common challenges and key points of recent service launches. Please join this session and be prepared for up-coming re:Invent!
sessions.abstract_cn: 生成式AI技術正在全球以驚人的速度發展，許多客戶正在探索如何利用它進行創新。在這個時期，re:Invent是發現洞察和尋找下一個創新機會的最佳方式之一。本次會議將為您提供初步知識，使您能夠更深入地理解即將推出的服務、令人興奮的客戶案例以及您未來的機會。我們將與您分享全球客戶案例、常見挑戰以及最新服務發布的關鍵要點。請參加本次會議，為即將到來的re:Invent做好準備！

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - An insider’s look into architecture choices for Amazon DynamoDB (DAT436)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 深入了解 Amazon DynamoDB 的架构选择 (DAT436)
sessions.abstract: To overcome the performance and scale limitations of relational databases, AWS built Amazon DynamoDB to deliver consistent single-digit millisecond performance at any scale for the most demanding applications on the planet. In this session, learn about the architecture choices for Amazon DynamoDB. Gain a better understanding of when to use DynamoDB and why DynamoDB is used by over one million AWS customers, and powers hundreds of applications that exceed half a million requests per second. Leave with a new perspective on how to design your own applications.
sessions.abstract_cn: 为了克服关系型数据库的性能和扩展限制，AWS构建了Amazon DynamoDB，为全球要求最苛刻的应用程序提供任意规模下一致的个位数毫秒级性能。在本次会议中，了解Amazon DynamoDB的架构选择。更好地理解何时使用DynamoDB，以及为什么DynamoDB被超过一百万AWS客户使用，并为数百个每秒超过五十万请求的应用程序提供支持。带着关于如何设计自己应用程序的全新视角离开。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Generative and Agentic AI on Amazon EKS (CNS344)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在 Amazon EKS 上的生成式和代理式 AI (CNS344)
sessions.abstract: AI is creating new opportunities, and organizations need speed-to-market, scalability, performance, and cost efficiency to bring ideas to life. Amazon EKS provides the trusted and flexible foundation for your AI journey as you build new experiences using AI inference, agents, and model fine-tuning. In this session, we will cover recent innovations in Amazon EKS that empower you with the latest AI capabilities and we will share real-world architectures, best practices, and examples to leave you equipped with the information you need to accelerate your AI initiatives.
sessions.abstract_cn: 人工智能正在创造新的机遇，组织需要快速上市、可扩展性、性能和成本效益来将想法变为现实。Amazon EKS 为您的 AI 之旅提供值得信赖且灵活的基础，帮助您使用 AI 推理、代理和模型微调构建新体验。在本次会议中，我们将介绍 Amazon EKS 的最新创新，这些创新为您提供最新的 AI 能力，我们还将分享真实世界的架构、最佳实践和示例，让您掌握加速 AI 计划所需的信息。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From EC2 to EKS: Tipalti’s transformation to Windows containers on AWS (MAM339)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从 EC2 到 EKS:Tipalti 在 AWS 上向 Windows 容器转型之路 (MAM339)
sessions.abstract: Is your Windows applications constrained by scaling limitations and complex operations? Discover how Tipalti transformed their traditional Windows application into a modern, containerized solution. Learn how to overcome process management challenges, implement auto-scaling, and achieve up to a 50% performance improvement. We'll walk through the implementation of Windows containers, logging solutions, and operational enhancements. Through Tipalti's transformation experience, key technical decisions, and lessons learned, you'll gain practical knowledge for modernizing your Windows applications.
sessions.abstract_cn: 您的 Windows 应用程序是否受到扩展限制和复杂操作的约束?了解 Tipalti 如何将其传统 Windows 应用程序转变为现代化的容器化解决方案。学习如何克服进程管理挑战、实现自动扩展并获得高达 50% 的性能提升。我们将详细介绍 Windows 容器的实现、日志记录解决方案和运营增强。通过 Tipalti 的转型经验、关键技术决策和经验教训,您将获得现代化 Windows 应用程序的实用知识。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Yahoo! Finance built research multi-agent systems with Gen AI (SPS321)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Yahoo! Finance 如何使用生成式 AI 构建研究多智能体系统 (SPS321)
sessions.abstract: Explore how enterprises are adopting and scaling multi-agent systems with Amazon Bedrock and AgentCore for advanced data analysis and research applications. In this session, Dipen Rughwani from Yahoo Finance will share his journey on designing and implementing multi-agent systems for financial question answering. This work investigates methods for orchestrating agents, integrating with Yahoo Finance web services that deliver structured and unstructured data to web and mobile applications. We discuss approaches for enabling coordinated tool/API calling for heterogeneous sources and evaluating performance trade-offs in multi-agent architectures. The session provides practical guidance for architects and data scientists building enterprise-scale agent-based solutions.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索企业如何利用Amazon Bedrock和AgentCore采用和扩展多智能体系统，用于高级数据分析和研究应用。在本次会议中，来自Yahoo Finance的Dipen Rughwani将分享他在设计和实施用于金融问答的多智能体系统方面的经验。这项工作研究了编排智能体的方法，与Yahoo Finance网络服务集成，为网页和移动应用程序提供结构化和非结构化数据。我们讨论了为异构数据源实现协调工具/API调用的方法，以及评估多智能体架构中的性能权衡。本次会议为构建企业级智能体解决方案的架构师和数据科学家提供实用指导。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Drive operational excellence for modern applications (COP327)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 推动现代应用程序的卓越运营 (COP327)
sessions.abstract: Modern applications built with microservices, containers, and serverless require advanced observability practices. This session showcases how CloudWatch will help you understand your application and infrastructure as well as your business and customer experience.  Attendees will explore strategies for implementing observability in modern architectures and learn how to leverage new and existing AWS observability features to detect issues faster and reduce mean time to resolution while maintaining reliability at scale. Participants will also learn how to use these tools to accelerate deployments and break down silos between teams.
sessions.abstract_cn: 使用微服务、容器和无服务器构建的现代应用程序需要先进的可观测性实践。本次会议展示了 CloudWatch 如何帮助您了解应用程序和基础设施以及业务和客户体验。与会者将探索在现代架构中实施可观测性的策略，并学习如何利用新的和现有的 AWS 可观测性功能更快地检测问题并缩短平均解决时间，同时保持大规模的可靠性。参与者还将学习如何使用这些工具加速部署并打破团队之间的孤岛。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Customer Services Reinvention powered by AWS (AIM110)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 由 AWS 驱动的客户服务重塑 (AIM110)
sessions.abstract: At Grupo Werthein in Latin America, Accenture are reinventing Customer Service with Generative AI powered by AWS. Our transformation enables up to 90% resolution through digital channels, delivering humanized and personalized customer interactions. By operating a cost-efficient, scalable technology ecosystem across all transformed digital touchpoints, we ensure continuous improvement, smarter processes, and seamless experiences. This reinvention not only enhances customer satisfaction but also drives operational efficiency and business value. AWS empowers us to reimagine the future of customer care — intelligent, efficient, and customer-first. This presentation is brought to you by Accenture, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在拉丁美洲的Grupo Werthein，埃森哲正在利用由AWS提供支持的生成式AI重塑客户服务。我们的转型通过数字渠道实现高达90%的问题解决率，提供人性化和个性化的客户互动。通过在所有转型的数字触点上运营具有成本效益、可扩展的技术生态系统，我们确保持续改进、更智能的流程和无缝的体验。这一重塑不仅提升了客户满意度，还推动了运营效率和业务价值。AWS使我们能够重新构想客户服务的未来——智能、高效且以客户为中心。本演示由AWS合作伙伴埃森哲为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Advanced RAG Architectures: From Basic Retrieval to Agentic RAG  (NTA403)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 高级RAG架构：从基础检索到智能体RAG (NTA403)
sessions.abstract: Join us for this hands-on Code Talk where we'll dive deep into building advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architectures that effectively handle large-scale documents. Through live coding demonstrations, we'll explore techniques to enhance retrieval accuracy and context preservation when dealing with complex documents. Watch and code along as we implement multi-step RAG, recursive retrieval, and agent-driven approaches that intelligently chunk and process large texts, decompose queries, evaluate responses, and orchestrate complex tasks. You'll see real AWS customer code examples and learn practical strategies for building more accurate, scalable Generative AI applications. Bring your laptop and questions for this interactive session with AWS experts.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入我们这场实践性的代码讲座，我们将深入探讨如何构建能够有效处理大规模文档的高级检索增强生成（RAG）架构。通过实时编码演示，我们将探索在处理复杂文档时增强检索准确性和上下文保留的技术。观看并跟随我们一起实现多步骤RAG、递归检索和代理驱动方法，这些方法能够智能地分块和处理大型文本、分解查询、评估响应并编排复杂任务。您将看到真实的AWS客户代码示例，并学习构建更准确、可扩展的生成式AI应用程序的实用策略。请携带您的笔记本电脑和问题，参加这场与AWS专家的互动会议。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reinvent your career: From developer to cloud leader (DEV101)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 重塑你的职业生涯：从开发者到云领导者 (DEV101)
sessions.abstract: Cloud careers evolve quickly. This session explores how developers can grow into cloud leadership roles, sharing practical strategies for building influence, technical expertise, and resilience along the way. Attendees gain insight into how to navigate career growth while staying grounded in engineering best practices.
sessions.abstract_cn: 云职业发展迅速。本次会议探讨开发人员如何成长为云领导角色，分享建立影响力、技术专长和韧性的实用策略。与会者将深入了解如何在保持工程最佳实践的同时实现职业成长。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Secure in milliseconds: Visa's AI-powered fraud defense on AWS (IND3313)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 毫秒级安全防护：Visa 基于 AWS 的 AI 驱动欺诈防御系统 (IND3313)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Visa revolutionized real-time payment security by leveraging AWS services, including AWS Nitro Enclaves, Amazon EKS, and Amazon MemoryDB, for their Visa Protect solution. This session explores Visa's journey to a rapidly scalable, cloud-based fraud detection solution. Learn how Visa processes massive volumes of sensitive financial data with ultra-low latency while maintaining stringent security standards. We'll dive into the multi-region architecture, real-time AI/ML fraud detection on Amazon EKS, and compute-level isolation that allowed Visa to achieve sub-250 millisecond fraud detection latency and 99.99% availability. Join us to uncover the blueprint for secure, AI-driven payment risk scoring.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解Visa如何利用AWS服务(包括AWS Nitro Enclaves、Amazon EKS和Amazon MemoryDB)彻底改变实时支付安全，打造其Visa Protect解决方案。本次会议探讨Visa向快速可扩展的云端欺诈检测解决方案转型的历程。了解Visa如何以超低延迟处理海量敏感金融数据，同时保持严格的安全标准。我们将深入探讨多区域架构、Amazon EKS上的实时AI/ML欺诈检测，以及使Visa实现低于250毫秒欺诈检测延迟和99.99%可用性的计算级隔离。加入我们，揭示安全、AI驱动的支付风险评分蓝图。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A day in the life of an AWS WAF administrator (NET317)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS WAF 管理员的一天 (NET317)
sessions.abstract: From sunrise alerts to sunset cost reports, the AWS WAF administrator’s day is never dull. Join us as we follow a fictional (but all-too-relatable) admin navigating setup, fine-tuning rules, building dashboards, and taming budgets - while outsmarting emerging threats before they bite. You’ll see how to adapt quickly to shifting traffic, uncover hidden risks, and make data-driven decisions without breaking the bank - or the application. Packed with tips, real-world examples, and a dash of bot traffic, this session turns the daily grind of web application protection into a well-architected adventure (edited)
sessions.abstract_cn: 从日出时的告警到日落时的成本报告，AWS WAF 管理员的一天从不枯燥。加入我们，跟随一位虚构（但极具共鸣）的管理员，了解如何进行设置、微调规则、构建控制面板和控制预算——同时在新兴威胁造成危害之前智胜它们。您将看到如何快速适应不断变化的流量、发现隐藏风险，并在不超出预算或影响应用程序的情况下做出数据驱动的决策。本次会议充满技巧、实际案例和一些机器人流量内容，将 Web 应用程序保护的日常工作转变为一场架构完善的冒险之旅

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Netflix Connects Product Experiments to its AWS Bill (IND388)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Netflix 如何将产品实验与其 AWS 账单关联 (IND388)
sessions.abstract: How do you measure the cost of innovation? At Netflix, a "winning" A/B test can create hidden cloud infrastructure costs that offset its business value. This session details our strategy for connecting product experiments to their infrastructure costs. We'll share our framework for identifying an experiment's impact on our cloud systems and show how we translate that impact into a projected AWS cost. Learn how this enables our teams to make smarter, more cost-aware product decisions at scale.
sessions.abstract_cn: 如何衡量创新的成本？在Netflix，一个"成功的"A/B测试可能会产生隐藏的云基础设施成本，从而抵消其业务价值。本次会议详细介绍了我们将产品实验与其基础设施成本关联起来的策略。我们将分享用于识别实验对云系统影响的框架，并展示如何将这种影响转化为预测的AWS成本。了解这如何使我们的团队能够大规模地做出更明智、更具成本意识的产品决策。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build Advanced Search with Vector, Hybrid, and AI Techniques (ANT314)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用向量、混合和AI技术构建高级搜索 (ANT314)
sessions.abstract: Amazon OpenSearch Service is at the heart of how Artificial Intelligence is transforming the way we store, search, and use data. Learn how businesses are using AI to power their search-backed applications, achieving significant improvements in search accuracy and performance with OpenSearch Service’s advanced vector capabilities. Learn how Recruit uses OpenSearch Service to find available tables for "Hot Pepper Gourmet" diners. Dive deep into OpenSearch’s vector capabilities, and its role in building chat bots and agentic search. You’ll learn how to build scalable, high-performance, and cost-optimal solutions so that you can incorporate these technologies in your stack.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon OpenSearch Service 是人工智能转变我们存储、搜索和使用数据方式的核心。了解企业如何使用 AI 为其搜索支持的应用程序提供动力，通过 OpenSearch Service 的高级向量功能在搜索准确性和性能方面实现显著改进。了解 Recruit 如何使用 OpenSearch Service 为"Hot Pepper Gourmet"食客查找可用餐桌。深入探讨 OpenSearch 的向量功能及其在构建聊天机器人和代理搜索中的作用。您将学习如何构建可扩展、高性能且成本优化的解决方案，以便将这些技术融入您的技术栈中。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Exploring dual pathways to agentic commerce with AWS and Stripe (AIM114)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 探索使用 AWS 和 Stripe 实现代理商务的双重路径 (AIM114)
sessions.abstract: The retail environment is changing with the emergence of gen AI–powered agents—intelligent storefronts that discover, recommend, and transact on behalf of shoppers. In this new era of agentic commerce, two pathways are taking shape: business to agent (B2A), where external answer engines connect customers with products, and agent to consumer (A2C), where retailers deploy custom on-site agents using solutions such as AWS’s gen AI stack. In both journeys, trust and simplicity at checkout are key. Discover how AWS and Stripe allow for real-time transaction analytics, automated fraud detection, and tailored payment solutions—helping retailers convert product discovery into revenue while simplifying operations and boosting conversion rates. This presentation is brought to you by Stripe, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 零售环境正在随着生成式AI驱动的代理的出现而发生变化——这些智能店面能够代表购物者进行发现、推荐和交易。在这个新的代理商务时代，两条路径正在形成：企业对代理（B2A），外部答案引擎将客户与产品连接起来；以及代理对消费者（A2C），零售商使用AWS的生成式AI堆栈等解决方案部署定制化的站内代理。在这两种路径中，结账时的信任和简便性是关键。了解AWS和Stripe如何实现实时交易分析、自动化欺诈检测和定制化支付解决方案——帮助零售商将产品发现转化为收入，同时简化运营并提高转化率。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Stripe提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon's finops: Cloud cost lessons from a global e-commerce giant (AMZ308)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 亚马逊的FinOps：来自全球电商巨头的云成本经验教训 (AMZ308)
sessions.abstract: Get an insider's view of FinOps at Amazon from the AWS Cloud Economics team. Drawing from experience supporting thousands of internal teams, we'll share battle-tested strategies for building a cost-aware culture and scaling cloud financial management. Learn how Amazon approaches cost allocation, leverages AWS tools, and drives optimization across its complex enterprise. You'll leave with practical approaches and proven best practices that can be applied to organizations of any size.
sessions.abstract_cn: 从 AWS 云经济团队深入了解亚马逊的 FinOps 实践。我们将分享支持数千个内部团队的实战经验，介绍构建成本意识文化和扩展云财务管理的久经考验的策略。了解亚马逊如何进行成本分配、利用 AWS 工具以及在复杂企业环境中推动优化。您将获得可应用于任何规模组织的实用方法和经过验证的最佳实践。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A leader's guide to AI strategy and implementation (SNR305)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 领导者的AI战略与实施指南 (SNR305)
sessions.abstract: As generative and agentic AI transform business models, leaders must architect new operating models that bridge technology capabilities with business value. This advanced session reveals proven approaches for scaling AI from experiments to enterprise-wide value creation. Learn to shape AI-driven business strategies, design advanced decision systems, and build governance frameworks that accelerate adoption while managing risk. Leaders will leave with practical guidance to orchestrate AI capabilities and organizational transformation, execute their vision, drive innovation, and deliver quantifiable returns through scaled AI deployment.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着生成式和代理式人工智能改变商业模式，领导者必须构建新的运营模式，以连接技术能力与业务价值。本高级会议揭示了将人工智能从实验扩展到企业级价值创造的成熟方法。学习如何塑造人工智能驱动的业务战略、设计高级决策系统，以及构建治理框架，在管理风险的同时加速采用。领导者将获得实用指导，以编排人工智能能力和组织转型、执行愿景、推动创新，并通过规模化人工智能部署实现可量化的回报。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Last HSM Standing: PayPal POS’s move to AWS Payment Cryptography (SEC215)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 最后的HSM守护者：PayPal POS迁移至AWS Payment Cryptography (SEC215)
sessions.abstract: Join Zettle by Paypal as they reveal how one of Europe's most innovative point-of-sale vendors is using AWS Payment Cryptography to retire their last on-premise hardware. Learn how they successfully migrated real-time transaction volumes in multiple geographies while maintaining PCI PIN & PCI P2PE compliance, increasing resiliency, and reducing infrastructure costs.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入 Zettle by PayPal，了解欧洲最具创新性的销售点供应商之一如何使用 AWS Payment Cryptography 淘汰其最后的本地硬件。了解他们如何在多个地理区域成功迁移实时交易量，同时保持 PCI PIN 和 PCI P2PE 合规性，提高弹性并降低基础设施成本。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Using Amazon Nova Act to simplify login workflows (AIM271)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Nova Act 简化登录工作流程 (AIM271)
sessions.abstract: Amazon Nova Act redefines what’s possible for intelligent and scalable automation. It can navigate the web independently, interpret complex patterns, and adapt as needed. In this session, you’ll learn how 1Password is using Amazon Nova Act to streamline the login experience for consumers and businesses alike. You’ll see how Amazon Nova Act makes it possible to understand and automate the login experience at scale, across thousands of sites. This presentation is brought to you by 1PASSWORD, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon Nova Act 重新定义了智能化和可扩展自动化的可能性。它能够独立导航网页、解释复杂模式并根据需要进行调整。在本次会议中，您将了解 1Password 如何使用 Amazon Nova Act 来简化消费者和企业的登录体验。您将看到 Amazon Nova Act 如何能够大规模理解和自动化数千个网站的登录体验。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 1PASSWORD 提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build an AI-ready data foundation (ANT304)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建AI就绪的数据基础 (ANT304)
sessions.abstract: An unparalleled level of interest in generative AI and agentic AI is driving organizations to rethink their data strategy. While there is a need for data foundation constructs such as data pipelines, data architectures, data stores and data governance to evolve, there are business elements that need to stay constant like cost-efficiency and  effectively collaborating across data estates. In this session we will cover how building your data foundation on AWS provides the tools and the building blocks to balance both needs, and empower organizations to grow their data strategy for building AI-ready applications.
sessions.abstract_cn: 生成式人工智能和代理式人工智能引发的空前关注正在推动组织重新思考其数据战略。虽然数据管道、数据架构、数据存储和数据治理等数据基础构造需要不断演进，但成本效益和跨数据资产的有效协作等业务要素需要保持不变。在本次会议中，我们将介绍如何在AWS上构建数据基础，提供工具和构建模块来平衡这两种需求，并赋能组织发展其数据战略以构建AI就绪的应用程序。

presenter.name: Shikha Verma
presenter.title: Head of Product, AWS Analytics & Governance

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Healthcare Transformed: Reimagining the Future with Generative AI (AIM241)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 医疗保健转型：用生成式人工智能重新构想未来 (AIM241)
sessions.abstract: Join a panel discussion hosted by PwC, featuring four Chief Information Officers from leading healthcare systems, as they explore the future of healthcare in a financially strained and rapidly evolving landscape. Discover how organizations are leveraging generative AI and secure, cloud-native platforms to boost productivity, reduce operational costs, and empower their clinical, operational, and research teams. Learn how to scale AI responsibly across complex enterprises, transform care delivery, and drive innovation with measurable outcomes. This presentation is brought to you by PwC, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 加入由普华永道主办的小组讨论，四位来自领先医疗系统的首席信息官将探讨在财务紧张和快速发展的环境中医疗保健的未来。了解各组织如何利用生成式人工智能和安全的云原生平台来提高生产力、降低运营成本并赋能其临床、运营和研究团队。学习如何在复杂企业中负责任地扩展人工智能、转变医疗服务提供方式并推动具有可衡量成果的创新。本演示由AWS合作伙伴普华永道为您呈现。

presenter.name: Andy Crowder
presenter.title: SVP, Chief Digital and AI Officer

presenter.name: Geoffry Hook
presenter.title: Chief Information Officer - Part of Northwell Health

presenter.name: Rajesh Nair
presenter.title: CIO
presenter.company: WellSense Health Plan - Part of BMC

presenter.name: Michael Reagin
presenter.title: Executive Vice President, Chief Technology Officer

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - All Power, No Pain: Scale Agentic AI Apps in an Open Lakehouse (AIM247)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 强大功能，零痛点：在开放湖仓中扩展智能体AI应用 (AIM247)
sessions.abstract: Harness the power of Agentic AI without the data headaches. In this session, you’ll get a practical blueprint for building trusted, scalable AI applications using Apache Iceberg-based open lakehouse architectures. Learn how to fuel your lakehouse with real-time data, ensure data quality for accuracy, and provide a solid data foundation for your AI agents. See how to design systems where agents can seamlessly access data, leverage vector and relational data for enhanced reasoning, and execute complex workflows without bottlenecks. You’ll walk away ready to confidently deploy and scale data for your own agentic AI applications. This presentation is brought to you by Qlik, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 利用基于Apache Iceberg的开放湖仓架构，充分发挥Agentic AI的强大能力，同时避免数据管理难题。在本次会议中，您将获得构建可信、可扩展AI应用程序的实用蓝图。了解如何使用实时数据为湖仓提供动力，确保数据质量以提高准确性，并为AI代理提供坚实的数据基础。了解如何设计系统，使代理能够无缝访问数据，利用向量和关系数据增强推理能力，并执行复杂的工作流程而不会出现瓶颈。您将能够自信地部署和扩展自己的Agentic AI应用程序的数据。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Qlik提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unified multicloud observability (COP368)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 统一的多云可观测性 (COP368)
sessions.abstract: Multicloud environments present unique observability challenges such as enabling end-to-end visibility of distributed applications and dealing with fragmented tools. This lightning talk will showcase implementation patterns using both open source and cloud-native tooling. You'll leave with clear selection criteria for choosing the right pattern based on your organization's scale, technical constraints, and operational maturity.
sessions.abstract_cn: 多云环境带来了独特的可观测性挑战，例如实现分布式应用程序的端到端可见性以及处理碎片化的工具。本次闪电演讲将展示使用开源和云原生工具的实施模式。您将获得明确的选择标准，以便根据组织的规模、技术约束和运营成熟度选择合适的模式。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Formula 1 Extends Fandom with AI, Data, and AWS Media Services (IND3326)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 一级方程式利用AI、数据和AWS媒体服务拓展粉丝体验 (IND3326)
sessions.abstract: In this session, you will learn how Formula 1 is revving up fan experiences with cloud and generative AI technology. Discover how Formula 1 is revolutionizing motorsport entertainment through cutting-edge cloud and AI technology. Learn how real-time data analytics and generative AI are transforming race broadcasts and fan engagement, and how AWS Media Services is powering 1 TV Premium, F1's new streaming service that launched in 2025. We'll explore F1's innovative solutions for enhancing race operations and fan experiences, demonstrating how technology is reshaping the future of live sports entertainment.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，您将了解一级方程式如何利用云和生成式AI技术提升车迷体验。探索一级方程式如何通过尖端的云和AI技术彻底改变赛车运动娱乐。了解实时数据分析和生成式AI如何改变赛事转播和车迷互动，以及AWS Media Services如何为F1 TV Premium（一级方程式于2025年推出的全新流媒体服务）提供支持。我们将探讨F1在增强赛事运营和车迷体验方面的创新解决方案，展示技术如何重塑现场体育娱乐的未来。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Introducing AI driven development lifecycle (AI-DLC) (DVT214)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 介绍AI驱动的开发生命周期 (AI-DLC) (DVT214)
sessions.abstract: The AI-Driven Development Life Cycle (AI-DLC) represents a transformative approach to software engineering that positions AI as a central collaborator throughout the development process. Unlike traditional AI-assisted development methods, AI-DLC reimagines the entire software lifecycle through two key dimensions: AI-powered execution with human oversight and dynamic team collaboration. The methodology operates in three phases - Inception, Construction, and Operations - where AI initiates workflows while maintaining persistent context across all stages. This innovative approach delivers significant benefits including increased velocity, enhanced quality, improved market responsiveness, and better developer experience, all while ensuring critical human oversight and collaboration.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI驱动开发生命周期(AI-DLC)代表了软件工程的一种变革性方法,将AI定位为整个开发过程中的核心协作者。与传统的AI辅助开发方法不同,AI-DLC通过两个关键维度重新构想整个软件生命周期:具有人工监督的AI驱动执行和动态团队协作。该方法分为三个阶段——启动、构建和运营——其中AI发起工作流程,同时在所有阶段保持持久的上下文。这种创新方法带来了显著的优势,包括提高速度、增强质量、改善市场响应能力和更好的开发者体验,同时确保关键的人工监督和协作。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond EHR: Leveraging AWS for Maximum Clinical and Operational Impact (IND213)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越电子健康记录：利用AWS实现最大临床和运营影响 (IND213)
sessions.abstract: Successful EHR hosting on AWS has become standard practice, as evidenced by AWS' 2025 Best in KLAS rating for public cloud. This session features two innovative health systems demonstrating how they've moved beyond basic EHR implementation to create competitive advantages with AWS. Leaders will share strategies for moving past "lift-and-shift" to drive meaningful innovation by leveraging cloud-native solutions, extending EHR functionality, and developing unique patient and provider experiences. Through real-world examples, attendees will learn practical approaches to healthcare innovation, value creation frameworks, and implementation insights. Designed for technology leaders, digital strategists, and clinical innovation teams seeking to differentiate their organizations.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在AWS上成功托管EHR已成为标准实践，AWS在2025年KLAS公有云评级中获得最佳评级即为证明。本次会议将展示两个创新型医疗系统如何超越基本的EHR实施，利用AWS创造竞争优势。领导者将分享超越"直接迁移"的策略，通过利用云原生解决方案、扩展EHR功能以及开发独特的患者和医疗服务提供者体验来推动有意义的创新。通过实际案例，与会者将学习医疗创新的实用方法、价值创造框架和实施见解。本会议专为寻求使其组织脱颖而出的技术领导者、数字战略师和临床创新团队设计。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Automatic Enterprise ML with Amazon SageMaker and Nextworld (SMB201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon SageMaker 和 Nextworld 实现自动化企业机器学习 (SMB201)
sessions.abstract: Machine learning has long helped businesses make smarter decisions, but it’s traditionally required data scientists, long development cycles, and heavy investment to deploy and maintain. In this session, see how business users can now build powerful AI models to solve problems like supply chain optimization or cash flow forecasting in hours instead of weeks. By combining Nextworld's enterprise-grade, AI-native application platform with Amazon SageMaker AutoML, organizations cut development time by up to 95%, democratize access to AI for non-technical roles, and solve critical business challenges faster.
sessions.abstract_cn: 机器学习长期以来一直帮助企业做出更明智的决策，但传统上需要数据科学家、漫长的开发周期以及大量投资来部署和维护。在本次会议中，了解业务用户现在如何能够在数小时而非数周内构建强大的AI模型来解决供应链优化或现金流预测等问题。通过将Nextworld的企业级AI原生应用平台与Amazon SageMaker AutoML相结合，组织可以将开发时间缩短高达95%，为非技术角色普及AI访问权限，并更快地解决关键业务挑战。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Redefining Operations: Caterpillar's Geospatial Intelligence Solution (IND322)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 重新定义运营：卡特彼勒的地理空间智能解决方案 (IND322)
sessions.abstract: Discover how Caterpillar's innovative GIS solution is revolutionizing construction and mining operations through advanced geospatial intelligence. By integrating real-time data from 20,000+ connected assets, this cloud-native platform delivers terrain modeling with 2-centimeter precision. The system combines sensor data, from ground elevation to equipment activity, with drone-generated surface scans, enabling data-driven decisions that optimize operations and enhance safety. This scalable solution minimizes infrastructure overhead while ensuring robust security and compliance. Learn how this intelligent ecosystem helps customers reduce rework, improve resource utilization, and gain competitive advantage in the heavy equipment industry.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解卡特彼勒创新的GIS解决方案如何通过先进的地理空间智能彻底改变建筑和采矿作业。通过整合来自20,000多个互联资产的实时数据,这个云原生平台提供精度达2厘米的地形建模。该系统将从地面高程到设备活动的传感器数据与无人机生成的表面扫描相结合,实现数据驱动的决策,从而优化运营并增强安全性。这个可扩展的解决方案最大限度地减少了基础设施开销,同时确保强大的安全性和合规性。了解这个智能生态系统如何帮助客户减少返工、提高资源利用率,并在重型设备行业获得竞争优势。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Hybrid connectivity at scale: A deep dive into AWS Direct Connect (NET403)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模混合连接：深入探讨 AWS Direct Connect (NET403)
sessions.abstract: Unlock the full potential of AWS Direct Connect in this advanced technical deep dive. In this session, explore both dedicated and hosted connections, Virtual Interfaces (VIFs), and BGP routing optimization for predictable bandwidth and reduced data transfer costs. Learn from experts about complex architectures including Direct Connect Gateway for multi-Region connectivity, LAG configurations for redundancy, and capabilities such as AWS Direct Connect SiteLink. After diving into advanced features like MACsec encryption and cross-connect processes, attendees will gain insights into troubleshooting methodologies, performance optimization, and integration patterns with AWS Transit Gateway and AWS Cloud WAN.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在这次高级技术深度探讨中，充分释放 AWS Direct Connect 的全部潜力。本次会议将探讨专用连接和托管连接、虚拟接口 (VIF)，以及用于实现可预测带宽和降低数据传输成本的 BGP 路由优化。向专家学习复杂架构，包括用于多区域连接的 Direct Connect Gateway、用于冗余的 LAG 配置，以及 AWS Direct Connect SiteLink 等功能。在深入探讨 MACsec 加密和交叉连接流程等高级功能后，与会者将深入了解故障排除方法、性能优化以及与 AWS Transit Gateway 和 AWS Cloud WAN 的集成模式。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming SAP with AWS AI services: AxFood and Harman’s AI journey (MAM214)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用AWS AI服务转型SAP：AxFood和Harman的AI之旅 (MAM214)
sessions.abstract: As artificial intelligence (AI) continues to revolutionize enterprise operations, SAP customers like AxFood and Harman International are harnessing the power of AWS's cutting-edge  AI capabilities to revolutionize enterprise operations. This session explores the transformative potential of integrating AWS's AI innovations with SAP ecosystems to drive unprecedented levels of efficiency, creativity, and user engagement.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着人工智能(AI)持续革新企业运营,像AxFood和Harman International这样的SAP客户正在利用AWS前沿的AI能力来革新企业运营。本次会议探讨了将AWS的AI创新与SAP生态系统集成的变革潜力,以推动效率、创造力和用户参与度达到前所未有的水平。

presenter.name: Erik Kamman
presenter.title: Head of WW Solution Architecture, SAP GTM

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building a Secure Foundation for SAP RISE and Non-SAP Workload (NTA318)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为 SAP RISE 和非 SAP 工作负载构建安全基础 (NTA318)
sessions.abstract: Discover how global enterprises successfully migrate SAP RISE and non-SAP workloads to AWS. This session explores the critical foundational aspects of AWS cloud migration, showcasing the implementation of a multi-account strategy that optimizes security and resource management.You'll learn how to build a secure landing zone, set up comprehensive backups, and establish integrated Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) capabilities.Learn how these key elements formed the backbone of AWS cloud migration, supporting both SAP and non-SAP ecosystems. You'll gain insights into overcoming challenges and implementing strategies that can accelerate AWS cloud adoption.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解全球企业如何成功将SAP RISE和非SAP工作负载迁移到AWS。本次会议探讨AWS云迁移的关键基础方面，展示多账户策略的实施，以优化安全性和资源管理。您将学习如何构建安全的着陆区、设置全面的备份以及建立集成的安全信息和事件管理(SIEM)功能。了解这些关键要素如何构成AWS云迁移的支柱，支持SAP和非SAP生态系统。您将获得克服挑战和实施策略的见解，从而加速AWS云采用。

presenter.name: Syafili Lie
presenter.title: Head of Solutions Architecture, Canada Enterprise Greenfield

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Agentic Code Generation for Industrial Analytics & Predictive Maintenance-PEX320
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 -工业分析与预测性维护的智能体代码生成-PEX320
sessions.abstract: Plant floor personnel face daily challenges monitoring critical equipment in real-time. While they possess deep operational expertise, they depend on IT teams for monitoring solutions and complex data analysis - creating delays and inefficiencies. Through live coding demonstrations, this session shows how Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Code Interpreter and Strands Agents enable operations teams to ask 'Analyze our motor's vibration patterns for maintenance scheduling' and watch the system generate and execute Python code using pandas, scipy, and scikit-learn for predictive analytics. We'll demonstrate IoT SiteWise data retrieval, AI-generated analytics, and MCP tools for work order creation - transforming natural language into executable machine learning that closes the operational loop without requiring data science expertise.
sessions.abstract_cn: 车间现场人员每天面临实时监控关键设备的挑战。虽然他们拥有深厚的运营专业知识，但他们依赖IT团队提供监控解决方案和复杂的数据分析——这造成了延迟和低效。通过实时编码演示，本次会议展示了Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Code Interpreter和Strands Agents如何使运营团队能够提出"分析我们电机的振动模式以安排维护计划"这样的问题，并观看系统使用pandas、scipy和scikit-learn生成并执行Python代码进行预测分析。我们将演示IoT SiteWise数据检索、AI生成的分析以及用于创建工单的MCP工具——将自然语言转化为可执行的机器学习，在不需要数据科学专业知识的情况下闭合运营循环。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Universal data connectivity with ETL and SQL queries (ANT209)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 ETL 和 SQL 查询实现通用数据连接 (ANT209)
sessions.abstract: Learn how AWS can help you with data integration and preparing data for analytics, machine learning (ML) and generative AI workloads. Explore new capabilities that enable your users to have controlled access to all relevant data, easily build and maintain scalable and resilient data pipelines, and enhance decision-making quality,all with exceptional price performance. See how zero-ETL and query federation can complement ETL and ELT data pipelines.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 AWS 如何帮助您进行数据集成并为分析、机器学习 (ML) 和生成式 AI 工作负载准备数据。探索新功能，使您的用户能够对所有相关数据进行受控访问，轻松构建和维护可扩展且具有弹性的数据管道，并提高决策质量，同时实现卓越的性价比。了解零 ETL 和查询联合如何补充 ETL 和 ELT 数据管道。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 performance: Architecture, design, and optimization (STG335)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon S3 性能：架构、设计与优化 (STG335)
sessions.abstract: Go behind the scenes of Amazon S3 performance architecture while learning practical optimization strategies. We'll explore how S3's internal systems manage massive throughput, handle concurrent requests, and balance loads across its distributed infrastructure. Dive deep into the technical foundations - from request routing and partitioning strategies to caching mechanisms - that enable S3 to power demanding workloads like real-time analytics and ML training. You'll learn how to leverage this architectural understanding to make informed storage class selections, implement performance-enhancing patterns, and design applications that maximize S3's capabilities.
sessions.abstract_cn: 深入了解 Amazon S3 性能架构的幕后机制，同时学习实用的优化策略。我们将探讨 S3 的内部系统如何管理海量吞吐量、处理并发请求以及在其分布式基础设施中平衡负载。深入研究技术基础——从请求路由和分区策略到缓存机制——这些技术使 S3 能够支持实时分析和机器学习训练等高要求工作负载。您将学习如何利用这种架构理解来做出明智的存储类选择、实施性能增强模式，并设计能够最大化发挥 S3 能力的应用程序。

presenter.name: Devabrat Kumar
presenter.title: Principal Product Manager Technical - External Services

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modern SFTP: Deploy AWS Transfer Family, Identity, and Automation (STG419)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 现代化 SFTP：部署 AWS Transfer Family、身份管理和自动化 (STG419)
sessions.abstract: Learn to build enterprise-grade file transfer solutions using AWS Transfer Family with automated workflows and Infrastructure as Code using Terraform. This session covers building secure SFTP servers, integrating with enterprise identity providers like Okta and Azure AD, and automating file processing workflows such as security scanning with GuardDuty and leveraging agentic AI to transform business processes. Perfect for organizations looking to modernize their managed file transfer systems while maintaining security and compliance. Walk away with practical templates and patterns for implementing enterprise-grade file transfer solutions.
sessions.abstract_cn: 学习使用 AWS Transfer Family 构建企业级文件传输解决方案，包含自动化工作流程和使用 Terraform 的基础设施即代码。本课程涵盖构建安全的 SFTP 服务器、与 Okta 和 Azure AD 等企业身份提供商集成，以及自动化文件处理工作流程，例如使用 GuardDuty 进行安全扫描和利用智能体 AI 转变业务流程。非常适合希望在保持安全性和合规性的同时实现托管文件传输系统现代化的组织。您将获得用于实施企业级文件传输解决方案的实用模板和模式。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AgenticAI: Industry-Driven Architecture Excellence (NTA203)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AgenticAI：行业驱动的架构卓越 (NTA203)
sessions.abstract: Discover how industry-specific requirements shape architectural patterns for effective Agentic AI implementations. This session explores how tailored architectural frameworks address unique challenges in healthcare, finance, manufacturing, and logistics. Through real-world use cases, learn the critical design considerations that drive innovation across sectors. Attendees will gain practical knowledge of implementation strategies that unlock Agentic AI's transformative potential, enabling them to apply these architectural patterns within their own industries.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索行业特定需求如何塑造有效的智能体AI实施架构模式。本次会议探讨定制化架构框架如何应对医疗保健、金融、制造和物流领域的独特挑战。通过真实用例，了解推动各行业创新的关键设计考量。与会者将获得实施策略的实用知识，释放智能体AI的变革潜力，使他们能够在自己的行业中应用这些架构模式。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - kro: Simplifying Kubernetes Resource Orchestration (OPN308)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - kro：简化 Kubernetes 资源编排 (OPN308)
sessions.abstract: Discover kro, the open source tool revolutionizing Kubernetes resource management through configuration-based orchestration. Learn how this vendor-neutral solution eliminates custom coding needs through Simple Schema and CEL expressions, making complex resource dependencies manageable for teams of all sizes. We'll demonstrate how kro transforms Kubernetes into a centralized platform that accelerates developer velocity, improves fleet management and streamlines infrastructure deployment while maintaining organizational best practices and governance.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索 kro，这个开源工具通过基于配置的编排彻底改变了 Kubernetes 资源管理。了解这个供应商中立的解决方案如何通过 Simple Schema 和 CEL 表达式消除自定义编码需求，使各种规模的团队都能轻松管理复杂的资源依赖关系。我们将演示 kro 如何将 Kubernetes 转变为一个集中式平台，加速开发者效率，改进集群管理并简化基础设施部署，同时保持组织最佳实践和治理。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Solution-based selling strategies in AWS Marketplace (PEX110)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Marketplace 中基于解决方案的销售策略 (PEX110)
sessions.abstract: Learn about new selling capabilities in AWS Marketplace. This session explores best practices for selling comprehensive solutions, including real-world patterns, contract structures, and technical considerations. Discover how to maximize your AWS Marketplace presence and streamline customer procurement through effective solution-based strategies.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解 AWS Marketplace 中的新销售功能。本课程探讨销售综合解决方案的最佳实践，包括实际应用模式、合同结构和技术考虑因素。了解如何最大化您的 AWS Marketplace 影响力，并通过有效的基于解决方案的策略简化客户采购流程。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - What Anthropic Learned Building AI Agents in 2025 (AIM277)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Anthropic 在 2025 年构建 AI 代理的经验教训 (AIM277)
sessions.abstract: 2025 was the year AI agents went from demos to production. In this session, we share what Anthropic discovered building Claude Code and working alongside customers deploying agents at scale throughout the year. We'll examine how AI engineering practices evolved, then dive deep into the patterns that keep agents reliable across hours of autonomous work: context engineering, skills, and our newest frontier model Opus 4.5. Finally, we'll look ahead at the trends we believe will define the next wave of agentic AI. This presentation is brought to you by Anthropic, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 2025年是AI代理从演示走向生产的一年。在本次会议中，我们将分享Anthropic在构建Claude Code以及与全年大规模部署代理的客户合作过程中的发现。我们将探讨AI工程实践如何演进，然后深入研究使代理在数小时自主工作中保持可靠的模式：上下文工程、技能以及我们最新的前沿模型Opus 4.5。最后，我们将展望我们认为将定义下一波代理AI的趋势。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Anthropic呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic Analytics in Action (AIM295)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 智能体分析实战 (AIM295)
sessions.abstract: Analytics and data science are at an inflection point. The first wave of agentic analytics—HITL (human-in-the-loop), goal-driven agentic AI systems that reason, plan, execute and learn across data and models—is coming to life, delivering massive value by accelerating decision velocity in organizations. In this session, ZS MAX.AI presents real-world examples of organizations using agentic forecasting, segmentation, content intelligence, on-demand customer analytics and more. We will explore the power of AWS to deploy these new-age agentic analytics systems to unlock value through specific use cases and tackle key challenges including enterprise enablement, scaling and domain customization. This presentation is brought to you by ZS, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 分析和数据科学正处于拐点。第一波代理分析——HITL（人在回路中）、目标驱动的代理AI系统，能够跨数据和模型进行推理、规划、执行和学习——正在成为现实，通过加速组织中的决策速度来创造巨大价值。在本次会议中，ZS MAX.AI展示了组织使用代理预测、细分、内容智能、按需客户分析等的真实案例。我们将探讨AWS在部署这些新一代代理分析系统方面的强大能力，通过具体用例释放价值，并应对包括企业赋能、扩展和领域定制在内的关键挑战。本演示由AWS合作伙伴ZS提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Protect your data with AWS Backup: overview, use cases and what's new (STG207)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Backup 保护您的数据：概述、使用案例和新功能 (STG207)
sessions.abstract: AWS Backup helps over 140,000 customers protect more than 2.9 exabytes of application data across AWS services. It offers policy-based data protection, streamlining backup management, enhancing security controls, and simplifying compliance reporting. In this session, you'll learn how to use AWS Backup, hear what's new, and discover practical implementation strategies. Plus, hear directly from customers about their real-world experiences using AWS Backup to protect mission-critical workloads and maintain business continuity. Whether you're new to AWS Backup or a seasoned user, this session will provide valuable insights into protecting your AWS environment.
sessions.abstract_cn: AWS Backup 帮助超过 140,000 名客户保护跨 AWS 服务的超过 2.9 艾字节的应用程序数据。它提供基于策略的数据保护，简化备份管理，增强安全控制，并简化合规性报告。在本次会议中，您将学习如何使用 AWS Backup，了解最新功能，并发现实用的实施策略。此外，您还将直接听取客户关于使用 AWS Backup 保护关键任务工作负载和维护业务连续性的实际经验。无论您是 AWS Backup 的新用户还是经验丰富的用户，本次会议都将为保护您的 AWS 环境提供宝贵的见解。

presenter.name: Rooshir Patel
presenter.title: Managing Director, General Manager - Data Protection & Recovery Product Line

presenter.name: Chuck Uwanna
presenter.title: Principal Application Architect - Strategy and Modernization

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Securing the AI Era: From Hype to Real-World Defense (AIM106)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 保护AI时代：从炒作到实际防御 (AIM106)
sessions.abstract: As organizations race to embrace AI, the question is no longer if AI will transform security and business operations, but how leaders can harness it responsibly and effectively. This session explores the latest attacker innovations powered by AI, and the defensive strategies security teams must adopt to stay ahead. You’ll gain insight into the real-world challenges enterprises face in managing AI risk, balancing productivity with protection, and ensuring trust in rapidly evolving systems. Through practical examples and forward-looking analysis, we’ll cut through the hype to reveal the tangible ways AI is reshaping cybersecurity and enterprise resilience. This presentation is brought to you by Zscaler, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 随着组织竞相拥抱人工智能，问题已不再是人工智能是否会改变安全和业务运营，而是领导者如何负责任且有效地利用它。本次会议探讨了由人工智能驱动的最新攻击者创新，以及安全团队必须采用的防御策略以保持领先。您将深入了解企业在管理人工智能风险、平衡生产力与保护以及确保快速发展系统中的信任方面所面临的实际挑战。通过实际案例和前瞻性分析，我们将拨开炒作迷雾，揭示人工智能重塑网络安全和企业韧性的切实方式。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Zscaler为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Autonomous AI agents you can truly trust (AIM234)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 您可以真正信赖的自主AI代理 (AIM234)
sessions.abstract: Learn how to power accurate and trusted agents at scale with AI-ready data and governance. This presentation is brought to you by IBM, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何通过AI就绪的数据和治理来大规模支持准确且可信的代理。本演示由AWS合作伙伴IBM为您呈现。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Spec-driven development with Kiro  (DEV314)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Kiro 进行规范驱动开发 (DEV314)
sessions.abstract: In this session, learn how Kiro is helping you go from idea to production faster with spec-driven development. Learn how to delagate and automate development tasks using Kiro's agent hooks, multimodal agent chat and MCP support. We'll show you how Kiro’s agents challenge you to think beyond the code and work alongside you to solve hard engineering problems with confidence.
sessions.abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，了解 Kiro 如何通过规范驱动开发帮助您更快地从想法到生产。学习如何使用 Kiro 的代理钩子、多模态代理聊天和 MCP 支持来委托和自动化开发任务。我们将向您展示 Kiro 的代理如何挑战您超越代码思考，并与您一起自信地解决复杂的工程问题。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Service-oriented builders guide to agentic AI: Insights from WEX (ARC313)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 面向服务的构建者代理式AI指南:来自WEX的洞察 (ARC313)
sessions.abstract: Large language models and agentic tools have reached enterprise viability, with Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) principles providing the foundation for robust agentic systems. This session examines which SOA design principles translate directly to generative AI implementations and which require rethinking for agent orchestration and nondeterministic behaviors. Learn architectural patterns for secure AI service integration, tools for enterprise-scale agent deployment, and techniques for building agents that work seamlessly with existing ecosystems. WEX demonstrates how extending SOA into the agentic domain enables generative AI solutions to deliver enterprise-grade operational support at scale. Gain practical insights into combining SOA best practices with modern AI architecture requirements.
sessions.abstract_cn: 大型语言模型和智能体工具已达到企业级可用性,面向服务架构(SOA)原则为构建稳健的智能体系统提供了基础。本次会议探讨哪些SOA设计原则可直接应用于生成式AI实现,以及哪些原则需要针对智能体编排和非确定性行为进行重新思考。了解安全AI服务集成的架构模式、企业级智能体部署工具,以及构建与现有生态系统无缝协作的智能体的技术。WEX展示了如何将SOA扩展到智能体领域,使生成式AI解决方案能够大规模提供企业级运营支持。获取将SOA最佳实践与现代AI架构需求相结合的实用见解。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate code delivery: Dev containers and Amazon Q Developer  (SPS324)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 加速代码交付：开发容器与 Amazon Q Developer (SPS324)
sessions.abstract: Explore advanced integration patterns between development containers, Amazon Q Developer, and validation tools to accelerate AWS infrastructure development. Through live coding, learn how containers enable consistent AI-assisted coding while automatically implementing security controls and quality gates in your IDE. See practical examples of container-based validation tools and discover how this approach transforms development practices. Leave the session with hands-on experience building secure, high-quality AWS solutions integrating AI and container technologies.
sessions.abstract_cn: 探索开发容器、Amazon Q Developer 和验证工具之间的高级集成模式，以加速 AWS 基础设施开发。通过实时编码，了解容器如何在 IDE 中自动实施安全控制和质量门禁的同时实现一致的 AI 辅助编码。查看基于容器的验证工具的实际示例，并了解这种方法如何改变开发实践。离开会议时，您将获得构建集成 AI 和容器技术的安全、高质量 AWS 解决方案的实践经验。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Hesitate and You’re History: Why You Need Agentic AI Right Now (AIM246)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 犹豫即落后：为什么你现在就需要智能体AI (AIM246)
sessions.abstract: Agentic AI is no longer hype — it’s the next battleground for growth. Winning means the ability to create autonomous, goal-oriented systems and wield data effectively. Companies that execute will outpace the competition; those that don’t will be left behind explaining why they hesitated ... if they’re around at all. Join Ingersoll Rand to discover how they’re using Qlik® to accelerate insights, sharpen AI-driven decisions, and increase productivity — delivering real competitive advantage today while fulfilling their strategic vision of tomorrow’s AI-powered analytics. This presentation is brought to you by Qlik, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 代理AI不再是炒作——它是增长的下一个战场。获胜意味着能够创建自主的、目标导向的系统并有效利用数据。执行到位的公司将超越竞争对手；而那些犹豫不决的公司将被甩在后面解释为什么他们犹豫了……如果他们还存在的话。加入Ingersoll Rand，了解他们如何使用Qlik®加速洞察、提升AI驱动的决策并提高生产力——在实现明天AI驱动分析战略愿景的同时，今天就交付真正的竞争优势。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Qlik提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Ops in the AI age: Innovating together for faster, more efficient operations
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI时代的运维：携手创新，实现更快速、更高效的运营
sessions.abstract: The rise of generative and agentic AI is transforming how organizations build, operate, and secure applications. As systems become increasingly autonomous and complex, intelligent operations are essential. Join us to discover how AWS Cloud Operations continues to innovate—helping you monitor AI agents wherever deployed, operate smarter across environments, and unlock insights through accelerated analytics. Explore AWS-native and managed open-source observability providing visibility into distributed AI systems. Experience faster querying and automated incident report generation for complex problem-solving. Through customer stories and demos, discover proven patterns for transforming operations to be more intelligent, secure, and efficient.
sessions.abstract_cn: 生成式和代理式人工智能的兴起正在改变组织构建、运营和保护应用程序的方式。随着系统变得越来越自主和复杂,智能运营变得至关重要。加入我们,了解AWS云运营如何持续创新——帮助您监控部署在任何位置的AI代理,跨环境更智能地运营,并通过加速分析解锁洞察。探索AWS原生和托管开源可观测性,为分布式AI系统提供可见性。体验更快的查询和自动化事件报告生成,以解决复杂问题。通过客户案例和演示,发现经过验证的模式,将运营转变为更智能、更安全、更高效。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernizing Global Payment Processing: Moving from Mainframe to AWS (SPS312)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 现代化全球支付处理：从大型机迁移到AWS (SPS312)
sessions.abstract: Learn how Global Payments is transforming its 40-year-old mainframe system into a modern AWS cloud platform. This major financial services company, which processes credit cards for over 600 million cardholders worldwide, is using enhanced support and monitoring tools to ensure a reliable transition to cloud-based processing.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解Global Payments如何将其拥有40年历史的大型机系统转型为现代化的AWS云平台。这家大型金融服务公司为全球超过6亿持卡人处理信用卡业务，正在使用增强的支持和监控工具来确保可靠地过渡到基于云的处理系统。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Automating Certificate Management with Exportable Public Certificates (SEC322)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用可导出公共证书自动化证书管理 (SEC322)
sessions.abstract: Discover how to automate TLS certificate management using AWS Certificate Manager's exportable public certificates. We'll demonstrate an end-to-end automation framework utilizing AWS services like EventBridge, Lambda, Step Functions, and Systems Manager for certificate issuance, export, distribution, and renewal across diverse environments. Learn to implement automated deployment workflows, set up monitoring and notifications for certificate lifecycle events, and ensure seamless updates across EC2 instances, on-premises servers, and multi-cloud setups. By attending, you'll gain the skills to eliminate manual certificate management tasks and minimize the risk of certificate-related outages in your organization.
sessions.abstract_cn: 了解如何使用 AWS Certificate Manager 的可导出公有证书自动化 TLS 证书管理。我们将演示一个端到端的自动化框架，利用 EventBridge、Lambda、Step Functions 和 Systems Manager 等 AWS 服务实现证书颁发、导出、分发和续期，覆盖各种环境。学习实施自动化部署工作流，为证书生命周期事件设置监控和通知，并确保在 EC2 实例、本地服务器和多云环境中无缝更新。通过参加，您将掌握消除手动证书管理任务并最大限度降低组织中证书相关故障风险的技能。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build autonomous code improvement agents with Amazon Nova 2 Lite (AIM429)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Nova 2 Lite 构建自主代码改进代理 (AIM429)
sessions.abstract: Dive deep into the reasoning capabilities of Amazon Nova 2 Lite to create intelligent agents that understand and improve your codebase autonomously. Watch live coding to learn practical implementation patterns, architectural considerations for long-horizon agentic workflows, and how to transform manual code maintenance into intelligent, automated engineering solutions.
sessions.abstract_cn: 深入探索 Amazon Nova 2 Lite 的推理能力，创建能够自主理解和改进代码库的智能代理。观看实时编码，学习实用的实现模式、长期代理工作流的架构考量，以及如何将手动代码维护转变为智能化的自动化工程解决方案。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon GameLift Streams Powers Bandai Namco Entertainment's Metaverse (IND394)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon GameLift Streams 助力万代南梦宫娱乐的元宇宙 (IND394)
sessions.abstract: Bandai Namco Entertainment built their Gundam metaverse into a globally scalable cloud streaming platform using Amazon GameLift Streams, serving 20+ countries with browser-based access. This session explores achieving minimal session startup times and cost efficiency through dynamic capacity management across 6 AWS regions with real-time demand optimization. The presentation covers multi-runtime architecture designed to enable both high-performance metaverse experiences and instant browser-based access, as well as network performance visualization. Additionally, we'll showcase Amazon integration that create immersive shopping experiences within the metaverse, bridging virtual and physical commerce. Attendees will gain insights into dynamic scaling strategies and multi-region deployment.
sessions.abstract_cn: 万代南梦宫娱乐使用 Amazon GameLift Streams 将其高达元宇宙构建为全球可扩展的云流媒体平台,通过基于浏览器的访问方式服务于 20 多个国家。本次会议探讨如何通过跨 6 个 AWS 区域的动态容量管理和实时需求优化来实现最短的会话启动时间和成本效益。演讲内容涵盖多运行时架构,该架构旨在同时支持高性能元宇宙体验和即时浏览器访问,以及网络性能可视化。此外,我们还将展示 Amazon 集成,在元宇宙中创造沉浸式购物体验,连接虚拟与实体商务。与会者将深入了解动态扩展策略和多区域部署。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - High-performance inference for frontier AI models (AIM226)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 前沿AI模型的高性能推理 (AIM226)
sessions.abstract: How do you go from state-of-the-art foundation model to a globally available usage-based API? This session provides an overview of the roadmap and architecture from model performance optimization to multi-region GPU-based infrastructure setup to the precise mechanics of request prioritization, token accounting, and rate limiting. Building on an inference stack that includes technologies like NVIDIA Dynamo, TensorRT-LLM, and Amazon EKS, we'll trace the path from model weights to a robust production service. This presentation is brought to you by Baseten, an AWS Partner.
sessions.abstract_cn: 如何从最先进的基础模型发展到全球可用的按使用量计费的API？本次会议概述了从模型性能优化到多区域GPU基础设施设置，再到请求优先级排序、令牌计费和速率限制的精确机制的路线图和架构。基于包括NVIDIA Dynamo、TensorRT-LLM和Amazon EKS等技术的推理堆栈，我们将追踪从模型权重到稳健生产服务的路径。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Baseten提供。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Production Agent Swarms: Mastering Industrial AI (DEV311)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建生产级智能体集群：掌握工业AI (DEV311)
sessions.abstract: AI systems are evolving beyond multi-modal understanding into autonomous collaboration and problem-solving for industry-specific challenges. This technical session demonstrates how to build and orchestrate multi-agent systems that leverage industry expertise with LLMs. Topics include agent orchestration framework customization, advanced RAG patterns for domain knowledge, collaborative decision-making mechanisms, and production-scale observability. Drawing from real implementations, the session covers critical architecture decisions, common pitfalls, and proven solutions. Participants will gain practical patterns and code examples for building next-generation AI systems with memory, planning, and industry-specific collaboration capabilities.
sessions.abstract_cn: AI系统正在从多模态理解演进为针对行业特定挑战的自主协作和问题解决。本技术会议演示如何构建和编排利用行业专业知识与大语言模型的多智能体系统。主题包括智能体编排框架定制、用于领域知识的高级RAG模式、协作决策机制以及生产规模的可观测性。会议基于实际实施案例，涵盖关键架构决策、常见陷阱和经过验证的解决方案。参与者将获得用于构建具有记忆、规划和行业特定协作能力的下一代AI系统的实用模式和代码示例。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A complete guide to Amazon EVS: Unlock AWS scale for VMware workloads (MAM201)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon EVS 完全指南：为 VMware 工作负载释放 AWS 规模能力 (MAM201)
sessions.abstract: Amazon Elastic VMware Service (Amazon EVS) is your fastest path to run VMware workloads on AWS, eliminating the need to replatform or refactor. Discover how Amazon EVS helps you unlock AWS scale and agility while maximizing existing VMware investments and skillsets. Explore core building blocks and guidance on self-managing or leveraging AWS Partners for your environments. We'll cover strategies for customizing your virtualization stack in the cloud, including integration with storage, backup, and disaster recovery solutions. Through a live demo, we'll showcase intuitive deployment workflows and share the latest service innovations to provide you with more choice and flexibility.
sessions.abstract_cn: Amazon Elastic VMware Service (Amazon EVS) 是您在 AWS 上运行 VMware 工作负载的最快路径,无需重新平台化或重构。了解 Amazon EVS 如何帮助您释放 AWS 的规模和敏捷性,同时最大化现有 VMware 投资和技能组合的价值。探索核心构建模块以及自我管理或利用 AWS 合作伙伴管理环境的指导。我们将介绍在云中自定义虚拟化堆栈的策略,包括与存储、备份和灾难恢复解决方案的集成。通过实时演示,我们将展示直观的部署工作流程,并分享最新的服务创新,为您提供更多选择和灵活性。

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Enabling AI innovation with Amazon SageMaker Unified Studio (ANT352)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 Amazon SageMaker Unified Studio 实现 AI 创新 (ANT352)
sessions.abstract: Many enterprises want to build a culture of AI innovation and manage it at scale. Learn how a leading financial institution implemented a unified data and AI platform with built-in governance to solve this challenge. Using the next generation of Amazon SageMaker, their petabyte-scale solution enables users to discover and access data in a cloud-native marketplace then build  in a unified data and AI development environment. This session is ideal for data and platform leaders looking to balance self-service capabilities with robust governance to enable AI initiatives.
sessions.abstract_cn: 许多企业希望构建AI创新文化并进行规模化管理。了解一家领先的金融机构如何通过内置治理功能的统一数据和AI平台来解决这一挑战。利用新一代Amazon SageMaker，他们的PB级解决方案使用户能够在云原生市场中发现和访问数据，然后在统一的数据和AI开发环境中进行构建。本课程非常适合希望在强大治理与自助服务能力之间取得平衡以推动AI计划的数据和平台领导者。

presenter.name: Raghu Prabhu
presenter.title: Pr. WWSO GTM SageMaker Unified Studio

sessions.title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming Apache Kafka into a Scalable Message Queue (OPN413)
sessions.title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 将 Apache Kafka 转变为可扩展的消息队列 (OPN413)
sessions.abstract: Event streaming in Apache Kafka is powerful, but sometimes a queue-based model is more suited for workloads where parallel consumption is more important than ordering.
